original: gnyi ga ji skad du bshad pa bzhin no //
analyzed: gnyi ga ji skad du bshad pa bzhin no //
translated: both as explained.

original: yang na bsam gtan dag ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: yang na bsam gtan dag ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Or else, the meditative concentrations are those to be explained.

original: ji lta bu zhe na lus dang ngag sems 'jig pa ste /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na lus dang ngag sems 'jig pa ste /
translated: What are they like? The destruction of body, speech, and mind.

original: gsum pa de bya'o //
analyzed: gsum pa de bya'o //
translated: The third is to be done.

original: ma yengs par sems kyis te /
analyzed: ma yengs par sems kyis te /
translated: With an undistracted mind,

original: dus de srid kyi bar du yid rtse gcig pas so //
analyzed: dus de srid kyi bar du yid rtse gcig pas so //
translated: with a one-pointed mind for that long.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni bdud rtsi thab sbyor ro //🔽sta re tho ba phyag na bsnams //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni bdud rtsi thab sbyor ro // sta re tho ba phyag na bsnams //
translated: Vajrasattva is the name of Amṛtakuṇḍali.🔽He holds an axe and a hammer

original: zhes bya ba ni padma dang ral gri'i gnas su'o //🔽bsam gtan de nyid ni de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni padma dang ral gri'i gnas su'o // bsam gtan de nyid ni de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: in the places of the lotus and the sword.

original: drag po chen po'i las la gnas pa'i khro bo la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: drag po chen po'i las la gnas pa'i khro bo la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: That meditative concentration is called “the wrathful one abiding in the rite of great wrath,” and so on.

original: de'i dam tshig ni bsam gtan no //
analyzed: de'i dam tshig ni bsam gtan no //
translated: The pledge of that is the meditative concentration.

original: bsad par ni zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'i dbyings kyi yul can la nye bar btags pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsad par ni zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'i dbyings kyi yul can la nye bar btags pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “ Killing” is a metaphorical expression for the domain of the realm of space.

original: de yis zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba yis te /
analyzed: de yis zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba yis te /
translated: “ By that” is by the one to be accomplished.

original: nam mkha' khyab pa de rnams lag na dgra sta thogs pa des dum bur byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nam mkha' khyab pa de rnams lag na dgra sta thogs pa des dum bur byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because those who pervade space, holding hatchets in their hands, cut them into pieces.

original: bsams na zhes bya ba ni de ltar bsgoms na'o //
analyzed: bsams na zhes bya ba ni de ltar bsgoms na'o //
translated: “If one thinks” means if one meditates in that way.

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid kyang zhes bya ba ni gal te bsgrub pa bya ba de rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dngos po yin na yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid kyang zhes bya ba ni gal te bsgrub pa bya ba de rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dngos po yin na yang 'gyur ro //
translated: “Even the state of Vajradhara” means that if the thing to be accomplished is the state of Vajradhara, it will happen.

original: sangs rgyas gnod byed ces bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i rim pas so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas gnod byed ces bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i rim pas so //
translated: “Harm to the Buddhas” means by the process just explained.

original: mdun zhes bya ba ni mdun la sogs su'o //
analyzed: mdun zhes bya ba ni mdun la sogs su'o //
translated: “In front” means in front and so on.

original: gtum pa ni gnod pa byed pa can nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gtum pa ni gnod pa byed pa can nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Fierce” means harmful.

original: mchu ring ba zhes bya ba ni bya kang ka la sogs pa'o ;
analyzed: mchu ring ba zhes bya ba ni bya kang ka la sogs pa'o ;
translated: “Long-beaked” means the kāka and so on.

original: / sprul nag ces bya ba ni yi ge kham las byung ba'o //
analyzed: / sprul nag ces bya ba ni yi ge kham las byung ba'o //
translated: “Black snake” means arisen from the syllable khaṃ.

original: dug gi mchog ni dam tshig ces bya ba ni ha la ha la la sogs pa'i khams gsum du gtogs pa'i dug dag gi tshogs ni dug gi mchog ste /
analyzed: dug gi mchog ni dam tshig ces bya ba ni ha la ha la la sogs pa'i khams gsum du gtogs pa'i dug dag gi tshogs ni dug gi mchog ste /
translated: “The best poison” means the collection of poisons belonging to the three realms, such as halāhala, which is the best poison.

original: de'i dam tshig go //
analyzed: de'i dam tshig go //
translated: That is its pledge.

original: 'di la bsdus pa yod pas na de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di la bsdus pa yod pas na de skad ces bya'o //
translated: It is so called because it is a contraction of that.

original: de'i kha na gnas @37b pa'i yi ge hr'i'i 'od zer rnams kyis de'i khar rdo rje nyid du dug gi tshogs sdud par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i kha na gnas @37b pa'i yi ge hr'i'i 'od zer rnams kyis de'i khar rdo rje nyid du dug gi tshogs sdud par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The light rays from the letter hrīḥ that is located in his mouth draw in the mass of poison into the vajra in his mouth.🔽Having visualized it in the forehead,🔽the one who has been ordered to eat such and such should visualize the letter hrīḥ in the forehead.

original: 'phral bar bsams nas zhes bya ba ni che ge mo zo shig ces lung bsgo ba can des dpral bar sos 'dzin pa'i nang na khyad par 'phags pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'phral bar bsams nas zhes bya ba ni che ge mo zo shig ces lung bsgo ba can des dpral bar sos 'dzin pa'i nang na khyad par 'phags pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The one who is superior in the interior of the mouth is the one who is special.

original: khyad par can du gyur pa zhes bya ba'i don to ;
analyzed: khyad par can du gyur pa zhes bya ba'i don to ;
translated: The meaning is that he is the one who is distinguished.

original: / phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad gang yin pa de rnams la yams sam /
analyzed: / phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad gang yin pa de rnams la yams sam /
translated: All the sentient beings in the ten directions are those who are afflicted by🔽the fear of epidemics or harm.

original: gnod par byed pa rnams 'jigs pa gang yin pa de rnams nges par 'bebs pa'i mchog ste shin tu'o //
analyzed: gnod par byed pa rnams 'jigs pa gang yin pa de rnams nges par 'bebs pa'i mchog ste shin tu'o //
translated: He is the supreme one who definitely brings down those fears.

original: dgra'i zhes bya ba ni dgra la'o //
analyzed: dgra'i zhes bya ba ni dgra la'o //
translated: The enemy is the one who is hostile.

original: bsgul ba zhes bya ba ni gsod pa'o //
analyzed: bsgul ba zhes bya ba ni gsod pa'o //
translated: The shaking is the killing.

original: tho ba zhes bya ni g-yas kyi gsum par gzhag pa'o //
analyzed: tho ba zhes bya ni g-yas kyi gsum par gzhag pa'o //
translated: The hammer is the one placed in the third position on the right.

original: gshegs pa ci 'dra ba zhe na /
analyzed: gshegs pa ci 'dra ba zhe na /
translated: What is the form of the one who goes?

original: gtub pa'o // sta re sogs zhes bya ba la /🔽dang po nyid du len cing 'dzin pa ni dang po'i sogs te /
analyzed: gtub pa'o // sta re sogs zhes bya ba la / dang po nyid du len cing 'dzin pa ni dang po'i sogs te /
translated: The axe, etc.

original: gang la g-yon pa'i phyag gsum pas dang po sta re 'dzin pa gang la mnga' ba de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: gang la g-yon pa'i phyag gsum pas dang po sta re 'dzin pa gang la mnga' ba de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The first of the three left hands holds an axe, and he who possesses this is so called.

original: rdo rje can ni bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyis so //
analyzed: rdo rje can ni bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyis so //
translated: The vajra-holder is Amṛtakuṇḍali.

original: mngon spyod la kha sbyar dbye ba la sogs pa sngon du bya ba'i bla ma'i man ngag las shes pa gang yin pa de tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis bstan par bya ba'i phyir bsrung ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: mngon spyod la kha sbyar dbye ba la sogs pa sngon du bya ba'i bla ma'i man ngag las shes pa gang yin pa de tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis bstan par bya ba'i phyir bsrung ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The two verses beginning with “protection” are stated in order to teach what is to be known from the guru’s instruction of the preliminaries for the performance of killing, such as the opening of the mouth, etc.

original: bsrung ba'i don du dang por yongs su gzung ba ni kha sbyar la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bsrung ba'i don du dang por yongs su gzung ba ni kha sbyar la sogs pa'o //
translated: The first protection is the protection of the mouth, etc.

original: sngags rnams ni bsrung ba'i sngags so //
analyzed: sngags rnams ni bsrung ba'i sngags so //
translated: The mantras are the mantras of protection.

original: lha rnams ni srung bar byed pa'i lha rnams so //
analyzed: lha rnams ni srung bar byed pa'i lha rnams so //
translated: The gods are the gods who protect.

original: de rnams rang gi snying ga las byung ba'i rdo rje lcags kyu phyag na bsnams pa'i lha rnams kyis bkug pa rnams g-yon logs su gzhag ste /
analyzed: de rnams rang gi snying ga las byung ba'i rdo rje lcags kyu phyag na bsnams pa'i lha rnams kyis bkug pa rnams g-yon logs su gzhag ste /
translated: Those are drawn by the deities holding iron hooks in their hands, which arise from one's heart, and are placed to the left.

original: bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi phur bus k'a ya b'a ga tsitta badzra zhes bya ba bton la /🔽che ge mo'i raksha sam pu ta dim raksha mantra de ba ta shu zhes bya ba bcug la /
analyzed: bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi phur bus k'a ya b'a ga tsitta badzra zhes bya ba bton la / che ge mo'i raksha sam pu ta dim raksha mantra de ba ta shu zhes bya ba bcug la /
translated: Reciting kāya-vāk-citta vajra with the stake of Amṛtakuṇḍali,

original: aom gha gha zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags brjod cing bsnun par bya'o //
analyzed: aom gha gha zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags brjod cing bsnun par bya'o //
translated: one should strike with the mantra oṃ gha gha and so on, inserting the protection of so-and-so, the protection of the mantra, the protection of the deity.

original: dam tshig ni ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: dam tshig ni ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: The pledge is the meditative concentration.

original: rdo rje phung pos zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la'o //
analyzed: rdo rje phung pos zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la'o //
translated: The vajra aggregate is the body of the victim.

original: dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pas so //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pas so //
translated: The maṇḍala is the form of the assembled maṇḍala.

original: bsad bdag nyid gtogs zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'i nyes pa bsgrags pa dang / de la khros nas khro bo'i gzugs su byas te /
analyzed: bsad bdag nyid gtogs zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'i nyes pa bsgrags pa dang / de la khros nas khro bo'i gzugs su byas te /
translated: The self-empowerment is the proclamation of the victim's faults, and having become angry with him, one should assume the form of a wrathful deity.

original: de bsad nas bsad pa'i 'og tu bdag nyid gtogs te /
analyzed: de bsad nas bsad pa'i 'og tu bdag nyid gtogs te /
translated: Having killed him, after the killing, one should enter oneself,

original: rang gi dkyil 'khor du byon nas zhugs par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi dkyil 'khor du byon nas zhugs par bsam par bya'o //
translated: having arrived in one's own maṇḍala.

original: ston pa @38a * //
analyzed: ston pa @38a * //
translated: The Teacher

original: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Buddha, etc.

original: gal te bsgrub par bya ba sangs rgyas la sogs par gyur ba de lta na yang cho ga 'dis 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes la dor ba gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: gal te bsgrub par bya ba sangs rgyas la sogs par gyur ba de lta na yang cho ga 'dis 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes la dor ba gsungs pa yin no //
translated: If the one to be accomplished becomes a Buddha, etc. , then by this rite he will die.

original: rdo rje chen po'i dam tshig ni ji skad du gsungs pa'i bsam gtan no //
analyzed: rdo rje chen po'i dam tshig ni ji skad du gsungs pa'i bsam gtan no //
translated: The great vajra commitment is the meditative stabilization as previously described.

original: des gdug pa'i las can gyi khro bo la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: des gdug pa'i las can gyi khro bo la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: By that, the wrathful one with evil karma is called that.

original: de ston par mdzad pa nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das la yang de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ston par mdzad pa nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das la yang de skad ces bya'o //
translated: Because he teaches that, the Blessed One is also called that.

original: cho ga 'di dag thams cad ni sngags gzhan dag dang yang gdug pa'i las rnams la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: cho ga 'di dag thams cad ni sngags gzhan dag dang yang gdug pa'i las rnams la sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: All these rites should be applied to other mantras also for evil actions.

original: bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi rtog pa'o //
analyzed: bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi rtog pa'o //
translated: The chapter on Amṛtakuṇḍali.

original: yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rang bzhin can gyi sangs rgyas thams cad gcig tu gyur pa'i phyir thub pa chen po'o //
analyzed: yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rang bzhin can gyi sangs rgyas thams cad gcig tu gyur pa'i phyir thub pa chen po'o //
translated: The Great Sage is the nature of the Wish-Fulfilling Jewel, because all Buddhas are one.

original: don yod pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyi thams cad du rtog pa spros pa'i phyir rdzogs sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: don yod pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyi thams cad du rtog pa spros pa'i phyir rdzogs sangs rgyas so //
translated: The Perfect Buddha is the nature of Amoghasiddhi, because he is the emanation of all conceptual elaborations.

original: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The rest is as before.

original: las phran tshegs kyi dngos grub ni ye shes rdo rje'o //
analyzed: las phran tshegs kyi dngos grub ni ye shes rdo rje'o //
translated: The attainment of the minor actions is the Vajra of Knowledge.

original: de ston par mdzad pa la yang de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ston par mdzad pa la yang de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The one who teaches that is also called Vajra of Knowledge.

original: de la bka' stsal pa yang rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de la bka' stsal pa yang rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The command is the perfect Buddhahood itself.

original: rdo rgyus kyi sprul la sogs pa las /🔽sprul la sogs pa'i bya ba 'byung ba'i the tshom bsal ba'i phyir /
analyzed: rdo rgyus kyi sprul la sogs pa las / sprul la sogs pa'i bya ba 'byung ba'i the tshom bsal ba'i phyir /
translated: From the clay emanation and so on,🔽the activity of emanation and so on arises.

original: ae ma'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: ae ma'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In order to remove doubt, he says Amazing! and so on.

original: ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa ni rang bzhin gyis kun nas dag pa'o //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa ni rang bzhin gyis kun nas dag pa'o //
translated: The pure by nature is the natural purity.

original: rdo rje'i theg pa zhes bya ba ni theg pa chen po ma lus pa bsdus pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug yin la de rnams bsdus pa ni thabs dang shes rab yin zhing de dag kyang bsdus pa ro gcig pa de ni byang chub kyi sems
analyzed: rdo rje'i theg pa zhes bya ba ni theg pa chen po ma lus pa bsdus pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug yin la de rnams bsdus pa ni thabs dang shes rab yin zhing de dag kyang bsdus pa ro gcig pa de ni byang chub kyi sems
translated: The so-called Vajra Vehicle is the collection of the entire Great Vehicle, which is the six perfections, and their collection is method and wisdom, and that is the single taste of their collection, which is the Thought of Enlightenment.

original: yin te / de yang rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin yin la de nyid ni rdo rje yin no //
analyzed: yin te / de yang rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin yin la de nyid ni rdo rje yin no //
translated: That is also the concentration of Vajrasattva, and that itself is the vajra.

original: rdo rje yang de yin la theg pa yang yin pas na rdo rje theg pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje yang de yin la theg pa yang yin pas na rdo rje theg pa ste /
translated: Since it is a vajra and also a vehicle, it is the Vajra Vehicle,

original: snags kyi theg pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: snags kyi theg pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: which means the Vehicle of the Peak.

original: bla na med ces bya ba ni theg pa thams cad kyi mchog nyid du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bla na med ces bya ba ni theg pa thams cad kyi mchog nyid du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is unsurpassed because it is the best of all vehicles.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: ma skyes pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: ma skyes pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: He says “unborn,” and so on.

original: gzhan du na rdo rgyus kyi sprul la sogs pa las gdug pa'i sprul la sogs pa'i las rnams ma skyes pa rnams de las gang gi phyir rgyal ba bden pa gsungs pa rnams kyis skye ba bstan pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: gzhan du na rdo rgyus kyi sprul la sogs pa las gdug pa'i sprul la sogs pa'i las rnams ma skyes pa rnams de las gang gi phyir rgyal ba bden pa gsungs pa rnams kyis skye ba bstan pa'i phyir te /
translated: This is because the Victorious Ones, who speak the truth, have taught that they arise from that.

original: rdo rje theg pa chen po 'di'i che ba'i bdag nyid yin pas na //
analyzed: rdo rje theg pa chen po 'di'i che ba'i bdag nyid yin pas na //
translated: Since this is the greatness of the Great Vehicle of Vajra,

original: 'di ni the tshom gyi gnas ma yin no zhes bya bar @38b dgongs so //🔽rdo rgyus dag ces bya ba la sogs pa la khro bo'i lha nyid kyi sbyor ba dang ldan pas rdo rgyus dang dur khrod kyi sol ba dag la yi ge kham brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mngon par bsngags pa byas nas de dag gis ji skad gsungs pa'i sprul
analyzed: 'di ni the tshom gyi gnas ma yin no zhes bya bar @38b dgongs so // rdo rgyus dag ces bya ba la sogs pa la khro bo'i lha nyid kyi sbyor ba dang ldan pas rdo rgyus dang dur khrod kyi sol ba dag la yi ge kham brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mngon par bsngags pa byas nas de dag gis ji skad gsungs pa'i sprul
translated: it is not a matter of doubt.🔽With regard to the chalk, etc.,

original: nag po bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: nag po bri bar bya'o //
translated: endowed with the yoga of the wrathful deity, one should incant the chalk and charnel ground ash with the syllable kham one hundred and eight times, and with those one should draw the chalk snake as described.

original: dug bsam zhes bya ba ni yi ge kham gis so ;
analyzed: dug bsam zhes bya ba ni yi ge kham gis so ;
translated: The poison is imagined with the syllable kham.

original: / ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /🔽mi bzad par ni gyur ba yi //
analyzed: / ci 'dra ba zhig ce na / mi bzad par ni gyur ba yi //
translated: What is it like?🔽It is like the color of the fire

original: sreg pa'i me yi kha dog bzhin //
analyzed: sreg pa'i me yi kha dog bzhin //
translated: that burns unbearably.

original: bsgoms na zhes bya ba ni de ltar bsgoms na'o //
analyzed: bsgoms na zhes bya ba ni de ltar bsgoms na'o //
translated: If one meditates means: if one meditates in that way.

original: 'gul bar gdon mi za zhes bya ba ni yi ge kham nyid kyis bsgrub par bya ba la 'dzin pa'i phyir bskul na gnas las 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to ;
analyzed: 'gul bar gdon mi za zhes bya ba ni yi ge kham nyid kyis bsgrub par bya ba la 'dzin pa'i phyir bskul na gnas las 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to ;
translated: There is no doubt that it will move means: if one incites it by the syllable KHAM itself, it will go from its place.

original: / de yis zhes bya ba ni sprul gyi khar bsgoms pa'i yi ge hr'i'i 'od zer gyi lcags kyus sprul gyi khar 'bab par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: / de yis zhes bya ba ni sprul gyi khar bsgoms pa'i yi ge hr'i'i 'od zer gyi lcags kyus sprul gyi khar 'bab par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: That means the light ray hook of the syllable HRĪḤ that is meditated on in the snake's mouth. It will fall into the snake's mouth.

original: reg ma thag tu zhes bya ba ni gal te reg na'o //
analyzed: reg ma thag tu zhes bya ba ni gal te reg na'o //
translated: As soon as it is touched means: if it is touched.

original: de lta ma yin na ni che ge mo bhaksha ya kham zhes bya ba'i bskul ba'i tshig des bsgrub par bya ba'i dpral bar sos 'dzin par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na ni che ge mo bhaksha ya kham zhes bya ba'i bskul ba'i tshig des bsgrub par bya ba'i dpral bar sos 'dzin par bsam par bya'o //
translated: Otherwise, by the inciting words So-and-so BHAKSAYA KHAM, one should imagine that it bites the forehead of the victim.

original: de yis 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chi ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: de yis 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chi ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: Its seizure and death are the same as before.

original: sdig pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rab tu zhes bya ba ni bskyed par bya ba'o //
analyzed: sdig pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rab tu zhes bya ba ni bskyed par bya ba'o //
translated: Sin and so forth: completely means to be generated.

original: ji ltar bya zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar bya zhe na /
translated: How is it done?

original: cho ga bzhin du ste yi ge kham gis mngon par bsngags pa'i tshon gyis bris pa bzhin no //
analyzed: cho ga bzhin du ste yi ge kham gis mngon par bsngags pa'i tshon gyis bris pa bzhin no //
translated: According to the rite, that is, as if written with the color consecrated by the syllable kham.

original: de bzhin du sbyor ba 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa ste //
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyor ba 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa ste //
translated: Similarly, the nature of the arising of the application is the nature of the arising of the application.

original: de dag gis dug bskyed pa dang dug gtong ba dang / dug dgug pa la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: de dag gis dug bskyed pa dang dug gtong ba dang / dug dgug pa la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The arising of the poison and so forth, the casting of the poison and the attracting of the poison and so forth, are as before.

original: lta ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje ni mche ba'o //
analyzed: lta ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje ni mche ba'o //
translated: The vajra of the view and so forth is the fangs.

original: sogs pa'i sgras ni gnas pa'i dug rnams so //
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras ni gnas pa'i dug rnams so //
translated: The word and so forth includes the poisons of the places.

original: gzhan yang dug ces bya ba ni sbyor ba rnams so //
analyzed: gzhan yang dug ces bya ba ni sbyor ba rnams so //
translated: Moreover, the poison is the application.

original: ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad dkar po'i rnal 'byor byas la /
analyzed: ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad dkar po'i rnal 'byor byas la /
translated: The vajra of wisdom is the practitioner of the yoga of white Vairocana.

original: lag pa g-yas par aom las byung ba'i 'khor lo'i lte bar aom gnas pa 'od zer dkar po'i phreng ba can bsam par bya ba de ni 'dir ye shes rdo rje ste /
analyzed: lag pa g-yas par aom las byung ba'i 'khor lo'i lte bar aom gnas pa 'od zer dkar po'i phreng ba can bsam par bya ba de ni 'dir ye shes rdo rje ste /
translated: In the right hand, one should imagine an om from which arises a wheel, in the center of which is an om with a garland of white light rays. That is the vajra of wisdom here.

original: de byabs pa las dug drangs nas nam mkha' la spro bar bya'o //
analyzed: de byabs pa las dug drangs nas nam mkha' la spro bar bya'o //
translated: By its stroking, the poison is drawn out and should be emitted into space.

original: de bzhin du bu ram gyi kham phor la sogs par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du bu ram gyi kham phor la sogs par bya'o //
translated: Likewise, one should do the same with a lump of molasses, and so on.

original: dug gi dam tshig rdo rje ni dug spro ba bstan pa'o //
analyzed: dug gi dam tshig rdo rje ni dug spro ba bstan pa'o //
translated: The pledge of poison is the teaching of the spreading of poison.

original: de ston par mdzad pa nyid kyi phyir de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ston par mdzad pa nyid kyi phyir de skad ces bya'o //
translated: It is so called because it is the very teaching of that.

original: gso ba'i rdo rje ni gso bar bstan pa'o //
analyzed: gso ba'i rdo rje ni gso bar bstan pa'o //
translated: The vajra of healing is the teaching of healing.

original: de'i don gyi snying po ni yi ge h'um dkar po'o //
analyzed: de'i don gyi snying po ni yi ge h'um dkar po'o //
translated: The essence of its meaning is the white syllable hūṃ.🔽This essence is the yoga of white Akṣobhya,

original: snying po 'di zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa dkar po'i rnal 'byor ram /🔽rdo rje sems @39a * //
analyzed: snying po 'di zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa dkar po'i rnal 'byor ram / rdo rje sems @39a * //
translated: or the yoga of Vajrasattva.

original: dpa'i rnal 'byor byas nas snying ga'i zla bar sa bon de nyid kyi las rdo rje rtse lnga pa dkar po de'i lte bar rnam par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: dpa'i rnal 'byor byas nas snying ga'i zla bar sa bon de nyid kyi las rdo rje rtse lnga pa dkar po de'i lte bar rnam par bsam par bya'o //
translated: Having performed that, one should imagine at the heart on a moon the very same seed syllable, from which arises a white five-pronged vajra, in the center of which is the syllable.

original: de nas de'i 'od zer dkar po bsil ba'i tshogs kyis bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la khyab par byas la /
analyzed: de nas de'i 'od zer dkar po bsil ba'i tshogs kyis bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la khyab par byas la /
translated: Then, with a mass of its white cool light rays, one should pervade the body of the person to be healed.

original: dug kha dog nag po de de'i snying ga dang lkog ma dang / dpral ba dang mgo bor bsdus la langs par zhes bya ba lan gnyis lan gsum bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: dug kha dog nag po de de'i snying ga dang lkog ma dang / dpral ba dang mgo bor bsdus la langs par zhes bya ba lan gnyis lan gsum bsam par bya'o //
translated: The black poison is concentrated at his heart, throat, forehead, and head. One should think of the “arising” twice or thrice.

original: de nas thams cad snying gar bsdus pa thams cad skug pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ba la bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas thams cad snying gar bsdus pa thams cad skug pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ba la bsam par bya'o //
translated: Then, having concentrated everything at the heart, one should think of the “accomplishment” of the entire arousal.

original: gang gzhan nad du zhes bya ba ni shu ba dang // 'brum bu la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gang gzhan nad du zhes bya ba ni shu ba dang // 'brum bu la sogs pa'o //
translated: “ Whatever other illness” means such things as leprosy and smallpox.

original: padma chen po zhes bya ba ni 'od dpag tu med pa dkar po'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas a'a: dkar po las byung ba'i padma dkar po'o //
analyzed: padma chen po zhes bya ba ni 'od dpag tu med pa dkar po'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas a'a: dkar po las byung ba'i padma dkar po'o //
translated: The “great lotus” is the white lotus arisen from the white A, by means of the application of white Amitābha.

original: de'i zhes bya ba ni lag pa g-yas pa'i mthil gyi'o //
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba ni lag pa g-yas pa'i mthil gyi'o //
translated: “ Its” means of the palm of the right hand.

original: sdud pa na ni zhes bya ba ni byabs pa'i skad cig la nad pa la zhugs pa'i 'od zer rnams rgyas par byas nas bsdus pa na ni'o //
analyzed: sdud pa na ni zhes bya ba ni byabs pa'i skad cig la nad pa la zhugs pa'i 'od zer rnams rgyas par byas nas bsdus pa na ni'o //
translated: “ When gathering” means when the light rays that have entered the patient are expanded and gathered in the moment of sprinkling.

original: dam tshig gnag ces bya ba la dam tshig ni 'od zer gyi tshogs so //
analyzed: dam tshig gnag ces bya ba la dam tshig ni 'od zer gyi tshogs so //
translated: “ The pledge” is the mass of light rays.

original: de'i nag po ni dug bsdus pa'i phyir te bsam pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: de'i nag po ni dug bsdus pa'i phyir te bsam pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: Its black is for the gathering of poison, and the thought is to be supplied.

original: bskul ba na ni zhes bya ba ni khu tshur phyi rol du bkrol bas dug thag ring bar drang ba na'o //
analyzed: bskul ba na ni zhes bya ba ni khu tshur phyi rol du bkrol bas dug thag ring bar drang ba na'o //
translated: When it is urged means when the fist is released externally, the poison is drawn out.

original: dkar po dang 'dra zhes bya ba ni dug las nges par thar pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: dkar po dang 'dra zhes bya ba ni dug las nges par thar pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: It is like white means that it is just like the liberation from poison.

original: gzhan dag na re de'i zhes bya ba ni nad gnas su bsdu ba'i sngags kyi'o //
analyzed: gzhan dag na re de'i zhes bya ba ni nad gnas su bsdu ba'i sngags kyi'o //
translated: Others explain that it means the mantra for gathering the disease into the site.

original: bskul ba na ni phyogs su 'od zer spro ba'i phyir zhes 'chad do //
analyzed: bskul ba na ni phyogs su 'od zer spro ba'i phyir zhes 'chad do //
translated: When it is urged, it is because the light rays are emitted in the directions.

original: gsang ba ni padma'i don gyis so //
analyzed: gsang ba ni padma'i don gyis so //
translated: Secret means the lotus.

original: gsang chen ni yi ge a'a: de nyid kyis so //
analyzed: gsang chen ni yi ge a'a: de nyid kyis so //
translated: Great secret means the syllable A.

original: ye shes dri med ni 'od zer gyi las kyis so //
analyzed: ye shes dri med ni 'od zer gyi las kyis so //
translated: Stainless wisdom means the activity of the light rays.

original: phyi'i nad ni rims la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: phyi'i nad ni rims la sogs pa'o //
translated: External disease means fever and so on.

original: nang gi nad ni sdig pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: nang gi nad ni sdig pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Internal disease means sin and so on.

original: nang rnams gso ba rdo rje'i don dang snying po la sogs pa'i don ni sngar dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: nang rnams gso ba rdo rje'i don dang snying po la sogs pa'i don ni sngar dang 'dra'o //
translated: The meaning of vajra and essence and so on for the healing of the internal is the same as before.

original: 'dod pa ni sngags pa ste phul du byung ba'i yul yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dod pa ni sngags pa ste phul du byung ba'i yul yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Desire is the mantra practitioner, because it is the supreme object.

original: dad pa ni gus pa'o //
analyzed: dad pa ni gus pa'o //
translated: Faith is devotion.

original: de'i yon tan ni khyad par can no //
analyzed: de'i yon tan ni khyad par can no //
translated: Its quality is special.

original: de thob par 'gyur ba ni de'i yul can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de thob par 'gyur ba ni de'i yul can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Its attainment is its object, because it is the object of that.

original: yi ge'i tshig ces bya ba la //
analyzed: yi ge'i tshig ces bya ba la //
translated: The words of the syllables are as follows.

original: sngags de rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i gzugs so //
analyzed: sngags de rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i gzugs so //
translated: The result of those mantras is the form of Vairochana and so forth.

original: de 'dra ba'i gzugs ni zhes bya ba la bdag nyid kyi gzugs ni de rnams kyi gzugs khro bo thams cad gnag pa'i 'bar ba'i phreng ba @39b 'khrigs pa'o //
analyzed: de 'dra ba'i gzugs ni zhes bya ba la bdag nyid kyi gzugs ni de rnams kyi gzugs khro bo thams cad gnag pa'i 'bar ba'i phreng ba @39b 'khrigs pa'o //
translated: The form like that is one's own form, the form of all wrathful ones, black, with blazing garlands of light.

original: nad kyi rgyu'i sdig pa ni nad de de bskul ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'i lte ba la bsams pa'i 'dzin dzik la sogs pa'i sngags kyi 'od zer 'bar ba rnams kyis bsgrub par bya ba'i lus dang / ngag dang yid khyab pa rnams kyis bkang ba ste /
analyzed: nad kyi rgyu'i sdig pa ni nad de de bskul ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'i lte ba la bsams pa'i 'dzin dzik la sogs pa'i sngags kyi 'od zer 'bar ba rnams kyis bsgrub par bya ba'i lus dang / ngag dang yid khyab pa rnams kyis bkang ba ste /
translated: The sin that is the cause of illness is the illness. The urging of that is the visualization of the blazing light rays of the mantras such as dzhik in the navel of the one to be accomplished, filling the body, speech, and mind of the one to be accomplished with pervasion.

original: de rgyur gyur pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: de rgyur gyur pa rnams kyis so //
translated: By those which are its causes.

original: gang du bskul bas she na /
analyzed: gang du bskul bas she na /
translated: Where is it urged?

original: rang gi lus ngag sems gnas las te /
analyzed: rang gi lus ngag sems gnas las te /
translated: From the abode of one's body, speech, and mind.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la sogs pa nyid ni sdig pa'i gnas yin la de las de rnams kyis so //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la sogs pa nyid ni sdig pa'i gnas yin la de las de rnams kyis so //
translated: The body, etc. to be accomplished are the abode of sin, and from that they are urged.

original: de'i lus la sogs par gtogs pa'i sdig pa nag po yi ge kam gis de'i snying gar bsdus pa ni dam tshig kyang yin la de byung ba yang de nyid yin no //
analyzed: de'i lus la sogs par gtogs pa'i sdig pa nag po yi ge kam gis de'i snying gar bsdus pa ni dam tshig kyang yin la de byung ba yang de nyid yin no //
translated: The sin belonging to one's body, etc. is black, and is gathered into the heart by the syllable kham, which is also a pledge, and also arises from that.

original: de nas lte ba yan chad du 'od zer 'bar ba'i sngags kyis rim gyis bteg cing yi ge kham yang snying ga las gong bur byung ste /
analyzed: de nas lte ba yan chad du 'od zer 'bar ba'i sngags kyis rim gyis bteg cing yi ge kham yang snying ga las gong bur byung ste /
translated: Then, above the navel, the syllable kham is gradually lifted by the mantra of blazing light, and also arises from the heart as a glob.

original: rang gi lha'i rnam pa thams cad dkar por yongs su gyur pa'i rang gi sngags snying gar phyin nas gnas pa la yi ge kham yang sna rtse las byung ba nyid na gnag cing mi sdug pa'i spre'u la sogs pa'i rnam par yongs su gyur nas byung bar
analyzed: rang gi lha'i rnam pa thams cad dkar por yongs su gyur pa'i rang gi sngags snying gar phyin nas gnas pa la yi ge kham yang sna rtse las byung ba nyid na gnag cing mi sdug pa'i spre'u la sogs pa'i rnam par yongs su gyur nas byung bar
translated: Having become totally white, one's mantra arrives at the heart and abides there. The syllable kham also arises from the tip of the nose, and having become a black, ugly monkey, etc.

original: bsam par bya'o //🔽spre'u dang 'dra bar yongs su gyur pa'i dam tshig la de skad ces bya zhing /
analyzed: bsam par bya'o // spre'u dang 'dra bar yongs su gyur pa'i dam tshig la de skad ces bya zhing /
translated: should be imagined.🔽The pledge that has become like a monkey is called that.

original: khyi dang 'dra bar gyur pa'i byung ba'i de la'ang de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: khyi dang 'dra bar gyur pa'i byung ba'i de la'ang de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The occurrence that has become like a dog is also called that.

original: de byung ba bdag tu rnam par bsam pa ni rnam par brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: de byung ba bdag tu rnam par bsam pa ni rnam par brtag par bya'o //
translated: The occurrence of that should be imagined as the self.

original: yang na zhes bya ba gsungs pa'i phyir gnag cing mi sdug pa gcer bu yi dags kyi gzugs su yongs su gyur pa'ang rung //
analyzed: yang na zhes bya ba gsungs pa'i phyir gnag cing mi sdug pa gcer bu yi dags kyi gzugs su yongs su gyur pa'ang rung //
translated: Or, because of the statement “also,” it is also the transformation into a dark, ugly, naked, ghost-like form.

original: 'khor lo'am zhes bya ba ni rnam pa snang mdzad kyi phyag tu'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo'am zhes bya ba ni rnam pa snang mdzad kyi phyag tu'o //
translated: The wheel is in the hand of Vairocana.

original: rdo rje'ang rung zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa dang 'od dpag tu med pa dag la'o //
analyzed: rdo rje'ang rung zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa dang 'od dpag tu med pa dag la'o //
translated: The vajra is in the hands of Akṣobhya and Amitābha.

original: bsgoms nas zhes bya ba ni 'bar ba rnam par bsams na so //
analyzed: bsgoms nas zhes bya ba ni 'bar ba rnam par bsams na so //
translated: Having meditated on it, that is, having imagined the blazing,

original: rdo rje go 'phang ni sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i nga rgyal te de'i gnas so //
analyzed: rdo rje go 'phang ni sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i nga rgyal te de'i gnas so //
translated: the state of the vajra is the pride of Body Vajra, etc. , and that is the abode.

original: lus la sogs pa'i tshogs ni lus dang ngag sems dam tshig rnams so //
analyzed: lus la sogs pa'i tshogs ni lus dang ngag sems dam tshig rnams so //
translated: The assembly of body, etc. , is the pledges of body, speech, and mind.

original: des ni zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo la sogs pas ni'o //
analyzed: des ni zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo la sogs pas ni'o //
translated: “By that” means by the wheel, etc.

original: rab tu rtsol zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya pa'i nad nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab tu rtsol zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya pa'i nad nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: “One should strive” means in order to pacify the disease to be cured.

original: sangs rgyas sprin dag ces bya ba ni phyogs rnams nas lhags te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas sprin dag ces bya ba ni phyogs rnams nas lhags te /
translated: “Clouds of Buddhas” means those who have come from the directions and

original: sku la sogs par zhugs nas gnas pa dag go //
analyzed: sku la sogs par zhugs nas gnas pa dag go //
translated: having entered the body, etc. remain there.

original: rdo rje rnams kyi rgyal po ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste de'i sprin bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje rnams kyi rgyal po ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste de'i sprin bsam par bya'o //
translated: The “king of vajras” is Vajrasattva, and one should imagine his clouds.

original: bsgom par bya zhes bya ba ni de ltar bsgoms pas so //🔽sangs @40a * //
analyzed: bsgom par bya zhes bya ba ni de ltar bsgoms pas so // sangs @40a * //
translated: “One should meditate” means by meditating in that way.

original: rgyas zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas rnams so //
analyzed: rgyas zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas rnams so //
translated: “The Buddhas” means the Buddhas.

original: khros par zhes bya ba la ni'i sgras ni bsnun par ni'o //
analyzed: khros par zhes bya ba la ni'i sgras ni bsnun par ni'o //
translated: “In anger” means in order to strike.

original: de la zhes bya ba ni spre'u la sogs pa dang 'dra bar byung ba'i nad la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni spre'u la sogs pa dang 'dra bar byung ba'i nad la'o //
translated: “That” means the disease that has arisen like a monkey, etc.

original: nad kyi rigs las skyes par gang grags pa de yang 'jig par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nad kyi rigs las skyes par gang grags pa de yang 'jig par 'gyur ro //
translated: Whatever is known as arisen from a type of disease, that also will be destroyed.

original: brgya rtsa brgyad pa ni brgya dang brgyad bzlas pa sta de'i sbyor bas yin gyi bsam gtan yan gar bas kyang ma yin no //
analyzed: brgya rtsa brgyad pa ni brgya dang brgyad bzlas pa sta de'i sbyor bas yin gyi bsam gtan yan gar bas kyang ma yin no //
translated: The one of one hundred and eight is the one hundred and eight repetitions.

original: yang na zhes bya ba ni phyogs gzhan no //
analyzed: yang na zhes bya ba ni phyogs gzhan no //
translated: Or else means another position.

original: bdag gi sngags rgyal gyis zhes bya ba ni rang gi 'dod pa'i lha dang ting nge 'dzin dang sngags kyis so //
analyzed: bdag gi sngags rgyal gyis zhes bya ba ni rang gi 'dod pa'i lha dang ting nge 'dzin dang sngags kyis so //
translated: By the king of my mantras means by one's chosen deity, concentration, and mantra.

original: rdo rje'i bsam gtan ni bshad ma thag pa'i bsam gtan no ;
analyzed: rdo rje'i bsam gtan ni bshad ma thag pa'i bsam gtan no ;
translated: Vajra concentration is the concentration just explained.

original: / dam tshig ni ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: / dam tshig ni ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: Vow is concentration.

original: las kyi dngos grub phra mo'o //
analyzed: las kyi dngos grub phra mo'o //
translated: The minor power is the power of action.

original: de de ltar na dngos grub mchog dang dman pa gsungs nas dngos grub phra mo rnams kyang gsungs pa yin te //
analyzed: de de ltar na dngos grub mchog dang dman pa gsungs nas dngos grub phra mo rnams kyang gsungs pa yin te //
translated: Thus, having taught the major and minor powers, he also teaches the minor powers.

original: dngos gru tu mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos gru tu mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are similar in being powers.

original: da ni tshogs kyi lam la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas bzlas pa dang bsgom pa la brtson pa rnams kyis ni dngos grub kyi mtshan ma'i rmi lam dag mthong bar 'gyur la //
analyzed: da ni tshogs kyi lam la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas bzlas pa dang bsgom pa la brtson pa rnams kyis ni dngos grub kyi mtshan ma'i rmi lam dag mthong bar 'gyur la //
translated: Now, for the yogi who is on the path of accumulation and is striving in repetition and meditation, dream signs of power will be seen.

original: mthong nas kyang sngon du bsnyen pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de bstan pa'i skabs dbye ba'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: mthong nas kyang sngon du bsnyen pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de bstan pa'i skabs dbye ba'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In order to teach that, having seen that, one should enter into the prior approximation, the Bhagavān declares, then, etc.

original: 'dod dang thar pa ni thabs gsum pa'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: 'dod dang thar pa ni thabs gsum pa'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: Desire and liberation are the results of the three methods.

original: rdo rje che ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa dang 'dra ba'i sku la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje che ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa dang 'dra ba'i sku la sogs pa ste /
translated: The great vajra is the body, etc. that are like Vairochana, etc.

original: dngos grub dman pa rnams zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dngos grub dman pa rnams zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The lesser powers are the meaning of the words, etc.

original: de dag rgyas par bshad ma thag pa'i tshul du ston par mdzad pa'i bcom ldan 'das la /
analyzed: de dag rgyas par bshad ma thag pa'i tshul du ston par mdzad pa'i bcom ldan 'das la /
translated: The Bhagavān, who teaches those in the manner just explained,

original: 'dod dang thar pa rdo rje tshes //🔽zhes bya'o // dngos grub rnam pa gnyis po de nyid ni ye shes yin la /
analyzed: 'dod dang thar pa rdo rje tshes // zhes bya'o // dngos grub rnam pa gnyis po de nyid ni ye shes yin la /
translated: is the desire and liberation vajra hook.

original: de 'dren par mdzad pas na ye shes kyi kyo ba yang de yin la /
analyzed: de 'dren par mdzad pas na ye shes kyi kyo ba yang de yin la /
translated: That very pair of powers is the knowledge, and since he leads it, he is the knowledge hook.

original: dngos grub kyi mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir rmi lam chen por snang ba'i 'od po che yang yin pas na de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: dngos grub kyi mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir rmi lam chen por snang ba'i 'od po che yang yin pas na de skad ces bya'o //
translated: And since it is the characteristic of power, he is the great dream appearance light, and thus he is so called.

original: de de ma thag tu ston par mdzad pa nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das la yang de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de de ma thag tu ston par mdzad pa nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das la yang de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The Blessed One is so called because he teaches that immediately.

original: de la rang bzhin gyis slu ba'i rmi lam la yongs su ston zhe na //
analyzed: de la rang bzhin gyis slu ba'i rmi lam la yongs su ston zhe na //
translated: If it is said that a dream, which is naturally deceptive, is not taught,

original: 'ga' zhig the tshom du gyur ba de bsal ba'i phyir chos rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig the tshom du gyur ba de bsal ba'i phyir chos rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: in order to remove the doubt of some, he says, “All phenomena,” and so on.

original: gnyis med kyang gnyis su snang bas bslad pa'i rnam par rig pa tsam gyis lus can gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid can gyi @40b chos rnams thams cad ni rmi lam lta bu'o //
analyzed: gnyis med kyang gnyis su snang bas bslad pa'i rnam par rig pa tsam gyis lus can gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid can gyi @40b chos rnams thams cad ni rmi lam lta bu'o //
translated: All phenomena, which have the characteristic of being dependent on others, are like a dream, because they are the mere appearance of consciousness, which is tainted by the appearance of duality, although it does not exist.

original: kun du brtags pa nyid yin pa'i phyir skye ba dang bral ba'i rang bzhin gyis bzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid can gang yin pa de dang ldan pa'i phyir ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes shing ngo //
analyzed: kun du brtags pa nyid yin pa'i phyir skye ba dang bral ba'i rang bzhin gyis bzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid can gang yin pa de dang ldan pa'i phyir ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes shing ngo //
translated: Because they are imagined, they are free from arising, and they are possessed of the characteristic of the apprehended and the apprehender. Because they are possessed of that, they are essentially unborn and unceasing.

original: gnyis kyi rang bzhin de dag nyid kyis dag pa ste //
analyzed: gnyis kyi rang bzhin de dag nyid kyis dag pa ste //
translated: They are pure by that very nature of duality.

original: stong pa de nyid 'di dag la yod pas na de skad ces bya ste //
analyzed: stong pa de nyid 'di dag la yod pas na de skad ces bya ste //
translated: Since emptiness exists in those, it is so called.

original: de dag ni gnyis kyis stong pa'i yongs su grub pa'i rang bzhin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de dag ni gnyis kyis stong pa'i yongs su grub pa'i rang bzhin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: They are the nature of the consummate, empty of duality.

original: ae ma'o de lta bu'i rnam pa can gyis ni chos thams cad ni ji ltar rmi lam gyi la yid brtan du med pa de bzhin du gzhan dag tu yang 'khrul ba tsam yin no ;
analyzed: ae ma'o de lta bu'i rnam pa can gyis ni chos thams cad ni ji ltar rmi lam gyi la yid brtan du med pa de bzhin du gzhan dag tu yang 'khrul ba tsam yin no ;
translated: Oh! In that way, all phenomena are like a dream, not to be relied on. In the same way, elsewhere they are mere error.

original: /'on kyang 'khrul ba'i rdo rje rab tu gsungs te /
analyzed: /'on kyang 'khrul ba'i rdo rje rab tu gsungs te /
translated: However, the vajra of error is well proclaimed.

original: bag chags brtan pos shin tu brtan par gyur pa ni 'khrul pa'i rdo rje yin la /
analyzed: bag chags brtan pos shin tu brtan par gyur pa ni 'khrul pa'i rdo rje yin la /
translated: The vajra of error is very firm due to firm latent propensities.

original: de nyid don byed pa la mi slu ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi tshul du gsungs pa ni tshad mar brjod de /
analyzed: de nyid don byed pa la mi slu ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi tshul du gsungs pa ni tshad mar brjod de /
translated: Since it is undeceiving in the performance of its function, it is said to be valid cognition in the manner of worldly convention.

original: ji ltar yul dang dus dang rnam pa tha dad pa yin na yang /
analyzed: ji ltar yul dang dus dang rnam pa tha dad pa yin na yang /
translated: Just as objects, times, and aspects are different,

original: chu zla dang ni rmi lam bden pa dang nags tshal stug po la sogs pa'i 'khrul pa ni 'khrul pa'i rdo rje yin pa de bzhin du dngos grub kyi mtshan ma'i rmi lam de dag kyang yin pa'i phyir /🔽'di la som nyi bya bar rigs pa ma yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: chu zla dang ni rmi lam bden pa dang nags tshal stug po la sogs pa'i 'khrul pa ni 'khrul pa'i rdo rje yin pa de bzhin du dngos grub kyi mtshan ma'i rmi lam de dag kyang yin pa'i phyir / 'di la som nyi bya bar rigs pa ma yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: It is not proper to doubt this, because those dreams are the signs of powers.🔽This is the intention.

original: bsam gtan zhes bya ba la sogs pa la tshigs su bcad pa 'dis ni bstan pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan zhes bya ba la sogs pa la tshigs su bcad pa 'dis ni bstan pa'o //
translated: The meaning of the verse beginning with meditation is taught.

original: bsam gtan bzlas pa'i don ni dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan bzlas pa'i don ni dmigs pa'o //
translated: The meaning of meditation and repetition is the object of meditation.

original: de la brtson pa ni sems brtan par gyur pa can no //
analyzed: de la brtson pa ni sems brtan par gyur pa can no //
translated: The one who is devoted to that is the one whose mind has become firm.

original: yang na bsam gtan bzlas pa'i don ni 'bras bu yin te //
analyzed: yang na bsam gtan bzlas pa'i don ni 'bras bu yin te //
translated: Or, the meaning of meditation and repetition is the result.

original: dngos grub rnam pa gnyis so //🔽de ni mthong ba de las gzhan pa gang yin bde la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: dngos grub rnam pa gnyis so // de ni mthong ba de las gzhan pa gang yin bde la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The two kinds of power.🔽That is seen in that, and what is other than that is called that.

original: de yang dbye ba mthong zhes bya ba ste dngos grub kyi dbye ba'o //
analyzed: de yang dbye ba mthong zhes bya ba ste dngos grub kyi dbye ba'o //
translated: That is the division of seeing, that is, the division of power.

original: rnam pa gnyis ni bdag nyid la sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i gzugs su mthong ba ni dngos grub mchog yin la gzhan mthong ba ni dngos grub dman pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rnam pa gnyis ni bdag nyid la sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i gzugs su mthong ba ni dngos grub mchog yin la gzhan mthong ba ni dngos grub dman pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The two aspects are that seeing oneself as the form of the Buddha, etc. is the supreme attainment, and seeing others is the inferior attainment.

original: de la zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Among them means

original: de dag gi nang nas so //
analyzed: de dag gi nang nas so //
translated: among those.

original: rmi lam gyi dam tshig gi gnas nyid ni rtogs pa'i mtshan ma yin la //
analyzed: rmi lam gyi dam tshig gi gnas nyid ni rtogs pa'i mtshan ma yin la //
translated: The sign of realization is the very site of the vow of dreams.

original: de dang de'i dngos grub mchog gi yul nyid yin pa'i phyir chen po yang yin pas na //
analyzed: de dang de'i dngos grub mchog gi yul nyid yin pa'i phyir chen po yang yin pas na //
translated: And since it is also great because it is the very site of the supreme attainment of that and that,

original: rmi lam chen po'i dam tshig gi gnas so //
analyzed: rmi lam chen po'i dam tshig gi gnas so //
translated: it is the site of the vow of great dreams.

original: byang chub nyid ye shes kyi mchog yin la de thob pas bdag @41a * //
analyzed: byang chub nyid ye shes kyi mchog yin la de thob pas bdag @41a * //
translated: Enlightenment itself is the supreme intuition, and by attaining that,

original: nyid ces bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: nyid ces bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: one is called

original: sangs rgyas 'od ni bzang por zhes bya ba ni rab tu grags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku mdog dang mtshan dang dpe byad rnams kyis rnam par mdzes pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas 'od ni bzang por zhes bya ba ni rab tu grags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku mdog dang mtshan dang dpe byad rnams kyis rnam par mdzes pa'o //
translated: the one who has the excellent light of the Buddha means that one is beautified by the color, marks, and signs of the well-known Buddha-body.

original: sangs rgyas rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku yang zhes bya ba ni yongs su dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gtso bo 'ba' zhig tu'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku yang zhes bya ba ni yongs su dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gtso bo 'ba' zhig tu'o //
translated: The “buddha” is the perfect enjoyment body, “alone” means in the pure buddha-fields.

original: mchod par byed pa zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid la'o //
analyzed: mchod par byed pa zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid la'o //
translated: “ Worships” means by oneself.

original: gzugs dang / sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis //
analyzed: gzugs dang / sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis //
translated: “ The form of the buddhas and bodhisattvas”

original: mchod pa byas par zhes bya ba ni rang gi gzugs la'o //
analyzed: mchod pa byas par zhes bya ba ni rang gi gzugs la'o //
translated: means by one’s own form.

original: ye shes chen po ni sku rdo rje la'o //
analyzed: ye shes chen po ni sku rdo rje la'o //
translated: “ Great intuition” means the body vajra.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' ni thugs rdo rje la'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' ni thugs rdo rje la'o //
translated: “ Vajrasattva” means the mind vajra.

original: rdo rje chos ni gsung rdo rje la'o //
analyzed: rdo rje chos ni gsung rdo rje la'o //
translated: “ Vajra Dharma” means the speech vajra.

original: sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i dngos grub la nges pa nyid kyi phyir na gsang ba'o //
analyzed: sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i dngos grub la nges pa nyid kyi phyir na gsang ba'o //
translated: It is secret because of the certainty of the powers of the body vajra, etc.

original: rdo rje yang de yin la bsod nams mdzad pa nyid kyi phyir grags pa chen po yang yin pas na'o //
analyzed: rdo rje yang de yin la bsod nams mdzad pa nyid kyi phyir grags pa chen po yang yin pas na'o //
translated: It is a great fame because it is a vajra and it is a great merit.

original: rdo rje can zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje can zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang ba'o //
translated: “ Vajra-holder” means the holder of the vajra.

original: gzugs zhes bya ba ni rang gi lus so //
analyzed: gzugs zhes bya ba ni rang gi lus so //
translated: “ Form” means one’s own body.

original: 'di 'dra ba zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis phyag byas par gyur ba'o //
analyzed: 'di 'dra ba zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis phyag byas par gyur ba'o //
translated: Such means that the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas have paid homage to him.

original: sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub ni rnam par dag pa'i mthar thug pa'o //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub ni rnam par dag pa'i mthar thug pa'o //
translated: The accomplishment of body, speech, and mind is the ultimate purity.

original: de ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid de las skye ba ste /
analyzed: de ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid de las skye ba ste /
translated: That is the characteristic of the Vajra-holder, born from him.

original: rig pa chen po'i skyes bu gzugs su gyur to zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽lha rnams kyi bu mo dang khye'u dang bu mo dag yid du 'ong ba de rnams kyang mngon du phyogs par gyur ba'am /
analyzed: rig pa chen po'i skyes bu gzugs su gyur to zhes bya ba'i don to // lha rnams kyi bu mo dang khye'u dang bu mo dag yid du 'ong ba de rnams kyang mngon du phyogs par gyur ba'am /
translated: The meaning is that he is the embodiment of the Great Knowledge Being.

original: nye bar gnas pa'am gang na gnas par mthong na'o //
analyzed: nye bar gnas pa'am gang na gnas par mthong na'o //
translated: The daughters of the gods are the beautiful boys and girls. They are facing him or present or seen wherever he is.

original: chos kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i zhes bya ba ni chos ston pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i zhes bya ba ni chos ston pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The wheel-turner of the Dharma is because he teaches the Dharma.

original: bsam gtan rdo rje ni ting nge 'dzin gyi rdo rje'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan rdo rje ni ting nge 'dzin gyi rdo rje'o //
translated: The vajra of meditation is the vajra of samadhi.

original: de la gnas pa ni sems brtan par gyur ba'o //
analyzed: de la gnas pa ni sems brtan par gyur ba'o //
translated: The abiding in that is the stability of the mind.

original: de nyid kyis na de las byung ba'i phyir dam tshig sbyor ba yang de ltar mthong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na de las byung ba'i phyir dam tshig sbyor ba yang de ltar mthong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, because it arises from that, the pledge-union is seen in that way.

original: dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba ni 'dir bdag nyid ces bya ba ni lhag ma ste bsam gtan dam tshig can dag gis zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba ni 'dir bdag nyid ces bya ba ni lhag ma ste bsam gtan dam tshig can dag gis zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The consecration is called here and one's own is the remainder, and the pledge-concentrations are to be applied.

original: de bzhin du mchod pa byas pa yang zhes bya ba 'dir yang ngo zhe'o zhes bya ba ni dngos grub kyi mchog gi mtshan ma yongs su rdzogs zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de bzhin du mchod pa byas pa yang zhes bya ba 'dir yang ngo zhe'o zhes bya ba ni dngos grub kyi mchog gi mtshan ma yongs su rdzogs zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Likewise, the worship is also called here and also means the completion of the signs of the supreme feat.

original: yang gsungs pa zhes bya ba ni dngos grub dman pa'i mtshan ma'i tshigs su bcad pa 'og ma gnyis so //
analyzed: yang gsungs pa zhes bya ba ni dngos grub dman pa'i mtshan ma'i tshigs su bcad pa 'og ma gnyis so //
translated: The verse below, arisen from the vajra, is the verse on the signs of the inferior feat.

original: rdo rje las byung zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rdo rje las byung zhes bya ba la /
translated: As for arisen from the vajra,

original: rdo rje ni byang chub kyi sems so //
analyzed: rdo rje ni byang chub kyi sems so //
translated: the vajra is the Thought of Enlightenment.

original: 'dir ni de thob pa can gyi byang chub @41b sems dpa' nyid la rdo rje zhes bshad do //
analyzed: 'dir ni de thob pa can gyi byang chub @41b sems dpa' nyid la rdo rje zhes bshad do //
translated: Here, the vajra is explained as the very Bodhisattva who has attained that.

original: de yang dag par 'byung ba ni yang dag par skyes pa'o //
analyzed: de yang dag par 'byung ba ni yang dag par skyes pa'o //
translated: The arising of that is the birth.

original: sna tshogs pa'i zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'am /
analyzed: sna tshogs pa'i zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'am /
translated: The various means that one has become a Bodhisattva oneself,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i mdzad pa chen po la 'jug par gyur pa'am /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i mdzad pa chen po la 'jug par gyur pa'am /
translated: or has entered into the great deeds of a Bodhisattva,

original: gzhan sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' mngon sum du gyur pa'am /
analyzed: gzhan sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' mngon sum du gyur pa'am /
translated: or has seen another Buddha or Bodhisattva in person,

original: bu mo dang khye'u yid du 'ong ba'am /
analyzed: bu mo dang khye'u yid du 'ong ba'am /
translated: or a beautiful girl or boy,🔽or has seen some other such thing of that kind.

original: de lta bu'i rigs gzhan 'ga' zhig mthong nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de lta bu'i rigs gzhan 'ga' zhig mthong nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning of having seen.

original: dri ma med ces bya ba ni bsngags pa'o //🔽bla na med par zhes bya ba ni gong na med pa nyid de dgag pa dang 'dra ba dang ldan pa'i rigs pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang 'dra ba zhes bya ba'i don yin gyi rnam pa thams cad du ni
analyzed: dri ma med ces bya ba ni bsngags pa'o // bla na med par zhes bya ba ni gong na med pa nyid de dgag pa dang 'dra ba dang ldan pa'i rigs pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang 'dra ba zhes bya ba'i don yin gyi rnam pa thams cad du ni
translated: The stainless is the praise.🔽 The unsurpassed is the absence of anything higher.

original: ma yin no //
analyzed: ma yin no //
translated: The meaning is that one is like a supramundane Buddha or Bodhisattva, but not in every way.

original: 'o na ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci yin zhe na /
translated: What is it then?

original: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las skyes pa ste /
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las skyes pa ste /
translated: It is born from the vajra of body, speech, and mind.

original: sku'i rdo rje'am /
analyzed: sku'i rdo rje'am /
translated: The vajra of body is the body of a Buddha,

original: gsung gi rdo rje'am /
analyzed: gsung gi rdo rje'am /
translated: the vajra of speech is the speech of a Buddha,🔽and the vajra of mind is the mind of a Buddha.

original: thugs kyi rdo rje'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las skyes pa'o //🔽gdol ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gang gi tshe gdol ba mo'am khyi mo'am rgod ma la sogs pa rnams dang / bdag nyid sbyor bas rdo rje slob dpon te /
analyzed: thugs kyi rdo rje'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las skyes pa'o // gdol ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gang gi tshe gdol ba mo'am khyi mo'am rgod ma la sogs pa rnams dang / bdag nyid sbyor bas rdo rje slob dpon te /
translated: born from the body, speech, and mind of the mind-vajra.

original: brtag pa'i blos mthong bar gyur pa de'i tshe thugs kyi gsang ba 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: brtag pa'i blos mthong bar gyur pa de'i tshe thugs kyi gsang ba 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: The outcaste woman and so on: when one, by the yoga of oneself as a deity, sees the outcaste woman, the dog woman, the she-goat woman, and so on, as Vajrasattva, then the secret of mind is accomplished.

original: mi bskyod pa ni blo ldan mi bskyod pa'i zhes bya ba gang yin pa ni tshigs su bcad pa'i don yin no //
analyzed: mi bskyod pa ni blo ldan mi bskyod pa'i zhes bya ba gang yin pa ni tshigs su bcad pa'i don yin no //
translated: The unshakable and so on: the meaning of the verse is that the wise one, unshakable, should see the outcaste woman and so on as Vajrasattva.

original: dngos grub kyi mtshan ma rnams so //
analyzed: dngos grub kyi mtshan ma rnams so //
translated: The signs of the powers.🔽Just as the dream signs of the powers occur by the power of meditation without being intended, so also are the powers.

original: ji ltar dngos grub kyi mtshan ma'i rmi lam rnams bsgoms pa'i stobs las ma bsams par 'byung ba de bzhin du dngos grub rnams kyang yin no zhes nges par bya ba'i phyir dngos grub nye ba'i ched du rmi lam gyi mtshan ma mthong ba rnams kyis rmi lam
analyzed: ji ltar dngos grub kyi mtshan ma'i rmi lam rnams bsgoms pa'i stobs las ma bsams par 'byung ba de bzhin du dngos grub rnams kyang yin no zhes nges par bya ba'i phyir dngos grub nye ba'i ched du rmi lam gyi mtshan ma mthong ba rnams kyis rmi lam
translated: In order to ascertain this, the signs of the dream seen for the sake of the near attainment of the powers are explained.

original: brtag par bya ba yin pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: brtag par bya ba yin pa de'i phyir /
translated: Because it is to be examined,

original: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la de la zhes bya ba ni rmi lam gyi mtshan ma de mthong ba yod na'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la de la zhes bya ba ni rmi lam gyi mtshan ma de mthong ba yod na'o //
translated: therefore, he says, “therein,” etc. Therein means when that sign of the dream is seen.

original: rmi lam gyi rnam par dpyad pa ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis rmi lam rnam par dpyad par bya ste /
analyzed: rmi lam gyi rnam par dpyad pa ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis rmi lam rnam par dpyad par bya ste /
translated: The examination of the dream is to be examined by the wisdom of the equality of all things.

original: sems la dmigs so //
analyzed: sems la dmigs so //
translated: It is observed in the mind.

original: de'i snying po ni snying po bsdus pa ste nam mkha' rdo rje'o //
analyzed: de'i snying po ni snying po bsdus pa ste nam mkha' rdo rje'o //
translated: Its essence is the essence of the essence, the vajra of space.

original: 'di ni zhes pa 'chad par 'gyur ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'i don gyi tshul lo //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes pa 'chad par 'gyur ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'i don gyi tshul lo //
translated: This is the method of the meaning of the verse to be explained, “therein.”

original: de nyid ni rang sems zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nyid ni rang sems zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: That itself is stated in “one’s own mind,” etc.

original: don ni 'di na @42a * //
analyzed: don ni 'di na @42a * //
translated: The meaning here is this.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rmi lam mthong na rmi lam de nyid la mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems rab tu 'jog ste rnam par dpyod par byed do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rmi lam mthong na rmi lam de nyid la mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems rab tu 'jog ste rnam par dpyod par byed do //
translated: When a bodhisattva sees a dream, he settles his mind in equipoise right on that dream and examines it.

original: rmi lam 'di la ni gzung bar bya ba'i don ci yang med la gzung bar bya ba med pas 'dzin pa yang med do //
analyzed: rmi lam 'di la ni gzung bar bya ba'i don ci yang med la gzung bar bya ba med pas 'dzin pa yang med do //
translated: In this dream, there is no object at all that is apprehended, and because there is no object of apprehension, there is also no subject.

original: 'on kyang gnyis med pa la gnyis su snang ba'i sems tsam 'di ni 'khrul ba tsam yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang gnyis med pa la gnyis su snang ba'i sems tsam 'di ni 'khrul ba tsam yin te /
translated: However, this mere mind, which is nondual but appears as dual, is mere error.

original: rmi lam 'di ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun du rtog pa sems tsam gyi lus can gyi chos thams cad gnyis su med pa la gnyis su snang ba yin no zhes bya ba 'di yin no //
analyzed: rmi lam 'di ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun du rtog pa sems tsam gyi lus can gyi chos thams cad gnyis su med pa la gnyis su snang ba yin no zhes bya ba 'di yin no //
translated: Just as in a dream, all phenomena, which are the body of mere mind, are nondual but appear as dual.

original: de ltar na rmi lam lta bu nyid yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni sems tsam nyid yin pa de ltar de rnams sems su dmigs pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar na rmi lam lta bu nyid yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni sems tsam nyid yin pa de ltar de rnams sems su dmigs pa ste /
translated: Thus, because they are like a dream, all phenomena are mere mind. In this way, they are observed as mind.

original: yang dag pa la so sor rtog pa gang yin pa 'di ni sems la dmigs pa zhes bya bar brjod do //
analyzed: yang dag pa la so sor rtog pa gang yin pa 'di ni sems la dmigs pa zhes bya bar brjod do //
translated: This discernment of reality is called the observation of mind.

original: 'di la chos rnams thams cad rab tu gnas pa ste rang gi sems snang ba yin no zhes bya ba ni lhag ma ste /
analyzed: 'di la chos rnams thams cad rab tu gnas pa ste rang gi sems snang ba yin no zhes bya ba ni lhag ma ste /
translated: Here, all phenomena are well established as the appearance of one’s own mind.

original: gzugs dang tsher ba la sogs pa'i chos snang ba gang yin pa de thams cad gzugs dang tshor ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa can gyi rang gi sems nyid yin gyi sems las phyi rol du gyur pa'i sems kyis gzung bar bya ba'i don ma yin pa de
analyzed: gzugs dang tsher ba la sogs pa'i chos snang ba gang yin pa de thams cad gzugs dang tshor ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa can gyi rang gi sems nyid yin gyi sems las phyi rol du gyur pa'i sems kyis gzung bar bya ba'i don ma yin pa de
translated: All these phenomena that appear, such as form, feeling, and so on, are the mind itself, which has the aspects of form, feeling, and so on. They are not objects that are external to the mind and apprehended by the mind.

original: ltar ni de rnams sems su dmigs pa la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du snang ngo zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ltar ni de rnams sems su dmigs pa la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du snang ngo zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: In this way, they appear just as they are to the observation of the mind.

original: de'i 'og tu gzung ba med pas 'dzin pa yang yod pa ma yin pa de ltar na gnyis su med pa'i phyir gnyis su med par snang ba tsam gyi mtshan nyid can gnyis kyis stong pa nyid kyi chos thams cad ro gcig pa gnyis su snang ba'i 'khrul
analyzed: de'i 'og tu gzung ba med pas 'dzin pa yang yod pa ma yin pa de ltar na gnyis su med pa'i phyir gnyis su med par snang ba tsam gyi mtshan nyid can gnyis kyis stong pa nyid kyi chos thams cad ro gcig pa gnyis su snang ba'i 'khrul
translated: After that, since there is no apprehended object, there is also no apprehending subject. In this way, because of nonduality, all phenomena, which are characterized by the mere appearance of nonduality, are of one taste, empty of duality. The confusion of dualistic appearance is eliminated.

original: pa'i rgyu mtshan yongs su spangs nas yang dag pa'i yid la byed pas yid la byed pa de nyid kyis rjes su 'gro ba'i phyir lhun gyis grub pa mngon par 'du mi byed pa spros pa'i mtshan mar snang ba thams cad dang bral bas gnyis kyis stong pa'i
analyzed: pa'i rgyu mtshan yongs su spangs nas yang dag pa'i yid la byed pas yid la byed pa de nyid kyis rjes su 'gro ba'i phyir lhun gyis grub pa mngon par 'du mi byed pa spros pa'i mtshan mar snang ba thams cad dang bral bas gnyis kyis stong pa'i
translated: Because of that, one should settle the mind in that non-conceptuality, which is free from all the appearances of the signs of conceptual elaborations, which is the emptiness of duality, which is spontaneous, which is non-compounded, and which is free from the reasons for thorough affliction.

original: spros pa med pa de la sems mnyam par 'jog go //
analyzed: spros pa med pa de la sems mnyam par 'jog go //
translated: One should settle the mind in that non-conceptual elaboration.

original: de ni spros pa med pa rnam par mi rtog pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems yin par bshad do //
analyzed: de ni spros pa med pa rnam par mi rtog pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems yin par bshad do //
translated: That is explained to be the ultimate mind of enlightenment, the non-conceptual supramundane wisdom that is free from conceptual elaborations.

original: de nyid ni nam mkha' rdo rje ste /
analyzed: de nyid ni nam mkha' rdo rje ste /
translated: That itself is the space vajra.

original: chos thams cad nam mkha' dang 'dra bar mthong ba'i phyir nam mkha' yang de yin la /
analyzed: chos thams cad nam mkha' dang 'dra bar mthong ba'i phyir nam mkha' yang de yin la /
translated: It is space because all phenomena are seen to be like space.

original: byang chub kyi sems nyid yin pa'i phyir /🔽rdo rje yang yin pa de @42b ltar na nam mkha' rdo rje'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems nyid yin pa'i phyir / rdo rje yang yin pa de @42b ltar na nam mkha' rdo rje'o //
translated: It is a vajra because it is the mind of enlightenment itself.🔽Thus, it is the space vajra.

original: nam mkha' rdo rje'i gnas zhes bya ba la ni'i sgra ni yang gi don te /
analyzed: nam mkha' rdo rje'i gnas zhes bya ba la ni'i sgra ni yang gi don te /
translated: In the abode of the space vajra, the word “also” has the meaning of “and.”

original: nam mkha'i rdo rje la yang chos rnams thams cad rab tu gnas pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i rdo rje la yang chos rnams thams cad rab tu gnas pa'o //
translated: And in the Vajra of Space, all dharmas are well established.

original: chos med chos nyid med pa ste /
analyzed: chos med chos nyid med pa ste /
translated: There is no dharma, no reality.

original: re zhig chos kyi tshul du snang ba ma yin te /
analyzed: re zhig chos kyi tshul du snang ba ma yin te /
translated: It is not the appearance of the mode of a dharma,

original: chos thams cad kyi rgyu mtshan nub pa na de la stong pa nyid tsam du snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi rgyu mtshan nub pa na de la stong pa nyid tsam du snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because when the signs of all dharmas have disappeared, emptiness alone appears there.

original: chos nyid kyi tshul du yang ma yin te /
analyzed: chos nyid kyi tshul du yang ma yin te /
translated: It is not the mode of reality,

original: ltung ba'i chos can rgya shug gi 'bras bu khar gzhong gis rten par byed pa na de rnams kyi rten du gyur ba yin la /
analyzed: ltung ba'i chos can rgya shug gi 'bras bu khar gzhong gis rten par byed pa na de rnams kyi rten du gyur ba yin la /
translated: because when the falling hairs appear in the sky, the sky is their support,

original: stong pa nyid ni rtag pa nyid yin pa'i phyir rnam pa ji ltar yang bya ba ma yin pa de bas na 'di'i ni 'ga' zhig gi yang brten pa ma yin pa de ltar na 'di ni 'ga' zhig gi yang chos nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: stong pa nyid ni rtag pa nyid yin pa'i phyir rnam pa ji ltar yang bya ba ma yin pa de bas na 'di'i ni 'ga' zhig gi yang brten pa ma yin pa de ltar na 'di ni 'ga' zhig gi yang chos nyid ma yin no //
translated: but emptiness is permanent, so it cannot be an object in any way. Therefore, it is not the support of anything. Thus, it is not the reality of anything.

original: chos rnams kyi ni stong pa nyid chos nyid yin no zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa de la don ni 'di'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba yin gyi /
analyzed: chos rnams kyi ni stong pa nyid chos nyid yin no zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa de la don ni 'di'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba yin gyi /
translated: The meaning of the statement “The emptiness of phenomena is their reality” is that this is their nature.

original: brten pa'i yon tan ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: brten pa'i yon tan ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is not that it is a quality dependent on them.🔽Then, etc.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ngo mtshar du gyur ba ni chos rnams rang bzhin med pa la'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ngo mtshar du gyur ba ni chos rnams rang bzhin med pa la'o //
translated: Astonishment is with regard to the essencelessness of phenomena.

original: rmad du gyur pa ni nam mkha'i rdo rjes nam mkha' rdo rje mthong ba la'o //
analyzed: rmad du gyur pa ni nam mkha'i rdo rjes nam mkha' rdo rje mthong ba la'o //
translated: Wonder is with regard to the seeing of the sky-vajra by the sky-vajra.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs ni chos thams cad do //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs ni chos thams cad do //
translated: Body, speech, and mind are all phenomena.

original: de rnams kyi dam tshig ni yang dag pa'i de kho na nyid dang yang dag par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de rnams kyi dam tshig ni yang dag pa'i de kho na nyid dang yang dag par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Their commitment is the true reality and the true realization.

original: de dag gi the tshom ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ste de gcod pa'o /
analyzed: de dag gi the tshom ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ste de gcod pa'o /
translated: Their doubt is that of all the transcendent lords, and it is cut off.

original: ngo mtshar dang rmad du gyur ba ni the tshom las gyur pa yin pa de'i phyir zhus pa ni bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin te /🔽don ni chos rnams ngo bo med pa la /
analyzed: ngo mtshar dang rmad du gyur ba ni the tshom las gyur pa yin pa de'i phyir zhus pa ni bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin te / don ni chos rnams ngo bo med pa la /
translated: The marvelous and the wonderful are due to doubt. Therefore, the question is “Bhagavān, the nature of phenomena is not established as anything at all.

original: chos kyi de nyid kun bshad pa gang yin pa de dang de ni ngo mtshar yin te /
analyzed: chos kyi de nyid kun bshad pa gang yin pa de dang de ni ngo mtshar yin te /
translated: The meaning is that the reality of phenomena, which is explained as being essenceless, is marvelous.

original: rang bzhin med par ma grub pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: rang bzhin med par ma grub pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: It is intended that this is because it is not established as essenceless.

original: ngo mtshar las byung ba nam mkha' la ni nam mkha' bsgom zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' rdo rjes nam mkha' bsgom pa ni shin tu ngo mtshar dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: ngo mtshar las byung ba nam mkha' la ni nam mkha' bsgom zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' rdo rjes nam mkha' bsgom pa ni shin tu ngo mtshar dang ldan pa'o //
translated: “The meditation on space in space, which arises from the marvelous, ” is the meditation on space by means of the vajra of space, which is extremely marvelous.

original: gang gi tshe rang gi sems nyid chos thams cad yin pa de'i tshe sna tshogs pa nyid yin na ci'i phyir nam mkha'i rdo rje yin /
analyzed: gang gi tshe rang gi sems nyid chos thams cad yin pa de'i tshe sna tshogs pa nyid yin na ci'i phyir nam mkha'i rdo rje yin /
translated: When one’s own mind is all phenomena, then it is various. Why is it the vajra of space?

original: 'on te rang gi sems nyid nam mkha'i rdo rje nyid yin pa de'i tshe sna tshogs pa nyid med pa yin pas na ji ltar na de nyid chos thams cad yin /🔽'on te nam mkha'i rdo rje nyid chos @43a * //
analyzed: 'on te rang gi sems nyid nam mkha'i rdo rje nyid yin pa de'i tshe sna tshogs pa nyid med pa yin pas na ji ltar na de nyid chos thams cad yin / 'on te nam mkha'i rdo rje nyid chos @43a * //
translated: But if one’s own mind is the vajra of space, then since there is no diversity, how could it be all phenomena?

original: thams cad du 'gyur ba de lta na yang nam mkha'i rdo rjes nam mkha'i rdo rje nyid rig par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba ni rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: thams cad du 'gyur ba de lta na yang nam mkha'i rdo rjes nam mkha'i rdo rje nyid rig par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba ni rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: Even if the vajra of space were to become all phenomena, it is not tenable to say that the vajra of space cognizes the vajra of space itself.

original: rang nyid la byed pa 'gal ba'i phyir ral gri'i so rnon pos kyang ral gri'i so rnon po de nyid gcod par mi byed pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: rang nyid la byed pa 'gal ba'i phyir ral gri'i so rnon pos kyang ral gri'i so rnon po de nyid gcod par mi byed pa lta bu'o //
translated: This is because it is contradictory for something to act on itself, just as a sharp sword cannot cut its own edge.

original: de bzhin du nam mkha' rdo rje rnam pa med pa yin na yang de ji ltar de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa can yin /
