translated: What need is there to cultivate the five perfections in the perfection vehicle?

original: nam mkha'i gang la gnas zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid ni chos rnams kyi chos nyid yin pas ni de rnams nyid la gnas kyi de med par de mi mthong na gang las nam mkha' rdo rje yin zhes bya bar bsams pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i gang la gnas zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid ni chos rnams kyi chos nyid yin pas ni de rnams nyid la gnas kyi de med par de mi mthong na gang las nam mkha' rdo rje yin zhes bya bar bsams pa'o //
translated: “ In what does space abide?” means that since emptiness is the reality of phenomena, it abides in them, and if it is not seen in their absence, then from what is the vajra of space?

original: gang na'ang mi gnas zhes bya ba ni ji ltar nam mkha' gang la yang mi gnas pa de bzhin du nam mkha' lta bu'i stong pa nyid kyang ngo //
analyzed: gang na'ang mi gnas zhes bya ba ni ji ltar nam mkha' gang la yang mi gnas pa de bzhin du nam mkha' lta bu'i stong pa nyid kyang ngo //
translated: “ It does not abide anywhere” means that just as space does not abide anywhere, so too is the space-like emptiness.

original: de ni 'di ni chos gang gis kyang brtag par mi nus so zhes bya ba 'dir rab tu bsgrubs pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni 'di ni chos gang gis kyang brtag par mi nus so zhes bya ba 'dir rab tu bsgrubs pa yin no //
translated: “ It cannot be conceived by any phenomenon” is the proof of this.

original: gzhan yang rang gi mtshan nyid dag brdzun gyi rnam pa'i khyad par can nyid yin pa'i phyir de dag la de gnas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan yang rang gi mtshan nyid dag brdzun gyi rnam pa'i khyad par can nyid yin pa'i phyir de dag la de gnas pa ma yin no //
translated: Moreover, it does not abide in them because its own characteristics are false and have specific aspects.

original: de nyid kyi phyir chos thams cad kyi rang gi mtshan nyid snang ba med pa na snang ba'i chos gang la yang mi gnas par snang ba yin pa de ltar na nam mkha' rdo rje'i rigs pa yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir chos thams cad kyi rang gi mtshan nyid snang ba med pa na snang ba'i chos gang la yang mi gnas par snang ba yin pa de ltar na nam mkha' rdo rje'i rigs pa yin no //
translated: For this very reason, when the intrinsic identity of all things does not appear, it is the appearance of the non-abiding of any appearing thing, and thus it is the principle of the diamond of space.

original: gal te 'o na chos nyid kyang chos nyid kyi rang gi mtshan nyid du mi snang ngo zhe na de ni 'dod pa yin no //
analyzed: gal te 'o na chos nyid kyang chos nyid kyi rang gi mtshan nyid du mi snang ngo zhe na de ni 'dod pa yin no //
translated: If you say that the reality of things does not appear as the intrinsic identity of reality, that is accepted.

original: de ltar na chos med chos nyid med par nam mkha' rdo rje snang ste /
analyzed: de ltar na chos med chos nyid med par nam mkha' rdo rje snang ste /
translated: Thus, the diamond of space appears as the non-existence of things and the non-existence of reality,

original: rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid kyi rgyu mtshan rnams ni der nub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid kyi rgyu mtshan rnams ni der nub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the signs of the intrinsic and general identities are submerged therein.

original: de bas na gnyis kyis stong pa gsal ba tsam nyid 'ba' zhig dri ma med pa mtha' yas pa'i nam mkha' lta bur chos thams cad dang / rang gi lha'i sku la sogs pa rnams nam mkha' rdo rje la snang zhing de nyid lha rnams kyi yang de kho na nyid kyi mchog mthong ba yin no //
analyzed: de bas na gnyis kyis stong pa gsal ba tsam nyid 'ba' zhig dri ma med pa mtha' yas pa'i nam mkha' lta bur chos thams cad dang / rang gi lha'i sku la sogs pa rnams nam mkha' rdo rje la snang zhing de nyid lha rnams kyi yang de kho na nyid kyi mchog mthong ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, the mere clarity that is empty of duality, like stainless infinite space, is the supreme reality of all phenomena and of one’s own deity’s body, etc.

original: de nyid kyi phyir chos kyi sku yang sku gzhan dag dang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir chos kyi sku yang sku gzhan dag dang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yin no //
translated: For that very reason, the dharma body is the perfection of all other bodies and of all buddha qualities.

original: dang por byang chub kyi sems snang ba med pa la sems mnyam par 'jog pa ni rgyu'i @49b rtsa ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //🔽de nas lha'i sku la sogs par de nyid snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dang por byang chub kyi sems snang ba med pa la sems mnyam par 'jog pa ni rgyu'i @49b rtsa ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro // de nas lha'i sku la sogs par de nyid snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the first, the nonappearance of the mind of enlightenment, is the root cause.🔽Then, because of the appearance of that as the body of the deity, etc.

original: de nas de'i rang gi lus la sogs pa nyid yod na rang gi lus la sogs pa nyid du de ltar snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nas de'i rang gi lus la sogs pa nyid yod na rang gi lus la sogs pa nyid du de ltar snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Then, because of the appearance of that as one’s own body, etc., when one’s own body, etc. exist.

original: de nas de'i rang gi sems tsam nyid yod na rang gi sems nyid de ltar snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nas de'i rang gi sems tsam nyid yod na rang gi sems nyid de ltar snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Then, if there is just one’s own mind, it is one’s own mind that appears in that way.

original: de nas de'i gnyis su med pa'i stong pa nyid yod na /🔽de nyid ni de kho na nyid kyi mchog yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni nam mkha' rdo rje bsgoms pa yin te /
analyzed: de nas de'i gnyis su med pa'i stong pa nyid yod na / de nyid ni de kho na nyid kyi mchog yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni nam mkha' rdo rje bsgoms pa yin te /
translated: Then, if there is nondual emptiness,🔽that is the supreme reality. This is the meditation on the vajra of space.

original: 'di ni 'dir dngos grub kyi mchog la gdams pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni 'dir dngos grub kyi mchog la gdams pa yin no //
translated: This is the instruction here on the supreme spiritual power.

original: ngo mtshar du gyur pa ni sems la dmigs pa la'o //
analyzed: ngo mtshar du gyur pa ni sems la dmigs pa la'o //
translated: The wonder is in the focus on the mind.

original: rmad du gyur pa zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' rdo rje la'o //
analyzed: rmad du gyur pa zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' rdo rje la'o //
translated: The marvel is in the vajra of space.

original: rang gi sems kyi chos nyid la gnas nas zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rang gi sems kyi chos nyid la gnas nas zhes bya ba la /
translated: Dwelling in the reality of one’s own mind,

original: rang nyid kyi sems nyid yin pas na rang gi sems te /
analyzed: rang nyid kyi sems nyid yin pas na rang gi sems te /
translated: one’s own mind is one’s own mind.

original: chos thams cad sems tsam nyid du mthong ba'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad sems tsam nyid du mthong ba'o //
translated: It is seeing all phenomena as just the mind.

original: de rnams kyi chos nyid ni rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: de rnams kyi chos nyid ni rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do //
translated: The reality of those is emptiness, the general and specific characteristics.

original: de la gnas pa ni sems kyi ting nge 'dzin te /
analyzed: de la gnas pa ni sems kyi ting nge 'dzin te /
translated: Dwelling in that is the samādhi of the mind.

original: 'das ma thag pa'i nam mkha' rdo rje'i gdams ngag thob pa'o //
analyzed: 'das ma thag pa'i nam mkha' rdo rje'i gdams ngag thob pa'o //
translated: The immediately past is the instruction of Ākāśa-vajra.

original: des sems shing zhes bya ba ni mngon du byed pa'o //
analyzed: des sems shing zhes bya ba ni mngon du byed pa'o //
translated: “ Thinking” means actualizing.

original: cang mi smra bar zhes bya ba ni ngag gi rnam par rtog pa med par ro //
analyzed: cang mi smra bar zhes bya ba ni ngag gi rnam par rtog pa med par ro //
translated: “ Without speaking” means without verbal discursiveness.

original: 'dir dang por rmi lam rnam par dpyad pa'i snying po'i tshigs su bcad pa ni mdo yin la /
analyzed: 'dir dang por rmi lam rnam par dpyad pa'i snying po'i tshigs su bcad pa ni mdo yin la /
translated: Here, the first verse of the essence of the analysis of dreams is the sūtra.

original: de nas tshigs su bcad pa nyid kyis ni rgal ba yin zhing de nas rgyas pas ni gzhung btsugs pa yin la /
analyzed: de nas tshigs su bcad pa nyid kyis ni rgal ba yin zhing de nas rgyas pas ni gzhung btsugs pa yin la /
translated: Then, the verse itself is the commentary. Then, the extensive [explanation] is the establishment of the text.

original: de nas gdams ngag yin no zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'i don yin no //
analyzed: de nas gdams ngag yin no zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'i don yin no //
translated: Then, it is the instruction. This is the summarized meaning.

original: sems thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la sems kyang yin la thams cad kyi dam tshig kyang yin pas sems thams cad kyi dam tshig ste /
analyzed: sems thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la sems kyang yin la thams cad kyi dam tshig kyang yin pas sems thams cad kyi dam tshig ste /
translated: “ All minds” and so on. Since it is a mind and also the pledge of all, it is the pledge of all minds.

original: yid kyi ting nge 'dzin rnams so //
analyzed: yid kyi ting nge 'dzin rnams so //
translated: They are the mental meditative stabilizations.

original: de rnams kyi snying po ni stobs brtan par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi snying po ni stobs brtan par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Their essence is the stabilization of strength.

original: de'i rdo rje ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: de'i rdo rje ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: Its vajra is the sign.

original: de rnams 'byung ba ni skyes pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams 'byung ba ni skyes pa'o //
translated: The arising of those is birth.

original: don de gsal bar byed pas le'u la yang de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: don de gsal bar byed pas le'u la yang de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The chapter is named after that which clarifies that meaning.

original: don de nyid kyi phyir 'di ltar le'u 'di ni bsnyen pa'i le'u zhes dngos kyi ming yin par rigs kyi /
analyzed: don de nyid kyi phyir 'di ltar le'u 'di ni bsnyen pa'i le'u zhes dngos kyi ming yin par rigs kyi /
translated: For that very reason, it is reasonable that this chapter is called the chapter on the approach, which is the actual name.

original: bsgrub pa dang po bstan pas gtso bor gyur pas ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bsgrub pa dang po bstan pas gtso bor gyur pas ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not the first chapter on the means of achievement, which is the primary one.

original: gsang ba 'dus pa'i bshad sbyar snyam pa'i me tog ces bya ba las le'u bco lnga pa'o /
analyzed: gsang ba 'dus pa'i bshad sbyar snyam pa'i me tog ces bya ba las le'u bco lnga pa'o /
translated: This is the fifteenth chapter of the commentary on the Guhyasamaja Tantra called the Flower of the True Dharma.

original: // / bcu drug pa ni sgrub pa'i le'u yin pa de bas na 'dir slob dpon gyi las dang / dngos grub dang / brtul zhugs dang / sdom pa @50a * //
analyzed: // / bcu drug pa ni sgrub pa'i le'u yin pa de bas na 'dir slob dpon gyi las dang / dngos grub dang / brtul zhugs dang / sdom pa @50a * //
translated: The sixteenth chapter is the means of achievement chapter. Therefore, here the activities of the master, powers, conduct, and vows

original: rnams bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: rnams bstan par bya'o //
translated: should be taught.

original: de la bris pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid du ni dngos grub kyi sgrub pa dang / slob dpon gyi bya ba yin pa de bas na /
analyzed: de la bris pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid du ni dngos grub kyi sgrub pa dang / slob dpon gyi bya ba yin pa de bas na /
translated: In the drawn mandala itself, the means of achieving powers and the activities of the master are to be performed. Therefore,

original: dang po bri ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi skabs dbye ba'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: dang po bri ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi skabs dbye ba'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: in order to open the section on the drawn mandala, the Bhagavān declares “then” and so on.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs de rnams kyi dam tshig ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs de rnams kyi dam tshig ste /
translated: the commitments of the Ones-Thus-Gone.🔽The one who makes them understood is the one who teaches the four chapters of the tantra.🔽The four chapters are the four verses of supplication to the mandala.

original: go bar byed pa ni le'u bzhi pa las /
analyzed: go bar byed pa ni le'u bzhi pa las /
translated: The meaning of the four verses of supplication is as follows.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba // zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The first verse is the supplication to the mandala of the Ones-Thus-Gone.🔽The second verse is the supplication to the mandala of the Ones-Thus-Gone's Bodhisattvas.🔽The third verse is the supplication to the mandala of the Ones-Thus-Gone's Wrathful Ones.🔽The fourth verse is the supplication to the mandala of the Ones-Thus-Gone's Knowledge Goddesses.🔽The meaning of the four verses of supplication is as follows.

original: dkyil 'khor gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bzhi zhes bya ba'i don te //🔽des gsol ba btab nas so //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bzhi zhes bya ba'i don te // des gsol ba btab nas so //
translated: The first verse is the supplication to the mandala of the Ones-Thus-Gone.🔽The second verse is the supplication to the mandala of the Ones-Thus-Gone's Bodhisattvas.🔽The third verse is the supplication to the mandala of the Ones-Thus-Gone's Wrathful Ones.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin chen zhes pa la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin chen zhes pa la /
translated: The fourth verse is the supplication to the mandala of the Ones-Thus-Gone's Knowledge Goddesses.

original: dga' ba rgyas par byed pas na rin chen no //🔽nyon mongs pa zad par byed pas rdo rje ste /
analyzed: dga' ba rgyas par byed pas na rin chen no // nyon mongs pa zad par byed pas rdo rje ste /
translated: The meaning of the four verses of supplication is as follows.🔽The first verse is the supplication to the mandala of the Ones-Thus-Gone.🔽The second verse is the supplication to the mandala of the Ones-Thus-Gone's Bodhisattvas.🔽The third verse is the supplication to the mandala of the Ones-Thus-Gone's Wrathful Ones.

original: gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa'o //
translated: The fourth verse is the supplication to the mandala of the Ones-Thus-Gone's Knowledge Goddesses.🔽The meaning of the four verses of supplication is as follows.

original: de nyid mchod pa yin la de'i bkod pa ni gang dag gis nam mkha' khyab pa'i tshogs so //
analyzed: de nyid mchod pa yin la de'i bkod pa ni gang dag gis nam mkha' khyab pa'i tshogs so //
translated: The first verse is the supplication to the mandala of the Ones-Thus-Gone.🔽The second verse is the supplication to the mandala of the Ones-Thus-Gone's Bodhisattvas.🔽The third verse is the supplication to the mandala of the Ones-Thus-Gone's Wrathful Ones.

original: rdo rje thams cad ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad do //
analyzed: rdo rje thams cad ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad do //
translated: The fourth verse is the supplication to the mandala of the Ones-Thus-Gone's Knowledge Goddesses.🔽The meaning of the four verses of supplication is as follows.🔽The first verse is the supplication to the

original: de rnams kyi dkyil 'khor de nyid seng ge'i rgyal po dang 'dra bas na /
analyzed: de rnams kyi dkyil 'khor de nyid seng ge'i rgyal po dang 'dra bas na /
translated: Since that maṇḍala of those is like the king of lions,

original: seng ge'i dam tshig gi rgyal po'o //
analyzed: seng ge'i dam tshig gi rgyal po'o //
translated: it is the king of the commitments of the lion.

original: de'i so sor spros pa de so so'i mtshan ma'i rnam par bsdus pas ni ji lta ba bzhin du bkod pa ni bkod pa'o /
analyzed: de'i so sor spros pa de so so'i mtshan ma'i rnam par bsdus pas ni ji lta ba bzhin du bkod pa ni bkod pa'o /
translated: Since the emanations of those are subsumed in the aspects of their individual signs, the array is just so.

original: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The samādhi that focuses on that is called that.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdo rje'i sku ni rtag pa'i sku ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdo rje'i sku ni rtag pa'i sku ste /
translated: The vajra body of all buddhas is the body of permanence,

original: rnam par snang mdzad yin la /
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad yin la /
translated: which is Vairocana.

original: de'i dkyil 'khor ni gsang ba 'dus pa rten dang bcas pa bris pa'i sku'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: de'i dkyil 'khor ni gsang ba 'dus pa rten dang bcas pa bris pa'i sku'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: His maṇḍala is the painted body maṇḍala of the Guhyasamāja together with its support.

original: mchog ces bya ba ni sku rdo rje de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mchog ces bya ba ni sku rdo rje de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Supreme means that since that vajra body is that of all tathāgatas,

original: thugs kyi rdo rje de ni rdo rje 'chang gis sprul pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: thugs kyi rdo rje de ni rdo rje 'chang gis sprul pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: that vajra mind is the emanation of the maṇḍala of the samādhi of Vajradhara.

original: de dang 'dra ba ni de dang mtshungs pa'o //
analyzed: de dang 'dra ba ni de dang mtshungs pa'o //
translated: Similar to that means like that.

original: dkyil 'khor rnams ni kun gyi zhes bya ba gsang ba gsum po 'dus pa ste /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor rnams ni kun gyi zhes bya ba gsang ba gsum po 'dus pa ste /
translated: The mandala of all is the assembly of the three secrets.

original: de la lha mo rnams ni gsung gi gsang ba'o //
analyzed: de la lha mo rnams ni gsung gi gsang ba'o //
translated: Among them, the goddesses are the secret of speech,

original: khro bo rnams ni thugs kyi gsang ba'o //
analyzed: khro bo rnams ni thugs kyi gsang ba'o //
translated: the wrathful ones are the secret of mind,

original: lhag ma rnams ni sku'i gsang ba'o //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams ni sku'i gsang ba'o //
translated: and the rest are the secret of body.

original: mchog ces bya ba ni gsang ba de rnams de bzhin gshegs pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mchog ces bya ba ni gsang ba de rnams de bzhin gshegs pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The supreme is that very secret, because it is the Tathagata himself.

original: khru ni bcu drug ces bya ba ni logs re re zhing khru bzhi'am khru bcu drug pa nyid do //
analyzed: khru ni bcu drug ces bya ba ni logs re re zhing khru bzhi'am khru bcu drug pa nyid do //
translated: Sixteen cubits means that each side is four cubits, or sixteen cubits.

original: 'di ni sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshad yin no //🔽dbang bskur ba @50b la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ni logs re re zhing khru gang nas brtsams te /
analyzed: 'di ni sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshad yin no // dbang bskur ba @50b la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ni logs re re zhing khru gang nas brtsams te /
translated: This is the measure of the mandala for practice.🔽The mandala for the consecration, etc. ,

original: khru stong gi bar yin no //
analyzed: khru stong gi bar yin no //
translated: is one cubit on each side, and so on up to one thousand cubits.

original: sku yi rdo rje rab tu gnas //
analyzed: sku yi rdo rje rab tu gnas //
translated: The body vajra is the consecration of the image, etc.

original: zhes bya ba ni de'i bdag po can zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de'i bdag po can zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The well-placed means that it is the lord of that.

original: 'khor lo ni bri bar bya zhes bya ba ni de'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyed kyi tshad tam rdo rje'i thig btab nas ka ba brgyad kyis mdzes par byas pa'i re'u cha brgyad pa nang gi dkyil 'khor zlum po'o //🔽rdo rje'i cho ga zhes bya ba ni thig gdab pa la sogs pa nas dbang bskur ba'i mthar thug pa'i bar du sbyar bar bya ste /
analyzed: 'khor lo ni bri bar bya zhes bya ba ni de'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyed kyi tshad tam rdo rje'i thig btab nas ka ba brgyad kyis mdzes par byas pa'i re'u cha brgyad pa nang gi dkyil 'khor zlum po'o // rdo rje'i cho ga zhes bya ba ni thig gdab pa la sogs pa nas dbang bskur ba'i mthar thug pa'i bar du sbyar bar bya ste /
translated: The wheel should be drawn means that its mandala is half the size of the mandala of the wheel of syllables, and having laid down the vajra lines, it is an inner mandala circle with eight chambers beautified by eight pillars.

original: de kho na nyid bsdus pa dang / dpal mchog dang po la sogs pa'i rgyud gzhan dag las spyir gsungs pa'i bya ba 'gal ba med pa can 'dir yang bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir cho ga'o //
analyzed: de kho na nyid bsdus pa dang / dpal mchog dang po la sogs pa'i rgyud gzhan dag las spyir gsungs pa'i bya ba 'gal ba med pa can 'dir yang bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir cho ga'o //
translated: The vajra rite means that from the laying out of the lines up to the conferral of initiation, one should apply the rite as taught in the Compendium of Principles, the Shriparamådya Tantra, and so forth, since it is not contradictory to do so here.

original: gsang ba 'dus pa khyad par du gsungs pa ni 'gal ba nyid yin pa'i phyir rdo rje ste /
analyzed: gsang ba 'dus pa khyad par du gsungs pa ni 'gal ba nyid yin pa'i phyir rdo rje ste /
translated: The vajra is that which is taught in the Guhyasamaja Tantra, since it is contradictory to do otherwise.

original: cho ga dang lhan cig pa'i rdo rje ni rdo rje'i cho ga'o //
analyzed: cho ga dang lhan cig pa'i rdo rje ni rdo rje'i cho ga'o //
translated: The vajra together with the rite is the vajra rite.

original: des thig gdab cing bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: des thig gdab cing bri bar bya'o //
translated: By that one should lay out the lines and draw the mandala.

original: de bzhin du ji srid dbang bskur ba dang / sngags dang ting nge 'dzin sbyin pa'i bar du rdo rje cho ga yis zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du ji srid dbang bskur ba dang / sngags dang ting nge 'dzin sbyin pa'i bar du rdo rje cho ga yis zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: Likewise, up to the consecration, the bestowal of the mantra and meditative concentration, one should apply “by means of the vajra rite.”

original: de ma lus par yang dkyil 'khor gyi cho gar blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: de ma lus par yang dkyil 'khor gyi cho gar blta bar bya'o //
translated: And all of that should be seen in the maṇḍala rite.

original: phyag rgya ni mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya ni mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: The seal is the symbolic seal.

original: de nyid ni rdo rje'i gnas te /
analyzed: de nyid ni rdo rje'i gnas te /
translated: That itself is the vajra site,

original: sngags rnams kyi de kho na nyid dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: sngags rnams kyi de kho na nyid dgod par bya'o //
translated: where the reality of the mantras should be set forth.

original: ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
analyzed: ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
translated: What is it like?

original: gsang ba'i mchog ste /
analyzed: gsang ba'i mchog ste /
translated: It is the supreme secret.

original: mchog ni dam tshig go //
analyzed: mchog ni dam tshig go //
translated: The supreme is the commitment.

original: yang na mchog ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa gzugs so //
analyzed: yang na mchog ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa gzugs so //
translated: Or else, the supreme is the form of the great seal, etc.

original: gsang ba ni bstan par bya ba ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: gsang ba ni bstan par bya ba ma yin pa ste /
translated: The secret is not to be revealed,

original: bri bar bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bri bar bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: meaning that it is not to be written.

original: rnam par snang mdzad gnas ni 'od zer dang bcas pa'i 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad gnas ni 'od zer dang bcas pa'i 'khor lo'o //
translated: The site of Vairocana is the wheel with light-rays.

original: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni de'i ngos kyi re'u cha rnams la ste /
analyzed: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni de'i ngos kyi re'u cha rnams la ste /
translated: Akṣobhya, etc. are in the squares of the cardinal directions.

original: 'od zer dang bcas pa'i rdo rje dang nor bu dang padma dang ral gri'o //
analyzed: 'od zer dang bcas pa'i rdo rje dang nor bu dang padma dang ral gri'o //
translated: The vajra, jewel, lotus, and sword are with light rays.

original: sku gsung thugs rdo rje mchog rnams grva kun du zhes bya ba ni sku'i mchog dang gsung gi mchog dang / rdo rje thugs kyi mchog dang rdo rje'i mchog rnams ni go rims bzhin du spyan dang m'a ma k'i dang / gos dkar mo dang /🔽sgrol ma yin te /
analyzed: sku gsung thugs rdo rje mchog rnams grva kun du zhes bya ba ni sku'i mchog dang gsung gi mchog dang / rdo rje thugs kyi mchog dang rdo rje'i mchog rnams ni go rims bzhin du spyan dang m'a ma k'i dang / gos dkar mo dang / sgrol ma yin te /
translated: The supreme vajra body, speech, and mind are in all the corners, that is, the supreme body, supreme speech, supreme vajra mind, and supreme vajra are Locanā, Māmakī, Pāṇḍaravāsinī, and Tārā, respectively.🔽Those are, respectively, to be placed in the northeast, etc.,

original: de rnams ni go rims bzhin du nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi me la sogs pa'i mtshams dag la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams ni go rims bzhin du nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi me la sogs pa'i mtshams dag la dgod par bya'o //
translated: in the inner mandala, in the southeast, etc., corners.

original: khro bo rnams ni zhes bya ba ni gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: khro bo rnams ni zhes bya ba ni gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'o //
translated: The wrathful ones are Yamāntaka, etc.

original: lha mo rnams ni mang po'i tshig dang sogs zhes bsdus par 'gyur te /
analyzed: lha mo rnams ni mang po'i tshig dang sogs zhes bsdus par 'gyur te /
translated: The goddesses are the many words, and so on, which includes the six offering goddesses.

original: des @51a * //
analyzed: des @51a * //
translated: By that,

original: na mchod pa'i lha mo drug gzung ste /
analyzed: na mchod pa'i lha mo drug gzung ste /
translated: the six offering goddesses are taken.

original: bzhi ni phyi'i grva bzhir ro //
analyzed: bzhi ni phyi'i grva bzhir ro //
translated: Four are in the four outer corners.

original: dbang ldan dang me mtshams gnyis su ni /
analyzed: dbang ldan dang me mtshams gnyis su ni /
translated: In the northeast and southeast,

original: reg bya dang chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje ma dag rim bzhin no zhes kun dga' snying po'i zhal snga nas gsungs so //
analyzed: reg bya dang chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje ma dag rim bzhin no zhes kun dga' snying po'i zhal snga nas gsungs so //
translated: The two goddesses of touch and the realm of reality are in the two corners of the main door, respectively.

original: 'di gnyis rtsa ba'i sgo'i ngos gnyis su ste /
analyzed: 'di gnyis rtsa ba'i sgo'i ngos gnyis su ste /
translated: These two are in the two corners of the main door.

original: de dag grva dang nye bas grva zhes bya'o zhes ye shes zhabs kyi'o //🔽sgo'i ngos rnams kyang grva yin pas phyi rim gyi grva bcu gnyis su skye mched bcu gnyis te /
analyzed: de dag grva dang nye bas grva zhes bya'o zhes ye shes zhabs kyi'o // sgo'i ngos rnams kyang grva yin pas phyi rim gyi grva bcu gnyis su skye mched bcu gnyis te /
translated: The two corners of the main door are called the “near corners.”

original: gleng gzhi'i gzhung dang dkyil 'khor chen po'i bstod pa las de dag smos pa'i phyir ro zhes gzhan dag 'dod do //
analyzed: gleng gzhi'i gzhung dang dkyil 'khor chen po'i bstod pa las de dag smos pa'i phyir ro zhes gzhan dag 'dod do //
translated: Others assert that since the sides of the door are also corners, the twelve sense bases are in the twelve outer corners, because they are mentioned in the nidana section and in the praise of the great mandala.

original: de la rgyal mo rnams kyi spyan dang / rdo rje dang / padma dang / autpala sngon po'o //
analyzed: de la rgyal mo rnams kyi spyan dang / rdo rje dang / padma dang / autpala sngon po'o //
translated: The goddesses of the directions have eyes, vajras, lotuses, and blue lotuses.

original: mchod pa rnams kyi ni /
analyzed: mchod pa rnams kyi ni /
translated: The goddesses of offering have

original: me long dang / pi wang dang / dri'i dung dang / ro'i snod dang / gos sna tshogs dang / chos 'byung ba zhes bya ba bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: me long dang / pi wang dang / dri'i dung dang / ro'i snod dang / gos sna tshogs dang / chos 'byung ba zhes bya ba bri bar bya'o //
translated: mirrors, flutes, perfume conch shells, food plates, various garments, and Dharma sources.

original: sa'i snying po la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: sa'i snying po la sogs pa ni /
translated: The goddesses of the near corners are Kshitigarbha and so on.

original: 'khor lo dang / rdo rje sngon po dang / nor bu dang / padma dang / ral gri dang / rdo rje bzang po rnams so //
analyzed: 'khor lo dang / rdo rje sngon po dang / nor bu dang / padma dang / ral gri dang / rdo rje bzang po rnams so //
translated: wheel, blue vajra, jewel, lotus, sword, and excellent vajra.

original: khro bo rnams kyi 'bar ba dang bcas pa'i tho ba dang / dbyig pa dang / padma dang / rdo rje kha gyes pa'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: khro bo rnams kyi 'bar ba dang bcas pa'i tho ba dang / dbyig pa dang / padma dang / rdo rje kha gyes pa'i rnam pa'o //
translated: The wrathful ones have a hammer with flame, a club, a lotus, and a vajra in the form of a cross.

original: rdo rje gsang ba rab bsgoms pas //
analyzed: rdo rje gsang ba rab bsgoms pas //
translated: By meditating on the secret vajra,

original: zhes bya ba ni padma dang rdo rje las byung ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni padma dang rdo rje las byung ba'o //
translated: means that which arises from the lotus and vajra.

original: gsung rdo rje thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi gsang ba gsum mo //
analyzed: gsung rdo rje thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi gsang ba gsum mo //
translated: The three secrets are the essence of all vajra speech.

original: de spros pa ni sprin te /
analyzed: de spros pa ni sprin te /
translated: The cloud is the emanation of that.

original: so sor spros pa'i sprin no //
analyzed: so sor spros pa'i sprin no //
translated: The cloud of individual emanation.

original: de rnams kyi bkod pa ni re re zhing mtshan ma'i rnam par bsdus nas gnas ji lta ba bzhin du dgod pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi bkod pa ni re re zhing mtshan ma'i rnam par bsdus nas gnas ji lta ba bzhin du dgod pa'o //
translated: The array of those is the placement in the proper place, each included in the form of a sign.

original: lhag ma rnams ni snga ma'i rjes su 'brangs nas shes par bya'o //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams ni snga ma'i rjes su 'brangs nas shes par bya'o //
translated: The rest should be understood by following the previous.

original: rdo rje'i bsgoms pas zhes bya ba ni bsgom par bya ba'i don bstan par bsgoms pas so //
analyzed: rdo rje'i bsgoms pas zhes bya ba ni bsgom par bya ba'i don bstan par bsgoms pas so //
translated: By meditating on the vajra means that the meaning of meditation is taught by meditation.

original: rdo rje chos ni 'od dpag tu med pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje chos ni 'od dpag tu med pa ste /
translated: Vajra Dharma is Amitābha.

original: 'di la rgyal po chen po de mnga' bas na de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di la rgyal po chen po de mnga' bas na de skad ces bya'o //
translated: Since he is the lord of that, he is so called.

original: rig pa'i dbang po ni 'od dpag tu med pa ste /
analyzed: rig pa'i dbang po ni 'od dpag tu med pa ste /
translated: The lord of knowledge is Amitābha.

original: de'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir rig pa'i dbang po'o //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir rig pa'i dbang po'o //
translated: Since he is the essence of that, he is the lord of knowledge.

original: 'od dpag tu med pa de nyid kyi rang gi sku dang rang gi dkyil 'khor gang yin pa de dag ni gnas te bzhi'o //
analyzed: 'od dpag tu med pa de nyid kyi rang gi sku dang rang gi dkyil 'khor gang yin pa de dag ni gnas te bzhi'o //
translated: Those are the four abodes, which are his own body and his own maṇḍala of that very Amitābha.

original: gsung gi rdo rje ni 'od dpag tu med pa ste //
analyzed: gsung gi rdo rje ni 'od dpag tu med pa ste //
translated: Vajra Speech is Amitābha.

original: de'i yon tan de rnams skyed par mdzad pa ste /
analyzed: de'i yon tan de rnams skyed par mdzad pa ste /
translated: He is the one who generates those qualities of him.

original: mthong ba dang 'jug pa la sogs pas de'i sa bon btab pa dang gsol ba gdab pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mthong ba dang 'jug pa la sogs pas de'i sa bon btab pa dang gsol ba gdab pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because he plants the seed of that by seeing, entering, and so on, and because he supplicates.

original: dbab par bya zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor sar pa bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: dbab par bya zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor sar pa bri bar bya'o //
translated: “One should cause to descend” means one should draw the new maṇḍala.

original: 'khor lo chen po ni dbus ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: 'khor lo chen po ni dbus ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The great wheel is the central maṇḍala.

original: @51b phyag rgya thams cad ni thams cad kyi mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: @51b phyag rgya thams cad ni thams cad kyi mtshan ma'o //
translated: All seals are the signs of all.

original: phyag rgya chen po ni mtshan ma chen po'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po ni mtshan ma chen po'o //
translated: The great seal is the great sign.

original: de nyid du zhes bya ba ni le'u bzhi pa las gsungs pa gang yin pa de nyid du'o //
analyzed: de nyid du zhes bya ba ni le'u bzhi pa las gsungs pa gang yin pa de nyid du'o //
translated: In that very place means in that very place where it was taught in the fourth chapter.

original: rdo rje'i gnas ni mtshan ma dgod pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje'i gnas ni mtshan ma dgod pa'o //
translated: The vajra-site is the placement of the signs.

original: kun nas sprin ni dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor spros pa'o //
analyzed: kun nas sprin ni dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor spros pa'o //
translated: The cloud of all is the emanation of the maṇḍala of all the lords of the maṇḍala.

original: de rnams kyi tshogs ni rang gi mtshan ma'i rnam pa ji lta ba bsdus nas gnas ji lta ba bzhin du dgod pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi tshogs ni rang gi mtshan ma'i rnam pa ji lta ba bsdus nas gnas ji lta ba bzhin du dgod pa'o //
translated: The gathering of those is the placement in their respective places, having gathered them in the form of their respective signs.

original: brtan pa nyid kyi phyir rdo rje'o //
analyzed: brtan pa nyid kyi phyir rdo rje'o //
translated: It is a vajra because it is firm.

original: de la dmigs pa nyid kyi phyir de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de la dmigs pa nyid kyi phyir de skad ces bya'o //
translated: It is so-called because it is the very object of that.

original: rab tu gsangs ba'i dkyil 'khor ni dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid do //
analyzed: rab tu gsangs ba'i dkyil 'khor ni dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid do //
translated: The extremely secret maṇḍala is the reality of the maṇḍala.

original: de ji ltar na mchog tu gsang ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: de ji ltar na mchog tu gsang ba yin zhe na /
translated: How is it supremely secret?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i tshul du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang 'dir bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i tshul du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang 'dir bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the lords of the maṇḍala, the lords of all tathāgatas, generate the bodhisattvas here.

original: de yang rdo rje 'dzin zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dkyil 'khor yang lha'i dkyil 'khor yin la /
analyzed: de yang rdo rje 'dzin zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dkyil 'khor yang lha'i dkyil 'khor yin la /
translated: Moreover, in “the abode of the maṇḍala of the Vajra Holder,” the maṇḍala is the maṇḍala of deities.

original: gnas kyang de'i rten gyi 'khor lo yin pas na dkyil 'khor gyi gnas so //
analyzed: gnas kyang de'i rten gyi 'khor lo yin pas na dkyil 'khor gyi gnas so //
translated: And since the abode is the wheel that is the support of that, it is the abode of the maṇḍala.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba las byung ste /
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba las byung ste /
translated: It arises from the secret of body, speech, and mind.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba gsum las skyes shing gsum gyis yang dag par bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba gsum las skyes shing gsum gyis yang dag par bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It means that it arises from the three secrets of the tathāgatas and is subsumed by the three.

original: rten gyi dkyil 'khor yang sku'i gsang bas bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rten gyi dkyil 'khor yang sku'i gsang bas bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Also, the supported maṇḍala is subsumed by the secret of body.

original: 'di 'dra ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su de 'gyur ba ni bdag por 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: 'di 'dra ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su de 'gyur ba ni bdag por 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: In such a maṇḍala abode, one becomes the lord.

original: gang yin pa'i gzugs te /
analyzed: gang yin pa'i gzugs te /
translated: What is the form?

original: mtshan ma de'i dbus su legs bris pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan ma de'i dbus su legs bris pa'o //
translated: It is well drawn in the center of that sign.

original: rdo rje 'dzin mchog ji lta bu zhig ce na /
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin mchog ji lta bu zhig ce na /
translated: What is the supreme Vajra Holder like?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i bdag po nyid yin pa'i phyir rdo rje 'dzin pa yang de yin la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i bdag po nyid yin pa'i phyir rdo rje 'dzin pa yang de yin la /
translated: Since he is the lord of the secret of all tathāgatas, he is the Vajra Holder.

original: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nang nas gang yang rung ba nyid yin pa'i phyir mchog kyang yin pa de ltar na rdo rje 'dzin mchog ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nang nas gang yang rung ba nyid yin pa'i phyir mchog kyang yin pa de ltar na rdo rje 'dzin mchog ste /
translated: And since they are any of the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas, they are also supreme. Thus, they are the supreme Vajra-holders.

original: rin po che dang / don yod pa dang / sems dpa' dang / 'jam pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag tu 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rin po che dang / don yod pa dang / sems dpa' dang / 'jam pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag tu 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that they are the mandalas of Ratnasaṃbhava, Amoghasiddhi, Bodhisattva, Mañjuvajra, and so forth.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang kun nas bzang ba'i gzugs can yin te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang kun nas bzang ba'i gzugs can yin te /
translated: Those Buddhas, the Blessed Ones, and the Bodhisattvas are all of a good form.

original: skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khro bo la sogs pa'i dbye bas sna tshogs par ston pa yin pa la 'dir the tshom mi bya'o //🔽mu stegs pa'i lha rnams kyang rgyud 'dir dkyil @52a * //
analyzed: skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khro bo la sogs pa'i dbye bas sna tshogs par ston pa yin pa la 'dir the tshom mi bya'o // mu stegs pa'i lha rnams kyang rgyud 'dir dkyil @52a * //
translated: They are taught to be various by the divisions of male, female, wrathful, and so forth. Here, one should not doubt.

original: 'khor gyi bdag po ma yin zhing dkyil 'khor pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: 'khor gyi bdag po ma yin zhing dkyil 'khor pa yang ma yin te /
translated: The non-Buddhist gods are not the lords of the mandala in this Tantra, nor are they the members of the mandala.

original: tshigs su bcad pa ni rdo rje 'dzin mchog gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba 'dis ni 'khor de dang 'khor lo'i dbang phyug sangs rgyas dang / de'i sras ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du gsungs /
analyzed: tshigs su bcad pa ni rdo rje 'dzin mchog gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba 'dis ni 'khor de dang 'khor lo'i dbang phyug sangs rgyas dang / de'i sras ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du gsungs /
translated: The verse the supreme vajra-holder and so on states that the retinue and the lord of the wheel, the Buddha, and his sons, taught as they wished.

original: sku la sogs pa'i rdo rje'i gnas ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: sku la sogs pa'i rdo rje'i gnas ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The vajra-sites of body and so on are the secret mandala.

original: de'i ye shes dang de'i gsang ba ni don dam pa'o //
analyzed: de'i ye shes dang de'i gsang ba ni don dam pa'o //
translated: Its gnosis and its secret are the ultimate.

original: dkyil 'khor thams cad 'byung ba ni thig gis bkod pa dang tshon dgye ba'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor thams cad 'byung ba ni thig gis bkod pa dang tshon dgye ba'o //
translated: The origin of all mandalas is the layout with lines and the application of colors.

original: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The samadhi focused on that is called that.

original: dkyil 'khor thams cad ni sku la sogs pa'i gsang ba rnams so //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor thams cad ni sku la sogs pa'i gsang ba rnams so //
translated: All mandalas are the secrets of body and so on.

original: de gsal bar byed pa'i yi ge gsum po la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de gsal bar byed pa'i yi ge gsum po la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The three syllables that illuminate them are called that.

original: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ni gsang ba gsum gyi dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ni gsang ba gsum gyi dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The vajra mandala is the mandala of the three secrets.

original: de'i sngags ni de shes par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i sngags ni de shes par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Its mantra is that which causes one to know it.

original: snying po'i tshig ni de kho na nyid ston par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snying po'i tshig ni de kho na nyid ston par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The word essence is because it teaches reality.

original: yi ge ni yi ge gcig nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yi ge ni yi ge gcig nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The letter is because it is just one letter.

original: gnas ni rjod par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnas ni rjod par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The place is because it is the expresser.

original: de bas na yi ge gsum po 'di dag gis dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab pa dang tshon dgye ba dag pa'o zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: de bas na yi ge gsum po 'di dag gis dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab pa dang tshon dgye ba dag pa'o zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: Therefore, it is the intention that these three letters are the purity of the layout and coloring of the maṇḍala.

original: thig gdab pa dang tshon dgye ba gang yin pa de dang de dag slob dpon rang nyid kyis rtag tu bya'am zhe na /
analyzed: thig gdab pa dang tshon dgye ba gang yin pa de dang de dag slob dpon rang nyid kyis rtag tu bya'am zhe na /
translated: Should the layout and coloring be done by the master himself at all times?

original: de'i phyir rdo rje'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir rdo rje'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said “vajra” and so on.

original: sngags ni rang gi lha nyid do //
analyzed: sngags ni rang gi lha nyid do //
translated: The mantra is one’s own deity.

original: sngon du bsnyen pas brtan par byas pa'i sems ni sems dpa'o //
analyzed: sngon du bsnyen pas brtan par byas pa'i sems ni sems dpa'o //
translated: The mind is the hero, which is the mind stabilized by prior service.

original: yun ring por rig pa'i brtul zhugs can nyid yin pa'i phyir sngags sgrub pa'i sems dpa' 'di la yod pas na sngags kyi sems dpa' ste /
analyzed: yun ring por rig pa'i brtul zhugs can nyid yin pa'i phyir sngags sgrub pa'i sems dpa' 'di la yod pas na sngags kyi sems dpa' ste /
translated: Since this mantra hero has long been the one with the awareness discipline, it is the mantra hero.

original: bsnyen pa mthar phyin pa dang rig pa'i brtul zhugs mthar phyin pa can gyi sgrub pa po la sngags kyi sems dpa' zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: bsnyen pa mthar phyin pa dang rig pa'i brtul zhugs mthar phyin pa can gyi sgrub pa po la sngags kyi sems dpa' zhes gsungs so //
translated: The adept who has completed the approach and the completion of the observances of awareness is called the hero of the mantra.

original: des thig gdab pa dang / tshon rtsi dgye ba rang nyid kyis mi bya'o //
analyzed: des thig gdab pa dang / tshon rtsi dgye ba rang nyid kyis mi bya'o //
translated: He should not himself lay out the maṇḍala or arrange the colors.

original: byas na byang chub rnyed par dka' //
analyzed: byas na byang chub rnyed par dka' //
translated: If he does, enlightenment is difficult to attain.

original: zhes bya ba ni rang nyid byed na /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rang nyid byed na /
translated: If he himself does it,

original: de'i byang chub ni thob par dka'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i byang chub ni thob par dka'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: his enlightenment is difficult to attain—this is the meaning.

original: gang gi phyir de lta yin pa ;
analyzed: gang gi phyir de lta yin pa ;
translated: Why is that so?

original: de bas dam tshig tshul shes pas //
analyzed: de bas dam tshig tshul shes pas //
translated: Therefore, one who knows the rules of the commitments

original: zhes bya ba ni dam tshig ni bshang ma thag pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dam tshig ni bshang ma thag pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the verse on the commitments is as follows.

original: tshul ni le'u bco lnga pa las gsungs pa'i lha dbab pa la sogs pa'i cho ga'o //
analyzed: tshul ni le'u bco lnga pa las gsungs pa'i lha dbab pa la sogs pa'i cho ga'o //
translated: The rules are the rite of the descent of the deity and so forth taught in the fifteenth chapter.

original: de dag shes pa yin pas na shes pa'o //
analyzed: de dag shes pa yin pas na shes pa'o //
translated: One who knows them is one who knows.

original: sngags kyi lha rnams zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sngags kyi lha rnams zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The mantra deities

original: rigs kyi tshig gcig pa @52b can no //
analyzed: rigs kyi tshig gcig pa @52b can no //
translated: are of the same class.

original: lo bcu gnyis lon pa'i khye'u dang bu mo dag lhag par gnas pa ci rigs par lha dang lha mo'i gzugs de dag la ye shes kyi lha gnyis dag phab nas te /
analyzed: lo bcu gnyis lon pa'i khye'u dang bu mo dag lhag par gnas pa ci rigs par lha dang lha mo'i gzugs de dag la ye shes kyi lha gnyis dag phab nas te /
translated: The boys and girls who are twelve years old, having been consecrated in the various suitable places, the two pristine-awareness deities are caused to descend into those forms of the gods and goddesses.

original: bcug nas so zhes bya ba'i dan to //
analyzed: bcug nas so zhes bya ba'i dan to //
translated: The meaning of “caused to enter” is the remainder.

original: byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas ni mig dang sku la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa'o //
analyzed: byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas ni mig dang sku la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa'o //
translated: The consecration-place is the consecration of the eyes, body, etc.

original: rnam par brtag pa ni de dag nyid 'dra ba ste /
analyzed: rnam par brtag pa ni de dag nyid 'dra ba ste /
translated: The investigation is the similarity of those very [eyes, etc.].

original: gzhug par bya'o zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
analyzed: gzhug par bya'o zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
translated: “Should be caused to enter” is the remainder.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rnams go rims bzhin du lha dbab par bya ba gnyis po go rims gang dang gang yin pa de ni rgyal chen zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rnams go rims bzhin du lha dbab par bya ba gnyis po go rims gang dang gang yin pa de ni rgyal chen zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: The two descents of the deities into the body, speech, and mind maṇḍalas, in that order, are stated by “the great king,” etc.

original: sku'i dkyil 'khor gnas zhes bya ba ni lha gnyis po de dag nyid de /
analyzed: sku'i dkyil 'khor gnas zhes bya ba ni lha gnyis po de dag nyid de /
translated: The “place of the body maṇḍala” is those two deities themselves.

original: go rims bzhin du sku'i dkyil 'khor dang de'i rten gyi dkyil 'khor ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: go rims bzhin du sku'i dkyil 'khor dang de'i rten gyi dkyil 'khor ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that they are the body maṇḍala and the maṇḍala of its support, respectively.

original: rang gi chos ma dang zhes bya ba ni rang gi btsun mo 'dod chags dga' ma dang lhan cig go //
analyzed: rang gi chos ma dang zhes bya ba ni rang gi btsun mo 'dod chags dga' ma dang lhan cig go //
translated: With his own Dharma wife means with his own queen, the one he delights in with passion.

original: gzhung la la las ni rang gi chos ma yin zhes 'byung ste /
analyzed: gzhung la la las ni rang gi chos ma yin zhes 'byung ste /
translated: In some texts, it says not his own Dharma wife,

original: de ni byed pa'i tshig med pa can yin no //
analyzed: de ni byed pa'i tshig med pa can yin no //
translated: but that is without the verbal root.

original: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni lha de dag gi snyoms par zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni lha de dag gi snyoms par zhugs pa'o //
translated: This refers to the meditative absorption of those deities.

original: sngags rnams thams cad kyi gsang ba zhes bya ba ni gsung gi dkyil 'khor rten dang bcas pa'i de kho na nyid do //
analyzed: sngags rnams thams cad kyi gsang ba zhes bya ba ni gsung gi dkyil 'khor rten dang bcas pa'i de kho na nyid do //
translated: The secret of all mantras refers to the reality of the speech mandala with its support.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' ni mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' ni mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: Vajrasattva is Akṣobhya.

original: rdo rje thams cad kyi zhes bya ba ni thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rten dang bcas pa'i'o //
analyzed: rdo rje thams cad kyi zhes bya ba ni thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rten dang bcas pa'i'o //
translated: All vajras refers to the reality of the mind mandala with its support.

original: snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis dbab pa byas pas cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis dbab pa byas pas cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What happens when the descent of meditative absorption is performed?

original: de ltar byas nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de ltar byas nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Having done that, and so forth is stated.

original: yid la dbang ba nyid ces bya ba ni lha drug go //
analyzed: yid la dbang ba nyid ces bya ba ni lha drug go //
translated: The state of mental mastery refers to the six deities.

original: gshegs te zhes bya ba ni mngon sum du bab pa'o //
analyzed: gshegs te zhes bya ba ni mngon sum du bab pa'o //
translated: Having gone means having descended in actuality.

original: gsang ba rnams kyi mchog ces bya ba ni sku la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: gsang ba rnams kyi mchog ces bya ba ni sku la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The supreme of secrets is the mandala of body, etc.

original: kyang gsungs so zhes bya ba ni bris pa'i dgos pa dang dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa dang sgrub pa'i mchod pa'o //🔽sngags kyi dngos grub kyis zhes bya ba bsgrub pa'i phyir grub pa ste /
analyzed: kyang gsungs so zhes bya ba ni bris pa'i dgos pa dang dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa dang sgrub pa'i mchod pa'o // sngags kyi dngos grub kyis zhes bya ba bsgrub pa'i phyir grub pa ste /
translated: Also means the purpose of drawing, the accomplishment of the mandala, and the worship of the accomplishment.

original: sngags kyi sems pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sngags kyi sems pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: By the power of the mantra means for the sake of the accomplishment of the mantra, i.e. for the sake of the mantra-mind.

original: rdo rje bri ba'i gsang ba ni rdo rje gsang ba ste /
analyzed: rdo rje bri ba'i gsang ba ni rdo rje gsang ba ste /
translated: The secret of drawing the vajra is the vajra secret.

original: sku rdo rje la sogs pa babs pas bris pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: sku rdo rje la sogs pa babs pas bris pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The mandala drawn by the descent of the vajra of body, etc.

original: rmad po che zhes bya ba ni de mthong na lha dang mi rnams kyi yid dga' bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: rmad po che zhes bya ba ni de mthong na lha dang mi rnams kyi yid dga' bar byed pa'o //
translated: The great wonder is that which delights the minds of gods and men when they see it.

original: khro bo'i rgyal po ste gnod mdzes rdo rjes so //
analyzed: khro bo'i rgyal po ste gnod mdzes rdo rjes so //
translated: The king of wrathful ones is Sumbha-Vajra.

original: mchod par bya zhes bya ba ni rang dang rang gi gnas su bkod la mig dang sku la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs pa dang dbang bskur bar byas nas @53a * //
analyzed: mchod par bya zhes bya ba ni rang dang rang gi gnas su bkod la mig dang sku la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs pa dang dbang bskur bar byas nas @53a * //
translated: Worship means to place each one in his own place, and to consecrate the eyes, body, etc. and confer initiation.

original: so ; / dam tshig gi mchod pa dus gsum pa ni thun mtshams su'o //
analyzed: so ; / dam tshig gi mchod pa dus gsum pa ni thun mtshams su'o //
translated: The pledge offerings of the three times are at the end of the sessions.

original: rdo rje dri med gsum dag gis ni rdo rje can te de ni dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'o //🔽rdo rje yi ni sbyor bas bya //
analyzed: rdo rje dri med gsum dag gis ni rdo rje can te de ni dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'o // rdo rje yi ni sbyor bas bya //
translated: The one who is “endowed with the three vajra-purities” is the vajri, the lord of the mandala.

original: zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor ba nyid kyis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor ba nyid kyis so //
translated: “By the vajra-yoga” means by the mandala itself.

original: kyang gsungs so zhes bya ba ni lha bshos rnams so //
analyzed: kyang gsungs so zhes bya ba ni lha bshos rnams so //
translated: “Also” refers to the sacrificial cakes.

original: sngags rnams zhes bya ba ni lha rnams so //
analyzed: sngags rnams zhes bya ba ni lha rnams so //
translated: “The mantras” are the deities.

original: bshang ba la sogs pa ni mi'i bdud rtsi lnga'o //
analyzed: bshang ba la sogs pa ni mi'i bdud rtsi lnga'o //
translated: “Excrement, etc.” are the five human nectars.

original: tshigs su bcad pa ni lnga pa'i khyad par gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: tshigs su bcad pa ni lnga pa'i khyad par gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The verse is a special statement about the fifth.

original: des de ltar sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor ji ltar bri ba de bzhin du gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: des de ltar sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor ji ltar bri ba de bzhin du gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Thus, it is said that the mandala should be drawn just as it is accomplished.

original: dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor yang ma grub tu zin kyang bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor yang ma grub tu zin kyang bri bar bya'o //
translated: Even if the pledge mandala is not accomplished, it should be drawn.

original: de'i phyir ma grub pa'i dbang du mdzad nas thig gdab pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir ma grub pa'i dbang du mdzad nas thig gdab pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, with reference to the non-accomplishment, it is said, “the layout, etc.”

original: de'i tshe sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ba'i phyir go rims bzhin du bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad dam yang na rdo rje 'od po che zhes bya ba 'od dpag tu med par bdag nyid bsgoms nas su'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ba'i phyir go rims bzhin du bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad dam yang na rdo rje 'od po che zhes bya ba 'od dpag tu med par bdag nyid bsgoms nas su'o //
translated: At that time, in order to draw the maṇḍala of body, speech, and mind, one should meditate on oneself as Vairocana or Amitābha, known as Mahāvairocana, respectively.

original: rdo rje mi 'chir grags slob ma //
analyzed: rdo rje mi 'chir grags slob ma //
translated: The disciple who is known as Vajra Amṛta.

original: zhes bya ba ni thig skud 'dzin par 'os pa'i slob ma bdud rtsi thab sbyor nyid du bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni thig skud 'dzin par 'os pa'i slob ma bdud rtsi thab sbyor nyid du bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should meditate on the disciple who is suitable to hold the thread of the maṇḍala as Amṛtakuṇḍali.

original: gzhan dag na re bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad dam /
analyzed: gzhan dag na re bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad dam /
translated: Others say that having meditated on oneself as Vairocana

original: dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po gzhan dag tu bsgoms nas /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po gzhan dag tu bsgoms nas /
translated: or another lord of the maṇḍala,

original: slob ma rdo rje sems dpa'am bdud rtsi thab sbyor 'od zer 'bar ba can bsgom par bya'o zhes zer ro //
analyzed: slob ma rdo rje sems dpa'am bdud rtsi thab sbyor 'od zer 'bar ba can bsgom par bya'o zhes zer ro //
translated: one should meditate on the disciple as Vajrasattva or Amṛtakuṇḍali, blazing with light.

original: las ni dkyil 'khor bri ba'o //
analyzed: las ni dkyil 'khor bri ba'o //
translated: The action is drawing the maṇḍala.

original: de la brtson pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: de la brtson pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: One who is diligent in that

original: sangs rgyas kun gyis nges bsten pa //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyis nges bsten pa //
translated: is definitely attended by all buddhas.

original: bsgom par bya ste de ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis goms par mdzad pa yin no zhes bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: bsgom par bya ste de ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis goms par mdzad pa yin no zhes bsam par bya'o //
translated: One should meditate on it, thinking that it is the practice of all the Buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rgyal chen zhes bya ba ni rgyal po chen po'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rgyal chen zhes bya ba ni rgyal po chen po'o //
translated: The great king is the great king.

original: rdo rje thig skud ni tshon gyi bye brag gis thig skud sangs rgyas dang kha dog mtshungs pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje thig skud ni tshon gyi bye brag gis thig skud sangs rgyas dang kha dog mtshungs pa'o //
translated: The vajra thread is a thread for the lines, the same color as the Buddha.

original: de dag chud par dgod pa ni sku'am ye shes kyi thig gi rnam par nang du chud par dgod pa ste bstim par bya'o //🔽thig skud kha dog lnga par so so so sor btsos la thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ba'i phyir lag pa g-yon pa'i mthil du sor mo'i rtse mo'i rtse mo nas brtsams te /
analyzed: de dag chud par dgod pa ni sku'am ye shes kyi thig gi rnam par nang du chud par dgod pa ste bstim par bya'o // thig skud kha dog lnga par so so so sor btsos la thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ba'i phyir lag pa g-yon pa'i mthil du sor mo'i rtse mo'i rtse mo nas brtsams te /
translated: One should place it, that is, dissolve it, inside the lines of body or gnosis.🔽 Having cooked the five-colored thread separately, one should place it, beginning from the tip of the finger on the palm of the left hand,

original: mthe bo'i rtsa ba'i bar du dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu dang nag po rim bzhin du dgod do //
analyzed: mthe bo'i rtsa ba'i bar du dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu dang nag po rim bzhin du dgod do //
translated: up to the base of the thumb, white, yellow, red, green, and black, respectively, for the sake of drawing the mind mandala.

original: sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi don du ni nag po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu dang dkar po rnams so //
analyzed: sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi don du ni nag po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu dang dkar po rnams so //
translated: For the body mandala, they are black, yellow, red, green, and white.

original: gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi don du ni dkar po dang ser po dang nag po dang ljang gu dang dmar po'o //
analyzed: gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi don du ni dkar po dang ser po dang nag po dang ljang gu dang dmar po'o //
translated: For the speech mandala, they are white, yellow, black, green, and red.

original: rin po che'i dkyil 'khor gyi don du ni dkar po dang @53b nag po dang dmar po dang ljang gu dang ser po'o /
analyzed: rin po che'i dkyil 'khor gyi don du ni dkar po dang @53b nag po dang dmar po dang ljang gu dang ser po'o /
translated: For the jewel mandala, they are white, black, red, green, and yellow.🔽For the Amoghasiddhi mandala, they are white, yellow, red, black, and green.

original: don yod par grub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi don du ni dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po dang nag po dang ljang gu rim bzhin du bzhag la de rnams la dus thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dang kha dog mthun pa'i sa bon bsams la
analyzed: don yod par grub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi don du ni dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po dang nag po dang ljang gu rim bzhin du bzhag la de rnams la dus thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dang kha dog mthun pa'i sa bon bsams la
translated: Always visualize the seed syllables of the five transcendent ones in the colors of the five transcendent ones.

original: / de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin can 'bar ba'i srad bu de bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: / de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin can 'bar ba'i srad bu de bsam par bya'o //
translated: Imagine that the blazing thread is the nature of the five transcendent ones.

original: de nas ye shes kyi thig cho ga bzhin du bkug la bcug ste cho ga bzhin du bsgril bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽rnam pa nyi shu rtsa lngar ni //
analyzed: de nas ye shes kyi thig cho ga bzhin du bkug la bcug ste cho ga bzhin du bsgril bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to // rnam pa nyi shu rtsa lngar ni //
translated: Then, the wisdom line should be summoned according to the rite, and having entered, it should be bound according to the rite.

original: tshon rtsi dag kyang rnam par bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: tshon rtsi dag kyang rnam par bsgom par bya'o //
translated: The meaning is that the colors should be contemplated in twenty-five aspects.

original: thig skud 'ba' zhig la ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni kyang gi sgra'i don to //
analyzed: thig skud 'ba' zhig la ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni kyang gi sgra'i don to //
translated: Not only the line, is the meaning of the word “also.”

original: rdul tshon kha dog lnga ba snod so sor bzhag la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sa bon gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang kha dog mthun pa'i rang bzhin can du byas nas 'bar ba'i lta bas sbyar te /
analyzed: rdul tshon kha dog lnga ba snod so sor bzhag la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sa bon gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang kha dog mthun pa'i rang bzhin can du byas nas 'bar ba'i lta bas sbyar te /
translated: The colored powders are placed in individual vessels, and having made them the nature of the same color as all the tathāgatas with the seed of all the tathāgatas, they are applied with the blazing gaze.

original: aom badzra tsi tra sa ma ya h'um zhes mngon par bsngags te /
analyzed: aom badzra tsi tra sa ma ya h'um zhes mngon par bsngags te /
translated: Om vajra citra samaya hum.

original: thugs dang sku dang gsung dang nor bu dang sna tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du ji ltar thig gdab pa bzhin du tshon gyi gzhi la panytsa re kh'a'i don du rdul tshon phyi rol nas brtsams pa'i rim gyis kun gyi nang du lnga pa bya ba'i tshul gyis dgye
analyzed: thugs dang sku dang gsung dang nor bu dang sna tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du ji ltar thig gdab pa bzhin du tshon gyi gzhi la panytsa re kh'a'i don du rdul tshon phyi rol nas brtsams pa'i rim gyis kun gyi nang du lnga pa bya ba'i tshul gyis dgye
translated: As for the way to lay out the colors, in the maṇḍalas of mind, body, speech, jewel, and variety, just as the lines are laid out, one should lay out the colors in the sense of the five-colored cloth, beginning from the outside, in the manner of the five inside all.

original: bar bya'o // 'dir tshigs su bcad pa ni /
analyzed: bar bya'o // 'dir tshigs su bcad pa ni /
translated: Here is a verse:

original: dkar dang ser dang dmar dang ljang //
analyzed: dkar dang ser dang dmar dang ljang //
translated: White, yellow, red, and green

original: nag po mi bskyod dkyil 'khor du'o //
analyzed: nag po mi bskyod dkyil 'khor du'o //
translated: are in the Akṣobhya maṇḍala.

original: nag dang ser dang dmar dang ljang //
analyzed: nag dang ser dang dmar dang ljang //
translated: Black, yellow, red, and green,

original: dkar po rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor du'o ;
analyzed: dkar po rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor du'o ;
translated: white is in the Cakravartin maṇḍala.

original: / dkar dang ser dang nag dang ljang //
analyzed: / dkar dang ser dang nag dang ljang //
translated: White, yellow, black, and green,

original: dmar po dpag med dkyil 'khor du'o /
analyzed: dmar po dpag med dkyil 'khor du'o /
translated: red is in the Amitābha maṇḍala.

original: dkar dang nag dang dmar dang ljang //
analyzed: dkar dang nag dang dmar dang ljang //
translated: White, black, red, and green,

original: ser po nor bu'i dkyil 'khor du'o //
analyzed: ser po nor bu'i dkyil 'khor du'o //
translated: yellow is in the Ratna maṇḍala.

original: dkar dang ser dang dmar dang sngo //
analyzed: dkar dang ser dang dmar dang sngo //
translated: White, yellow, red, blue,

original: ljang dang sna tshogs dkyil 'khor du'o //
analyzed: ljang dang sna tshogs dkyil 'khor du'o //
translated: green, and variegated are in the maṇḍala of the variety.

original: thig dang rdul tshon dgye ba dag / phyi rim nang rim bzhin brtsam bya //
analyzed: thig dang rdul tshon dgye ba dag / phyi rim nang rim bzhin brtsam bya //
translated: The lines and colored powders should be applied, beginning from the outer circle and proceeding to the inner.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
translated: This is what is stated.

original: 'dir yang dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa snga ma dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: 'dir yang dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa snga ma dang 'dra'o //
translated: Here also, the accomplishment of the maṇḍala is the same as before.

original: de ltar dkyil 'khor chen po gsungs nas /
analyzed: de ltar dkyil 'khor chen po gsungs nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the great maṇḍala,

original: bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la sngags rnams zhes bya ba ni lha rnams so //
analyzed: bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la sngags rnams zhes bya ba ni lha rnams so //
translated: he teaches the concise maṇḍala, beginning with “this one” and so on. The “mantras” are the deities.

original: rdo rje ni rdo rjes mkhregs par gyur pa ste ci rigs par bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rdo rje ni rdo rjes mkhregs par gyur pa ste ci rigs par bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: “Vajra” means having the firmness of a vajra. The meaning of “concise” is as appropriate.

original: h'um ni bsgom par bya /
analyzed: h'um ni bsgom par bya /
translated: One should meditate on the hūṃ.

original: sku dang gsung dang dam tshig mchog / bsgom par bya zhes bya ba ni gang gi don du rtogs par bya ste /
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang dam tshig mchog / bsgom par bya zhes bya ba ni gang gi don du rtogs par bya ste /
translated: “One should meditate on the supreme body, speech, and commitment” means for what purpose one should realize.

original: yi ge h'um du brtag pa dang sku la sogs pa brtag par bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yi ge h'um du brtag pa dang sku la sogs pa brtag par bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that one should imagine the letter hūṃ and imagine the body and so on.

original: de la h'um ni mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: de la h'um ni mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: There, hūṃ is Akṣobhya.

original: sku ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
analyzed: sku ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
translated: Body is Vairocana.

original: gsung ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
analyzed: gsung ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
translated: Speech is Amitābha.

original: dam tshig ni don yod par grub pa'o //
analyzed: dam tshig ni don yod par grub pa'o //
translated: The pledge is Amoghasiddhi.

original: mchog ni rin chen 'byung @54a * //
analyzed: mchog ni rin chen 'byung @54a * //
translated: The supreme is Ratnasaṃbhava,

original: ldan te // nam mkha' thams cad nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ldan te // nam mkha' thams cad nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because he is all space itself.

original: gnas lnga dag tu zhes bya ba ni dbus su bdag po byas la de'i logs rnams su sangs rgyas bzhi dkyil 'khor chen po dang 'dra bar bya ba'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gnas lnga dag tu zhes bya ba ni dbus su bdag po byas la de'i logs rnams su sangs rgyas bzhi dkyil 'khor chen po dang 'dra bar bya ba'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: In the five places, means that having made the lord in the center, one should make the four buddhas in the directions, like in the great maṇḍala.

original: thams cad du bri ba'i dkyil 'khor la ji lta ba bzhin du bsam pa'i dkyil 'khor yang yin no //
analyzed: thams cad du bri ba'i dkyil 'khor la ji lta ba bzhin du bsam pa'i dkyil 'khor yang yin no //
translated: The maṇḍala of imagination is just like the maṇḍala to be drawn everywhere.

original: de ltar du byas na ni zhes bya ba ni ji ltar gsungs pa'i cho gas bri bar byas na'o //
analyzed: de ltar du byas na ni zhes bya ba ni ji ltar gsungs pa'i cho gas bri bar byas na'o //
translated: If one does it that way, means if one draws it with the rite as taught.

original: rdo rje gsum po ro gcig pa'i byang chub kyi sems ni rdo rje mi phyed gsum ste /
analyzed: rdo rje gsum po ro gcig pa'i byang chub kyi sems ni rdo rje mi phyed gsum ste /
translated: The vajra of the three vajras is the indivisible three vajras, and the bodhicitta is the three vajras.

original: de las skyes pa ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams zhes bya ba'i don te /
analyzed: de las skyes pa ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams zhes bya ba'i don te /
translated: The one born from that is the buddhas and bodhisattvas.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' nyid las so //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' nyid las so //
translated: The vajra being is the vajra being itself.

original: 'jigs shing zhes bya ba ni dam tshig las 'das pa'i 'jigs pa'o //
analyzed: 'jigs shing zhes bya ba ni dam tshig las 'das pa'i 'jigs pa'o //
translated: Terrified means terrified of transgressing the commitments.

original: des skrag pa ni rab tu 'dar ba'o //
analyzed: des skrag pa ni rab tu 'dar ba'o //
translated: Shaking means trembling.

original: gzhan dag na re gnas lnga dag tu zhes bya ba ni ji lta ba'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rnams su'o //
analyzed: gzhan dag na re gnas lnga dag tu zhes bya ba ni ji lta ba'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rnams su'o //
translated: Others say that the five places are the maṇḍalas of the families, as they are.

original: sngags rnams zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi lha rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: sngags rnams zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi lha rnams kyi'o //
translated: The mantras are those of the gnosis deities.

original: rdo rje h'um ni bsgom par bya ba ni gnod mdzes rgyal pos dgug par bsgom pa'o /
analyzed: rdo rje h'um ni bsgom par bya ba ni gnod mdzes rgyal pos dgug par bsgom pa'o /
translated: The vajra hūṃ is meditated upon as summoned by the king of the wrathful ones.

original: de nas sku dang gsung dang dam tshig mchog bsgom par bya ba ni sku la sogs pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
analyzed: de nas sku dang gsung dang dam tshig mchog bsgom par bya ba ni sku la sogs pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
translated: Then, the meditation on the supreme body, speech, and commitment is the consecration of the body, and so forth.

original: de ltar byas pas byin gyis rlob par byed ces zer ro //
analyzed: de ltar byas pas byin gyis rlob par byed ces zer ro //
translated: By doing that, one is consecrated, they say.

original: bum pa'i dgod pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir rdo rje bum pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /
analyzed: bum pa'i dgod pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir rdo rje bum pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /
translated: In order to teach the placement of the vases, [the Bhagavān] declares, the vajra vase, and so on.

original: sngags rgyud bdag pos zhes bya ba ni lha gang gi bum pa gang yin pa de'i sngags kyis de la bzlas pa'i phyir dang / rgyud sde 'bru lnga la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir dang / bdag po ste rang gi lha'i rang bzhin du bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sngags rgyud bdag pos zhes bya ba ni lha gang gi bum pa gang yin pa de'i sngags kyis de la bzlas pa'i phyir dang / rgyud sde 'bru lnga la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir dang / bdag po ste rang gi lha'i rang bzhin du bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The mantra-tantra lord is the mantra of whichever deity is in the vase, because it is recited in that, and because it is empowered by the five seed syllables of the tantra class, and because it is the lord, generated in the nature of one's own deity.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po gang yin pa de nyid ni rdo rje sems dpa' yin la /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po gang yin pa de nyid ni rdo rje sems dpa' yin la /
translated: The lord of the mandala is indeed Vajrasattva.

original: ting nge 'dzin gnas zhes bya ba ni de'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i slob dpon no //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gnas zhes bya ba ni de'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i slob dpon no //
translated: The one abiding in meditative concentration is the master who possesses the yoga of that [Vajrasattva].

original: ci zhig brtag par bya zhe na /
analyzed: ci zhig brtag par bya zhe na /
translated: What is to be imagined?

original: de nyid dgod pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid dgod pa'o //
translated: That itself is to be placed.

original: brten pa'i blos ni zhes bya ba ni ci rigs par bdag nyid dam bum pa la sogs pa la lha la sogs pa'i mos pa brtan pa'o //
analyzed: brten pa'i blos ni zhes bya ba ni ci rigs par bdag nyid dam bum pa la sogs pa la lha la sogs pa'i mos pa brtan pa'o //
translated: With a firm mind means with a firm conviction in the deity, etc., either in oneself or in the vase, etc., as is appropriate.

original: sbyin sreg gi cho ga bstan par bya ba'i phyir dngos grub ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: sbyin sreg gi cho ga bstan par bya ba'i phyir dngos grub ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In order to teach the rite of the fire sacrifice, [the Bhagavān] declares, success, etc.

original: 'dod pa'i zhes bya ba ni don du gnyer ba'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i zhes bya ba ni don du gnyer ba'o //
translated: The desired is the object of desire.

original: sngags shes pas ni zhes bya ba ni rgyud mang po shes pa ste /
analyzed: sngags shes pas ni zhes bya ba ni rgyud mang po shes pa ste /
translated: The knower of mantras is the knower of many tantras,

original: de nyid kyi cho ga lhag ma rnams bsgre ba shes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyi cho ga lhag ma rnams bsgre ba shes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because he knows how to apply the remaining ritual procedures of that [tantra].

original: bsreg bya khyad par can ni bshad gci zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: bsreg bya khyad par can ni bshad gci zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: The special burnt offering is feces and urine, etc.

original: rdo rje gang ba'i sbyin sreg ni dgang blugs so //
analyzed: rdo rje gang ba'i sbyin sreg ni dgang blugs so //
translated: The oblation of the vajra is the ladle.

original: rdo rje mi phyed gsum ni dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'o //
analyzed: rdo rje mi phyed gsum ni dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'o //
translated: The three vajra-indivisible is the lord of the maṇḍala.

original: 'khor lo de'i dkyil 'khor pa rnams so //
analyzed: 'khor lo de'i dkyil 'khor pa rnams so //
translated: The wheel is the maṇḍala of that [lord].

original: dbus su zhes bya ba @54b ni 'bar ba'i me thab kyi dbus su'o //
analyzed: dbus su zhes bya ba @54b ni 'bar ba'i me thab kyi dbus su'o //
translated: The middle is the middle of the blazing hearth.

original: rang gi lha'i gzugs zhes bya ba ni bdag tu mos par byas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i dkyil 'khor pa thams cad kyis yongs su bskor ba'o //
analyzed: rang gi lha'i gzugs zhes bya ba ni bdag tu mos par byas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i dkyil 'khor pa thams cad kyis yongs su bskor ba'o //
translated: The form of one's own deity is the lord of the maṇḍala, visualized as oneself, surrounded by the entire maṇḍala.

original: zhal du zhes bya ba ni de rnams kyi zhal te /
analyzed: zhal du zhes bya ba ni de rnams kyi zhal te /
translated: The mouth is the mouth of those [deities].

original: de'i sa bon gyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i ljags la'o //
analyzed: de'i sa bon gyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i ljags la'o //
translated: That is, on the tongue consecrated with the seed syllable of that [deity].

original: kyang gsungs zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'o //
analyzed: kyang gsungs zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'o //
translated: The etc. refers to the verses that will be explained.

original: dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis //
translated: By the union of the two organs,

original: zhes bya ba ni me la bzhugs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams snyoms par 'jug pa nyid du bsam pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni me la bzhugs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams snyoms par 'jug pa nyid du bsam pa'o //
translated: means that one should imagine the deities of the mandala residing in the fire to be in union.

original: brgya rtsa brgyad zhes bya ba ni nye bar mtshon pa tsam ste /
analyzed: brgya rtsa brgyad zhes bya ba ni nye bar mtshon pa tsam ste /
translated: The one hundred and eight is just an illustration;

original: lan 'ga' stong rtsa brgyad dam dpag tu med pa'o //
analyzed: lan 'ga' stong rtsa brgyad dam dpag tu med pa'o //
translated: it can be done once, or one thousand and eight times, or an unlimited number of times.

original: slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga bstan pa'i phyir rnam par snang mdzad kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga bstan pa'i phyir rnam par snang mdzad kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'o //
