translated: In order to teach the ritual for inducting the disciples, [the Bhagavān] declares Vairochana, etc.

original: slob ma zhes bya ba ni sngon du bya ba byas pa'i slob ma'o //
analyzed: slob ma zhes bya ba ni sngon du bya ba byas pa'i slob ma'o //
translated: The disciples are those who have performed the preliminary practices.

original: rnam snang mdzad kyi sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: rnam snang mdzad kyi sbyor ba yis //
translated: By the yoga of Vairochana,

original: zhes bya ba ni yi ge aom las rnam par snang mdzad du byas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni yi ge aom las rnam par snang mdzad du byas pa'o //
translated: means by having become Vairochana from the syllable Om.

original: rdo rje gsum las byung zhes bya ba ni sku la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs pas te /
analyzed: rdo rje gsum las byung zhes bya ba ni sku la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs pas te /
translated: The arisen from the three vajras is the consecration with the body, etc.

original: sku'i dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya'o zhes pa ni lhag ma'o //
analyzed: sku'i dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya'o zhes pa ni lhag ma'o //
translated: One should cause him to enter the mandala of the body is the remainder.

original: a'a: ni lus dang ngag sems la bsgoms nas zhes bya ba ni 'jug pa de la dbab par bya ba'i phyir de'i snying ga'i mtshan ma'i lte ba'i dbus su bde ba chen po'i sku mdog dmar po bsams la rdo rje de brdabs pa las byung ba'i dbyangs yig
analyzed: a'a: ni lus dang ngag sems la bsgoms nas zhes bya ba ni 'jug pa de la dbab par bya ba'i phyir de'i snying ga'i mtshan ma'i lte ba'i dbus su bde ba chen po'i sku mdog dmar po bsams la rdo rje de brdabs pa las byung ba'i dbyangs yig
translated: Having meditated on the body, speech, and mind with A:  in order to cause that entry to descend, one should imagine in the center of the navel of the sign at his heart a red body of great bliss, and with that vajra one should snap one's fingers.

original: tha ma kha dog dmar po dpag tu med pa spros pa'i tshul gyis de'i lus dang ngag dang sems thams cad la bsgoms nas so //
analyzed: tha ma kha dog dmar po dpag tu med pa spros pa'i tshul gyis de'i lus dang ngag dang sems thams cad la bsgoms nas so //
translated: From the sound of that vajra snapping, the last vowel, the red color, is emitted in the manner of emanation, and one should meditate on all of his body, speech, and mind.

original: ci zhig byed ce na /
analyzed: ci zhig byed ce na /
translated: What does one do?

original: de'i 'od zer rnams kyis de dag bsgyur bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
analyzed: de'i 'od zer rnams kyis de dag bsgyur bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
translated: One should transform them with its light rays is the remainder.

original: de las cir 'gyur zhe na /🔽rdo rjes gzung bar bya zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de las cir 'gyur zhe na / rdo rjes gzung bar bya zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: What is the result of that?🔽One should hold with the vajra is stated.

original: sku rdo rjes slob ma de byin gyis brlab par bya ste dbab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sku rdo rjes slob ma de byin gyis brlab par bya ste dbab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: One should consecrate that disciple with the vajra body, that is, one should cause him to descend.

original: de bzhin du thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa la yang dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i sbyor bas 'jug pa la dbab pa ni /🔽rgyal chen zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /
analyzed: de bzhin du thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa la yang dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i sbyor bas 'jug pa la dbab pa ni / rgyal chen zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /
translated: Likewise, in the mind mandala, etc., the entry by the yoga of the mandala lord is the descent.

original: rgyal chen ni 'od dpag tu med pa ste shin tu zhen pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyal chen ni 'od dpag tu med pa ste shin tu zhen pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The great king is Amitābha, because he is very attached.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' ni mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' ni mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: The vajra being is Akṣobhya.

original: sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig ni yi ge a'a: las ji skad du bshad pa'i khyad par bya'o //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig ni yi ge a'a: las ji skad du bshad pa'i khyad par bya'o //
translated: The pledge of body, speech, and mind is the syllable AḤ, which is to be modified as explained.

original: de la 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'jug pa'i phyir rdo rje dam tshig ni 'da' bar dka' ba'i sngags so //
analyzed: de la 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'jug pa'i phyir rdo rje dam tshig ni 'da' bar dka' ba'i sngags so //
translated: In that regard, the vajra pledge is the mantra that is difficult to transgress, because it is the entry, etc.

original: dam tshig thams cad ni lha thams cad do //🔽de @55a * //
analyzed: dam tshig thams cad ni lha thams cad do // de @55a * //
translated: All pledges are all deities.

original: rnams kyi lus dang ngag dang sems kyi dam tshig ni gsang ba gsum gyi dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: rnams kyi lus dang ngag dang sems kyi dam tshig ni gsang ba gsum gyi dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The pledge of their body, speech, and mind is the mandala of the three secrets.

original: de rnams kyi sngags kyi rdo rje ni mi phyed pa'i sngags so //
analyzed: de rnams kyi sngags kyi rdo rje ni mi phyed pa'i sngags so //
translated: The mantra vajra of those is the indivisible mantra.

original: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni yi ge lnga po 'di nyid do //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni yi ge lnga po 'di nyid do //
translated: This is the five syllables themselves.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i snying po rnams kyis thams cad bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i snying po rnams kyis thams cad bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because all are included in the quintessence of the five Tathagatas.

original: de bas na 'di nyid brjod pas dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug pa dang 'jug par byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bas na 'di nyid brjod pas dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug pa dang 'jug par byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, by merely reciting this, one enters into and causes entry into all mandalas.

original: zhugs pa ni slob ma la ci rigs par cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: zhugs pa ni slob ma la ci rigs par cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o //
translated: Having entered, one should bestow initiation upon the disciple, according to the rite and as appropriate.

original: 'dir tshigs su bcad pa ni /
analyzed: 'dir tshigs su bcad pa ni /
translated: Here is a verse:

original: phreng ba'i dbang bskur dang po ste //
analyzed: phreng ba'i dbang bskur dang po ste //
translated: The garland initiation is the first,

original: phreng gtor spyi bor bcing phyir ro //
analyzed: phreng gtor spyi bor bcing phyir ro //
translated: because the garland is bound on the head.🔽Water, crown, vajra,

original: chu dang cod pan rdo rje dang // bdag po dang ni ming dang gnyis //
analyzed: chu dang cod pan rdo rje dang // bdag po dang ni ming dang gnyis //
translated: lord, and the two names,

original: 'di drug rig pa'i dbang bskur yin //
analyzed: 'di drug rig pa'i dbang bskur yin //
translated: these six are the initiation of knowledge.

original: slob dpon zhes bya ba bdun pa ste //
analyzed: slob dpon zhes bya ba bdun pa ste //
translated: The seventh is called the master,

original: slob dpon zhes bya ba 'di rnam gsum //
analyzed: slob dpon zhes bya ba 'di rnam gsum //
translated: this master is threefold,

original: rdor gsang ye shes kyis bshad do //
analyzed: rdor gsang ye shes kyis bshad do //
translated: explained by the vajra, secret, and wisdom.

original: de la rig pa'i dbang bskur ba drug kyang rgyud gzhan dag dang 'dra ba nyid kyi phyir ma bshad do //
analyzed: de la rig pa'i dbang bskur ba drug kyang rgyud gzhan dag dang 'dra ba nyid kyi phyir ma bshad do //
translated: The six initiations of knowledge are not explained here because they are the same as in other tantras.

original: slob dpon gyi dbang bskur nyid kyang khyad par rnam pa gsum dang ldan pa'i phyir bshad par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: slob dpon gyi dbang bskur nyid kyang khyad par rnam pa gsum dang ldan pa'i phyir bshad par bya ba yin no //
translated: The initiation of the master is to be explained because it has three special aspects.

original: de nyid kyi bstan pa ni de la 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi bstan pa ni de la 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The teaching of that is stated with “Here, this is the great vajra initiation,” and so on.

original: rdo rje chen po'i dbang bskur ba dang gsang ba dang ye shes kyi gsang ba zhes bya ba zlas dbye ba'i tshig bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje chen po'i dbang bskur ba dang gsang ba dang ye shes kyi gsang ba zhes bya ba zlas dbye ba'i tshig bsdu ba'o //
translated: The compound “great vajra initiation, secret, and secret of wisdom” is a dvandva compound.🔽The great vajra initiation is to be explained just as it is taught.

original: ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba'i rigs pas rdo rje chen po bstan pa dang po nyid bshad pa ni kun gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /
analyzed: ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba'i rigs pas rdo rje chen po bstan pa dang po nyid bshad pa ni kun gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /
translated: The reasoning that it is to be explained is stated with “all” and so on.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyis zhes bya ba ni 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor nang du chud cing zhu ba'i dam tshig gi ye shes kyi chus gang ba'i rin po che'i bum pa phyag na bsnams pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyis zhes bya ba ni 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor nang du chud cing zhu ba'i dam tshig gi ye shes kyi chus gang ba'i rin po che'i bum pa phyag na bsnams pa rnams kyis so //
translated: All the Buddhas means those who hold in their hands the jeweled vase filled with the water of the gnosis of the pledge of melting, who are included in the mandala assembly.

original: sil snyan dri la sogs pa nyid dam tshig yin te /
analyzed: sil snyan dri la sogs pa nyid dam tshig yin te /
translated: The pledge is the cymbals, incense, and so forth.

original: dbang bskur ba'i yo byad 'di nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbang bskur ba'i yo byad 'di nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: They are the very articles of consecration.

original: de rnams kyi sprin tshogs ni nam mkha' khyab pa ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyi sprin tshogs ni nam mkha' khyab pa ste /
translated: Their cloud-assemblies pervade the sky.

original: chen po dang bcas pa'i rig pa'i tshogs rnams kyi phyag na bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: chen po dang bcas pa'i rig pa'i tshogs rnams kyi phyag na bsnams pa'o //
translated: They are held in the hands of the hosts of vidyas together with the great ones.

original: rdo rje sku gsum sngags kyis ni zhes bya ba ni yi ge gsum gyis so //
analyzed: rdo rje sku gsum sngags kyis ni zhes bya ba ni yi ge gsum gyis so //
translated: With the mantra of the three vajra-bodies means with the three syllables.

original: yungs kar zhes bya ba ni snying po'i sa bon gyi thig le las byung ba'i 'od zer rnams kyis so //
analyzed: yungs kar zhes bya ba ni snying po'i sa bon gyi thig le las byung ba'i 'od zer rnams kyis so //
translated: Mustard-seed means the light-rays that arise from the essence-seed-drop-bindu.

original: brdeg par bya zhes bya ba ni bskul bar bya'o //
analyzed: brdeg par bya zhes bya ba ni bskul bar bya'o //
translated: One should strike means one should incite.

original: yang na zhes bya ba ni phyogs gzhan no //
analyzed: yang na zhes bya ba ni phyogs gzhan no //
translated: Or else means another alternative.

original: sangs rgyas zhes @55b bya ba ni nam mkha'i ngos na bzhugs pa rnams so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhes @55b bya ba ni nam mkha'i ngos na bzhugs pa rnams so //
translated: The so-called Buddhas are those who dwell in the planes of the sky.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin brtan pos snyoms par 'jug pa yis so //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin brtan pos snyoms par 'jug pa yis so //
translated: By the concentration of Vajrasattva means by the concentration of firmness, by the yoga of union.

original: dam tshig mchog rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas de dag nyid kyi thugs ka'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyi sgo las byung ba'i rig pa'i rgyal mo rnams kyis so //
analyzed: dam tshig mchog rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas de dag nyid kyi thugs ka'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyi sgo las byung ba'i rig pa'i rgyal mo rnams kyis so //
translated: By the supreme commitments means by the knowledge queens who have come forth from the door of the light rays of the seed syllables in the hearts of those Buddhas.

original: gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i yo byad rnams ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i yo byad rnams ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The articles such as the Vajra Lady of Form are as before.

original: slob ma zhes bya ba ni slob dpon du dbang bskur bar 'os pa'o //
analyzed: slob ma zhes bya ba ni slob dpon du dbang bskur bar 'os pa'o //
translated: The disciple is one who is fit to be consecrated as a master.

original: rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i gzugs su'o //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i gzugs su'o //
translated: Vairochana means in the form of the lord of the mandala.

original: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can //
translated: The one who has the Vajra of Body, Speech, and Mind

original: zhes bya ba ni sku rdo rje la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sku rdo rje la sogs pa'o //
translated: means the Vajra of Body and so forth.

original: dgod par bya zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi spyi bo dang lkog ma dang snying ga rnams su'o /
analyzed: dgod par bya zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi spyi bo dang lkog ma dang snying ga rnams su'o /
translated: One should laugh means in the head, throat, and heart of that very one.

original: dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi gsang ba zhes bya ba ni dbang bskur ba gsum char yang rdzogs par byed pa'i de kho na nyid do //
analyzed: dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi gsang ba zhes bya ba ni dbang bskur ba gsum char yang rdzogs par byed pa'i de kho na nyid do //
translated: The secret of all initiations means the reality that perfects all three initiations.

original: de gang zhig yin zhe na /🔽slob dpon thams cad kyis rdo rje'i tshig tu smra bar bya zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de gang zhig yin zhe na / slob dpon thams cad kyis rdo rje'i tshig tu smra bar bya zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: What is that?🔽One should speak with the vajra speech of all masters.

original: slob dpon thams cad kyis rdo rje'i tshig gi tshigs su bcad pa'i tshul gyis dbang bskur ba'i skad cig la brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: slob dpon thams cad kyis rdo rje'i tshig gi tshigs su bcad pa'i tshul gyis dbang bskur ba'i skad cig la brjod par bya'o //
translated: One should speak with the vajra speech of all masters in the manner of a verse at the moment of initiation.

original: tshigs su bcad pa de nyid ni sangs rgyas rnams ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: tshigs su bcad pa de nyid ni sangs rgyas rnams ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: That very verse is stated with The buddhas, etc.

original: sgrib pa'i dri ma 'khrud pa'i phyir 'dis dbang bskur bar byed pas na dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: sgrib pa'i dri ma 'khrud pa'i phyir 'dis dbang bskur bar byed pas na dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: Because it cleanses the stains of obscuration, it is an initiation.

original: gang gi sgrib pa zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi sgrib pa zhe na /
translated: What is its obscuration?

original: phyir mi ldog pa nyid dang dngos grub thams cad kyi'o //
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa nyid dang dngos grub thams cad kyi'o //
translated: It is the obscuration of irreversibility and all powers.

original: rdo rje chen po zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems chen po'o //
analyzed: rdo rje chen po zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems chen po'o //
translated: The great vajra is the great spirit of enlightenment.

original: sbyin zhes bya ba la slob ma 'di la zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
analyzed: sbyin zhes bya ba la slob ma 'di la zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
translated: The word give is supplied.

original: de yang gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: de yang gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: sangs rgyas rnams ni thams cad kyi gsang pa gsum te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams ni thams cad kyi gsang pa gsum te /
translated: The secret of all the Buddhas is the three secrets.

original: gsang ba 'dus par ro gcig pa'o //
analyzed: gsang ba 'dus par ro gcig pa'o //
translated: They are of one taste in the Guhyasamaja.

original: ji lta bu zhig ce na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhig ce na /
translated: What is that like?

original: rdo rje las byung ste dang po'i dbang bskur ba ni lha thams cad kyi rdo rje las byung ba yin la gnyis pa ni ster ba po'i'o //
analyzed: rdo rje las byung ste dang po'i dbang bskur ba ni lha thams cad kyi rdo rje las byung ba yin la gnyis pa ni ster ba po'i'o //
translated: The first consecration is born from the vajra of all the deities, the second is that of the giver,

original: gsum pa ni yab kyi'o //
analyzed: gsum pa ni yab kyi'o //
translated: the third is that of the father.

original: ji ltar na dang po nyid rdo rje chen po'i dbang bskur ba yin gyis gzhan dag ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar na dang po nyid rdo rje chen po'i dbang bskur ba yin gyis gzhan dag ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: How is it that the first is the great vajra consecration and not the others?

original: 'dir rgya che ba nyid yin te /
analyzed: 'dir rgya che ba nyid yin te /
translated: Here it is the greatness.

original: phyag rgya chen po dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po dang 'dra'o //
translated: It is like the great seal.

original: de yang sku'i dbang bskur ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ram ster ba po du ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang sku'i dbang bskur ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ram ster ba po du ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And that is the consecration of the body, because it is the consecration of the body of the father, or because it is the consecration of the giver.

original: tshigs su bcad pa gang gis gsol ba 'debs pa can gyi slob ma la dbang bskur ba re re stsol ba de'i skabs dbye ba'i phyir /🔽@56a * // de la 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: tshigs su bcad pa gang gis gsol ba 'debs pa can gyi slob ma la dbang bskur ba re re stsol ba de'i skabs dbye ba'i phyir / @56a * // de la 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In order to open up the section on the bestowal of each empowerment to the disciple who is supplicating with the verse,

original: slob ma thams cad kyis rdo rje 'chang chen po la gsol ba 'debs pa gang yin pa de'i chog gsung ba ni thabs kyi de kho na nyid de tshigs su bcad pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: slob ma thams cad kyis rdo rje 'chang chen po la gsol ba 'debs pa gang yin pa de'i chog gsung ba ni thabs kyi de kho na nyid de tshigs su bcad pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: he says, “Here is the method for the one who is supplicating all disciples, the one who is the nature of the vajra holder, the one who is the great worship, the one who is the great festival, the one who is the bestowal of the desired empowerment.”

original: byang chub rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang ba'o //
analyzed: byang chub rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang ba'o //
translated: Vajra of enlightenment is the vajra holder.

original: mchod chen zhes bya ba'i tshig ni dga' ston chen po ste /
analyzed: mchod chen zhes bya ba'i tshig ni dga' ston chen po ste /
translated: The word “great worship” is a great festival.

original: mngon par 'dod pa'i dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mngon par 'dod pa'i dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is the bestowal of the desired empowerment.

original: nam mkha' rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang ba yin la /
analyzed: nam mkha' rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang ba yin la /
translated: Vajra of space is the vajra holder.

original: 'dir ni slob dpon nyid nam mkha' rdo rje ste /
analyzed: 'dir ni slob dpon nyid nam mkha' rdo rje ste /
translated: Here, the master himself is the vajra of space,

original: nam mkha' rdo rje dang mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: nam mkha' rdo rje dang mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because he is similar to the vajra of space.

original: ji ltar stsal ba bzhin zhes bya ba'i tshig las de bzhin du stsol cig ces bya bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: ji ltar stsal ba bzhin zhes bya ba'i tshig las de bzhin du stsol cig ces bya bar shes par bya'o //
translated: As it is given means that one should understand that it is to be given just as it is given.

original: de tshe zhes bya ba ni gsol ba btab pa'i de ma thag tu'o //
analyzed: de tshe zhes bya ba ni gsol ba btab pa'i de ma thag tu'o //
translated: At that time means immediately after the supplication.

original: stsol bar mdzad pa ni slob dpon gyis so //
analyzed: stsol bar mdzad pa ni slob dpon gyis so //
translated: The giving is by the master.

original: lha yi gzugs kyi sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: lha yi gzugs kyi sbyor ba yis //
translated: By the application of the deity's form,

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rnam snang gi tshigs su bcad pa bstan pa yis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rnam snang gi tshigs su bcad pa bstan pa yis so //
translated: means by the teaching of the verse of Vajra Vairochana.

original: snying gar zhes bya ba ni slob ma'i ye shes sems dpa'i snying ga'i zla ba la'o //
analyzed: snying gar zhes bya ba ni slob ma'i ye shes sems dpa'i snying ga'i zla ba la'o //
translated: At the heart means on the moon at the heart of the disciple's gnosis being.

original: bdag po gzhag par bya zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dga' ba'i bde ba la bzhugs par bsams la de nas dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag po gzhag par bya zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dga' ba'i bde ba la bzhugs par bsams la de nas dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o //
translated: The placing of the lord means imagining him abiding in the joy of bliss of Vajrasattva. Then the consecration should be given.

original: rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa cho ga bzhin zhes bya ba ni cho ga bzhin du bcug la'o //
analyzed: rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa cho ga bzhin zhes bya ba ni cho ga bzhin du bcug la'o //
translated: The vajra and so forth means that one should be inducted according to the rite.

original: dam tshig kyang zhes bya ba ni deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: dam tshig kyang zhes bya ba ni deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher gsungs pa'o //
translated: Also, the commitments are extensively stated as today you have entered into the family of all the Tathagatas.

original: kyang gis ni dbab pa yang ste /
analyzed: kyang gis ni dbab pa yang ste /
translated: Also means also the descent.

original: phreng ba dkyil 'khor du dor la de yang de'i spyi bor bcings nas /
analyzed: phreng ba dkyil 'khor du dor la de yang de'i spyi bor bcings nas /
translated: Having cast the garland into the maṇḍala, and having bound it on his head,

original: de nas sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig byin la zhes bya ba de ni de nyid kyi mig dag la 'bar ba dang bcas pa'i aom dkar po bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de nas sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig byin la zhes bya ba de ni de nyid kyi mig dag la 'bar ba dang bcas pa'i aom dkar po bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: then the mantra syllables are given, which means that in his very eyes one should meditate on a white A with a flame.

original: de nas mig dbye ba'i sngags kyis gdong g-yogs dgrol zhing de la dkyil 'khor dag ni bstan par bya ba ni gshin rje gshed nas brtsams te /
analyzed: de nas mig dbye ba'i sngags kyis gdong g-yogs dgrol zhing de la dkyil 'khor dag ni bstan par bya ba ni gshin rje gshed nas brtsams te /
translated: Then, having removed the blindfold with the mantra for opening the eyes, and having shown him the maṇḍala, beginning with Yamantaka,

original: dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i bar du'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i bar du'o //
translated: up to the lord of the maṇḍala,

original: de nas chu dang cod pan dang rdo rje dang bdag po dang ming gi dbang bskur ba sbyin la rdo rje chen po'i dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
analyzed: de nas chu dang cod pan dang rdo rje dang bdag po dang ming gi dbang bskur ba sbyin la rdo rje chen po'i dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
translated: Then, having given the water, crown, vajra, master, and name initiations, one should give the great vajra initiation.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni rdo rje chen po'i dbang bskur ba'i 'og tu'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni rdo rje chen po'i dbang bskur ba'i 'og tu'o //
translated: Then, after the great vajra initiation,

original: dam tshig gi ni 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dam tshig gi ni 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: the pledge is not to transgress.

original: gsang ba ni bsgrag par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ram sba bar bya ba'i don nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsang ba ni bsgrag par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ram sba bar bya ba'i don nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Secret means not to proclaim, or because it has the meaning of something to be concealed.

original: @56b don de yang bla ma'i man ngag las shes par bya'o //
analyzed: @56b don de yang bla ma'i man ngag las shes par bya'o //
translated: And that meaning should be understood from the guru's instructions.

original: rdo rje'i lam ni byang chub kyi lam mo //
analyzed: rdo rje'i lam ni byang chub kyi lam mo //
translated: The vajra path is the path of awakening.

original: 'di dag gis ni zhes bya bas ni dam tshig bzhi po yis so //
analyzed: 'di dag gis ni zhes bya bas ni dam tshig bzhi po yis so //
translated: By these means, by the four pledges,

original: sems can thams cad ces bya ba ni de'i skal pa dang ldan pa rnams so //
analyzed: sems can thams cad ces bya ba ni de'i skal pa dang ldan pa rnams so //
translated: all sentient beings, those who are fortunate,

original: bskul bar bya zhes bya ba ni 'jug par bya ba'o //
analyzed: bskul bar bya zhes bya ba ni 'jug par bya ba'o //
translated: should be urged, should be caused to enter.

original: 'di skad kyang gsungs so zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i lam ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'o //
analyzed: 'di skad kyang gsungs so zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i lam ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'o //
translated: This is what he said refers to the verse beginning The vajra path.

original: de tshe zhes bya ba ni dam tshig bzhi bsgrags nas so //
analyzed: de tshe zhes bya ba ni dam tshig bzhi bsgrags nas so //
translated: At that time is after the proclamation of the four pledges.

original: sngags kyang sbyin par bya zhes bya ba ni de'i 'dod pa'i lha'i sngags so //🔽sngags kyis bskul ba smras pa yis //
analyzed: sngags kyang sbyin par bya zhes bya ba ni de'i 'dod pa'i lha'i sngags so // sngags kyis bskul ba smras pa yis //
translated: The mantra is the mantra of the deity of one's choice.

original: zhes bya ba la sngags ni sngags bzlas pa'o //🔽bskul ba ni sbyin pa bsgrag pa'o ;
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sngags ni sngags bzlas pa'o // bskul ba ni sbyin pa bsgrag pa'o ;
translated: The mantra-empowerment is the mantra recitation.🔽 The proclamation is the bestowal.

original: / smras pa ni blangs par brda sprad pa ste /
analyzed: / smras pa ni blangs par brda sprad pa ste /
translated: The statement is the indication of the acceptance.

original: dkyil 'khor du rang nyid kyis brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor du rang nyid kyis brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la /
translated: The master should recite one hundred and eight times in the mandala,

original: bcom ldan bdag gis stsal lags kyis //
analyzed: bcom ldan bdag gis stsal lags kyis //
translated: Blessed One, I have given it.

original: 'di la 'go bar mdzad du gsol //
analyzed: 'di la 'go bar mdzad du gsol //
translated: Please accept it.

original: zhes slob dpon gyis brjod cing slob mas kyang mgo bo btud la /

original: bsgoms nas zhes bya ba ni yi ge hri de las byung ba bka' nod par rnam par bsams nas so //
analyzed: bsgoms nas zhes bya ba ni yi ge hri de las byung ba bka' nod par rnam par bsams nas so //
translated: Having meditated means that one should imagine that they have arisen from the syllable HRIH and are waiting for the command.

original: gsang ba'i gnas zhes bya ba ni gsang ba'i gnas nyid de thugs kyi gsang ba zhes bya ba'i don to ;
analyzed: gsang ba'i gnas zhes bya ba ni gsang ba'i gnas nyid de thugs kyi gsang ba zhes bya ba'i don to ;
translated: The secret place is the secret place itself, which is to say, the secret of the mind.

original: / de gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: / de gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la rdo rje ni mngag gzhug pa'i khro bo rnams te /
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la rdo rje ni mngag gzhug pa'i khro bo rnams te /
translated: He says there and so forth. The vajra is the wrathful messengers.

original: de rnams kyi gsang ba'i gnas so //
analyzed: de rnams kyi gsang ba'i gnas so //
translated: That is their secret place.

original: nyi ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa la mngag gzhug pa'i snying gar nyi ma 'bar ba la gnas pa 'od zer gyi phreng ba can gyi mi bskyod pa la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i rigs kyi dbye bas bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: nyi ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa la mngag gzhug pa'i snying gar nyi ma 'bar ba la gnas pa 'od zer gyi phreng ba can gyi mi bskyod pa la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i rigs kyi dbye bas bsam par bya'o //
translated: The sun and so forth means that one should imagine Akshobhya or whichever of the families is appropriate, standing on a blazing sun in the heart of the messenger, with a garland of light rays.

original: snying pos zhes bya ba ni aom las byung ba'i rtse gsum la sogs pas so //
analyzed: snying pos zhes bya ba ni aom las byung ba'i rtse gsum la sogs pas so //
translated: The essence is the three-pronged vajra, etc. , arisen from the syllable Om.

original: bskul bar bya zhes bya ba ni brdeg par bya ba'o //
analyzed: bskul bar bya zhes bya ba ni brdeg par bya ba'o //
translated: One should urge means one should strike.

original: sdug bsngal chen po yis zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal mi bzad par byed pas so //
analyzed: sdug bsngal chen po yis zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal mi bzad par byed pas so //
translated: With great suffering means with unbearable suffering.

original: 'od chen thams cad ces bya ba ni nam mkha' khyab pa'i ye shes kyi mngag gzhug pa'o //
analyzed: 'od chen thams cad ces bya ba ni nam mkha' khyab pa'i ye shes kyi mngag gzhug pa'o //
translated: The great light means the knowledge messenger who pervades the sky.

original: rdo rje thams cad ni ye shes kyi mngag gzhug pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje thams cad ni ye shes kyi mngag gzhug pa'o //
translated: The vajra means the knowledge messenger.

original: de rnams kyi snying po rdo rje ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyi snying po rdo rje ste /
translated: The essence of those is the vajra.

original: rtse gsum la sogs pa sgros pa yis so //
analyzed: rtse gsum la sogs pa sgros pa yis so //
translated: The three-pronged vajra, etc. , means the three-pronged vajra, etc. , arisen from the syllable Om.

original: bskul ba ni brdegs pa'o //
analyzed: bskul ba ni brdegs pa'o //
translated: One should urge means one should strike.

original: aam ni dam tshig gi mngag gzhug pa'i thugs kyi gsang ba'i snying ga'i nyi ma la bsam par bya ba'i sngags so //
analyzed: aam ni dam tshig gi mngag gzhug pa'i thugs kyi gsang ba'i snying ga'i nyi ma la bsam par bya ba'i sngags so //
translated: The syllable Am is the mantra to be contemplated on the sun in the heart of the mind of the pledge messenger.

original: ji ltar bskul bar bya zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar bskul bar bya zhe na /
translated: How should one urge?

original: mdung rtse che dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: mdung rtse che dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The great spear, etc. , are stated.

original: cho ga bzhin zhes bya ba ni yi ge aom nyid las mdung rtse la sogs pa spros pa dang dam tshig gi mngag gzhug pa la byin gyis brlabs la bdag la grub par gyur cig ces bya ba'i bsam pas brdeg pa ni 'dir cho ga yin no //
analyzed: cho ga bzhin zhes bya ba ni yi ge aom nyid las mdung rtse la sogs pa spros pa dang dam tshig gi mngag gzhug pa la byin gyis brlabs la bdag la grub par gyur cig ces bya ba'i bsam pas brdeg pa ni 'dir cho ga yin no //
translated: “According to the rite” means that one should imagine that one is empowered to strike with a spear-point, etc., emanated from the syllable OṀ itself, and to order the pledge beings, thinking, “May I be empowered to strike!” This is the rite here.

original: sangs rgyas byang chub ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi thabs kyi mngag gzhug pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas byang chub ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi thabs kyi mngag gzhug pa'o //
translated: “Awakening of the Buddhas” means the ordering of the means of the Buddhas.

original: sa phyogs gang du mngag gzhug pa bsgrub par bya ba dang / dus ji srid nas 'grub par 'gyur ba de ni nyams dga' ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pas gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: sa phyogs gang du mngag gzhug pa bsgrub par bya ba dang / dus ji srid nas 'grub par 'gyur ba de ni nyams dga' ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pas gsungs pa yin no //
translated: In whatever place one should accomplish the ordering, and for how long a time, that is stated in the verse beginning with “pleasing.”

original: mngag gzhug pa grub par gyur nas @58b cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: mngag gzhug pa grub par gyur nas @58b cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What happens when the ordering is accomplished?

original: ri rab ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: ri rab ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: It is stated in “Meru,” etc.

original: rdo rje can nyid byang chub ste //
analyzed: rdo rje can nyid byang chub ste //
translated: The vajra-holder himself is awakening,

original: de yi don gyi 'khor rnams so //
analyzed: de yi don gyi 'khor rnams so //
translated: and his retinue is for the sake of that.

original: 'gro bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'gro bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “They will go” means

original: rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro bar 'gyur ro //🔽thas 'gyur zhing zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro bar 'gyur ro // thas 'gyur zhing zhes bya ba ni /
translated: One goes by means of magical power.

original: de na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so //🔽sangs rgyas sa yang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so // sangs rgyas sa yang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The Buddhas who dwell there.

original: mthar 'tshang rgya ba nyid do //
analyzed: mthar 'tshang rgya ba nyid do //
translated: The stage of the Buddhas is the ultimate enlightenment.

original: dam tshig rdo rje'i bzhad pa yang de yin la chen po yang yin pas na'o //
analyzed: dam tshig rdo rje'i bzhad pa yang de yin la chen po yang yin pas na'o //
translated: It is the great laughter of the pledge-vajra.

original: de la dam tshig ni dam tshig gi mngag gzhug pa'o //
analyzed: de la dam tshig ni dam tshig gi mngag gzhug pa'o //
translated: The pledge is the pledge-command.

original: de'i rdo rje ni thugs kyi gsang ba'o //
analyzed: de'i rdo rje ni thugs kyi gsang ba'o //
translated: The vajra is the secret of mind.

original: de'i bzhad pa ni snying gar gnas pa'i yi gi a'om: las byung ba'i mdung la sogs pa'i tshogs so //
analyzed: de'i bzhad pa ni snying gar gnas pa'i yi gi a'om: las byung ba'i mdung la sogs pa'i tshogs so //
translated: The laughter is the assembly of spears, etc., which arise from the syllable OM at the heart.

original: de yang nam mkha' khyab pas na chen po yin te /
analyzed: de yang nam mkha' khyab pas na chen po yin te /
translated: It is great because it pervades space.

original: ye shes kyi mngag gzhug pa'i rigs kyi snying po skul bar byed pa nyid kyi khyab par byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ye shes kyi mngag gzhug pa'i rigs kyi snying po skul bar byed pa nyid kyi khyab par byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is a pervader because it is the inciter of the essence of the family of the knowledge-command.

original: de ston par mdzad pa nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das la yang de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ston par mdzad pa nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das la yang de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The Blessed One is so called because he teaches that.

original: mngag gzhug pa sgrub pa rnam pa gnyis las gcig bshad nas gnyis pa bshad pa'i phyir /🔽de la zhes bya ba la sgos pa gsungs pa la de la zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du bskyed pa'i dam tshig gi mnga' gzhug pa'o //
analyzed: mngag gzhug pa sgrub pa rnam pa gnyis las gcig bshad nas gnyis pa bshad pa'i phyir / de la zhes bya ba la sgos pa gsungs pa la de la zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du bskyed pa'i dam tshig gi mnga' gzhug pa'o //
translated: Having explained one of the two kinds of service, in order to explain the second,

original: mngag gzhug pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje ni sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba'o //
analyzed: mngag gzhug pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje ni sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba'o //
translated: he says, “Therein, the secret of all services is the secret of body, speech, and mind.

original: de rnams kyi gsang ba ni de kho na nyid do //
analyzed: de rnams kyi gsang ba ni de kho na nyid do //
translated: The secret of those is reality.

original: de gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: de gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is that?🔽The secret of Vajrasattva, etc.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sgos pa la mi bskyod pa dang / 'od dpag tu med pa dang rnam par snang mdzad kyi'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sgos pa la mi bskyod pa dang / 'od dpag tu med pa dang rnam par snang mdzad kyi'o //
translated: means the secret of Akshobhya, Amitabha, and Vairochana.

original: dgod pa zhes bya ba ni snying ga dang lkog ma dang spyi bor 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba can 'di rnams rnam par dgod pa yis so //
analyzed: dgod pa zhes bya ba ni snying ga dang lkog ma dang spyi bor 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba can 'di rnams rnam par dgod pa yis so //
translated: “Arranging” means arranging these garlands of flames at the heart, throat, and head.

original: bskul zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i phyir sad par bya ba'o //
analyzed: bskul zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i phyir sad par bya ba'o //
translated: “Stirring” means arousing them in order to accomplish them.

original: de la zhes bya ba ni gsang ba gsum dgod par byas par ro //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni gsang ba gsum dgod par byas par ro //
translated: The there is the placement of the three secrets.

original: rdo rje ni de nyid kyi gsang ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje ni de nyid kyi gsang ba'o //
translated: The vajra is the secret of that very [vajra].

original: de rnams kyi ye shes kyi 'khor lo ni de dag nyid kyi snying ga'i sngags kyi 'od zer gyi sprul pa rnams re re zhing nam mkha' khyab pa'i ye shes kyi mngag gzhug pa'i rigs gsum pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi ye shes kyi 'khor lo ni de dag nyid kyi snying ga'i sngags kyi 'od zer gyi sprul pa rnams re re zhing nam mkha' khyab pa'i ye shes kyi mngag gzhug pa'i rigs gsum pa'o //
translated: The wheel of awareness of those is the emanations of the light rays of the mantra at the heart of those very [vajras], each of which is the type of awareness-command of the three families pervading space.

original: de rnams kyi dam tshig gi gnas bzhi ni dam tshig gi gnas bzhi ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyi dam tshig gi gnas bzhi ni dam tshig gi gnas bzhi ste /
translated: The four places of the pledge of those are the four places of the pledge.

original: dam tshig ni ye shes kyi 'khor lo yin la de'i gnas ni las rnams so //
analyzed: dam tshig ni ye shes kyi 'khor lo yin la de'i gnas ni las rnams so //
translated: The pledge is the wheel of awareness, and the places are the actions.

original: dam tshig bskul ba ni a'a: la sogs pa'i rang gi de kho na nyid kyis sad pa'o //🔽dam tshig @59a * //
analyzed: dam tshig bskul ba ni a'a: la sogs pa'i rang gi de kho na nyid kyis sad pa'o // dam tshig @59a * //
translated: The encouraging of the pledge is the awakening by the reality of one's own aḥ and so forth.

original: gtong ba ni a'a: la sogs pa'i 'od zer pho nya'i gnas su gyur pa rnams gtong ba'o //
analyzed: gtong ba ni a'a: la sogs pa'i 'od zer pho nya'i gnas su gyur pa rnams gtong ba'o //
translated: The giving of the pledge is the sending forth of the light rays of aḥ and so forth that become the places of the messengers.

original: dam tshig bod pa ni 'od zer de dag nyid kyis dgug pa'o //
analyzed: dam tshig bod pa ni 'od zer de dag nyid kyis dgug pa'o //
translated: The binding of the pledge is the summoning by those very light rays.

original: dam tshig bcing ba ni bkug pa de nyid yi ge a'a: la sogs pa la bsdus te 'jog pa'o //
analyzed: dam tshig bcing ba ni bkug pa de nyid yi ge a'a: la sogs pa la bsdus te 'jog pa'o //
translated: The binding of the pledge is the gathering of that summoned into the syllable AḤ, etc.

original: de nad dam tshig gi tshig 'di dag gis ci zhig byed ce na /
analyzed: de nad dam tshig gi tshig 'di dag gis ci zhig byed ce na /
translated: What is the purpose of these pledge words?

original: mkha' dbyings zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: mkha' dbyings zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The text says, “the realm of space,” etc.

original: ye shes kyi khro bo'i 'khor lo'i rang bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings su ro gcig pa'i rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems ni nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir mkha' dbyings so //
analyzed: ye shes kyi khro bo'i 'khor lo'i rang bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings su ro gcig pa'i rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems ni nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir mkha' dbyings so //
translated: Since it is the very nature of the wheel of the wrathful ones of pristine awareness, the mind of perfect enlightenment, which is of one taste with the ultimate realm, is the very nature of the realm of space.

original: mtha' yas pa nyid kyi phyir rgya chen no //
analyzed: mtha' yas pa nyid kyi phyir rgya chen no //
translated: Since it is infinite, it is vast.

original: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba nyid yin pa'i phyir dag pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba nyid yin pa'i phyir dag pa'o //
translated: Since it is naturally radiant, it is pure.

original: rnam pa thams cad du gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir chos rnams thams cad rnams spangs pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir chos rnams thams cad rnams spangs pa'o //
translated: Since it is free from the aspects of subject and object in every way, it is free from all phenomena.

original: de gong bu'i tshul gyis zhes bya ba ni rdo rje gsum du bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: de gong bu'i tshul gyis zhes bya ba ni rdo rje gsum du bsdus pa'o //
translated: That is the way of the aggregate, which is the gathering into the three vajras.

original: rdo rje nyid ni ngo mtshar du gyur ba'i tshul can nyid yin te /
analyzed: rdo rje nyid ni ngo mtshar du gyur ba'i tshul can nyid yin te /
translated: The vajra itself is the one having the manner of a wonder.

original: de dang ldan pas na rdo rje rmad byung gzugs can te /
analyzed: de dang ldan pas na rdo rje rmad byung gzugs can te /
translated: Endowed with that, the vajra has a wondrous form,

original: nam mkha' khyab par byed pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bu gcig pa ni gsang ba gsum bsdus pa de rnams kyis bskyed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: nam mkha' khyab par byed pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bu gcig pa ni gsang ba gsum bsdus pa de rnams kyis bskyed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it is generated by all the buddhas, who pervade space, by means of the three secrets.

original: de gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: de gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: dam tshig gi mngag gzhug pa'o //
analyzed: dam tshig gi mngag gzhug pa'o //
translated: The pledge servant.

original: de ston par mdzad pa nyid kyis ni bcom ldan la yang de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ston par mdzad pa nyid kyis ni bcom ldan la yang de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The Blessed One is so called because he is the one who teaches that.

original: mngag gzhug pa sgrub pa 'di la yang de nyid 'bras bu yin te /
analyzed: mngag gzhug pa sgrub pa 'di la yang de nyid 'bras bu yin te /
translated: And in this accomplishment of the servant, that itself is the result,

original: gzhan du ma gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan du ma gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not taught elsewhere.

original: mngag gzhug pa sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: mngag gzhug pa sgrub pa'o //
translated: The accomplishment of the servant.

original: rdo rje lus med kyi sbyor ba ni sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: rdo rje lus med kyi sbyor ba ni sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The yoga of the vajra without a body is stated by “the buddhas” and so forth.

original: 'ong gi sgras ni lha dang mi'i dbang po'i bu mo la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'ong gi sgras ni lha dang mi'i dbang po'i bu mo la sogs pa'o //
translated: The word “coming” refers to the daughters of the lords of gods and humans, and so forth.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i bsam gtan no //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i bsam gtan no //
translated: “This” refers to the meditation that will be explained.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i lus dang ngag dang yid ni rdo rje gsum mo //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i lus dang ngag dang yid ni rdo rje gsum mo //
translated: The body, speech, and mind to be accomplished are the three vajras.

original: de dbang du byas nas mdun du 'jog pa'i phyir rdo rje mchog gsum 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: de dbang du byas nas mdun du 'jog pa'i phyir rdo rje mchog gsum 'dzin pa'o //
translated: Since one is brought under control by them, one holds the three supreme vajras in front.

original: rdo rje 'jam pa zhes bya ba ni zla ba dmar po la gnas pa sku dang thugs dang na bza' dang rgyan dang phreng ba dmar po'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'jam pa zhes bya ba ni zla ba dmar po la gnas pa sku dang thugs dang na bza' dang rgyan dang phreng ba dmar po'o //
translated: The one called “vajra gentle” is red, standing on a red moon, with a red body, mind, clothing, ornaments, and garland.

original: mda' lnga zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bsgrub par bya ba kha dog dmar zhing gos med pas 'jigs par 'gyur ba mdun du bsams te /
analyzed: mda' lnga zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bsgrub par bya ba kha dog dmar zhing gos med pas 'jigs par 'gyur ba mdun du bsams te /
translated: With regard to “five arrows,” and so on, one should imagine the victim in front, red, and terrified because naked.

original: de nyid 'ben du byas nas tsam las byung ba'i gzhu dmar po lag pa g-yon pas gzung la gzhu'i @59b rgyud 'dran  par byed pa can sor mo lnga'i nang na gnas pa'i yi ge ram las byung ba'i mda' autpala dmar po kha ma bye ba'i mde'u dang
analyzed: de nyid 'ben du byas nas tsam las byung ba'i gzhu dmar po lag pa g-yon pas gzung la gzhu'i @59b rgyud 'dran  par byed pa can sor mo lnga'i nang na gnas pa'i yi ge ram las byung ba'i mda' autpala dmar po kha ma bye ba'i mde'u dang
translated: Having made him the target, one should hold with the left hand a red bow arisen from the syllable raṃ, and with the right hand an arrow arisen from the syllable raṃ, which is on the tip of the five fingers, with the shape of a red lotus bud.

original: ldan pa'i mda' lnga ltong 'dzin par byed pa'i g-yas kyi khu tshur cod pan gyi mthar 'jog pa ni mda' lnga'i sbyor bdag gis ni dbu rgyan rtse mor ro //
analyzed: ldan pa'i mda' lnga ltong 'dzin par byed pa'i g-yas kyi khu tshur cod pan gyi mthar 'jog pa ni mda' lnga'i sbyor bdag gis ni dbu rgyan rtse mor ro //
translated: The five arrows are placed in the right fist, which holds the quiver, at the end of the diadem; the union of the five arrows is at the top of the crown.

original: des yang dag spro ba ni mda' lnga las mda' lnga 'byung zhing spro ba bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: des yang dag spro ba ni mda' lnga las mda' lnga 'byung zhing spro ba bsam par bya'o //
translated: The perfect emanation is to be imagined as the emanation and re-emanation of the five arrows from the five arrows.

original: de nas mda' las byung bas ci zhig byed ce na /
analyzed: de nas mda' las byung bas ci zhig byed ce na /
translated: Then, what is done by the one who has arisen from the arrows?

original: gnas lnga dag tu rab tu dbab pa ste /
analyzed: gnas lnga dag tu rab tu dbab pa ste /
translated: He should shoot into the five places.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i mig gnyis dang / snying ga dang lte ba dang gsang ba rnams su'o //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i mig gnyis dang / snying ga dang lte ba dang gsang ba rnams su'o //
translated: The two eyes, the heart, the navel, and the secret place, which are the objects of attainment.

original: rdo rje khro bos zhes bya ba ni 'bar zhing chags pa dang bcas pa'i yi ge h'um ngam yi ge mam gyis so //
analyzed: rdo rje khro bos zhes bya ba ni 'bar zhing chags pa dang bcas pa'i yi ge h'um ngam yi ge mam gyis so //
translated: With the vajra wrath, that is, with the syllable hūṃ or the syllable maṃ, which is blazing and passionate.

original: brgyal ba ni myos te dbang du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brgyal ba ni myos te dbang du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: He should render them unconscious, that is, intoxicated and under control.

original: de zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'o //
translated: He, that is, the one to be attained.

original: byis pa'i gzigs kyang de yin la /
analyzed: byis pa'i gzigs kyang de yin la /
translated: Even though he is a child,

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi blo yang yin pas na byis pa'i blo ste 'jam dpal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi blo yang yin pas na byis pa'i blo ste 'jam dpal lo //
translated: He is the mind of all Buddhas, and so he is the mind of the childish, that is, Manjusri.

original: de'i grags chen ni grags pa dang ldan pa'i mda'o //
analyzed: de'i grags chen ni grags pa dang ldan pa'i mda'o //
translated: His great fame is the arrow of fame.

original: gsang ba'i bskul ba dag gis zhes bya ba ni gnad du bsnun pa yis so //
analyzed: gsang ba'i bskul ba dag gis zhes bya ba ni gnad du bsnun pa yis so //
translated: With secret urgings means with the striking of the vital points.

original: sngags rnams kun ni lha thams cad do //
analyzed: sngags rnams kun ni lha thams cad do //
translated: All mantras are all gods.

original: de rnams kyi rab gsang ba ni nang gi nor ro //
analyzed: de rnams kyi rab gsang ba ni nang gi nor ro //
translated: Their secret is the inner wealth.

original: sgrub pa pos don bya ba yin la blo ni bsgrub par bya ba rnams kyi bsam pa yin pas na don gyi blo yin zhing de gang las dbyer mi phyed par 'gyur ba de ni rdo rje don gyi blo ste /
analyzed: sgrub pa pos don bya ba yin la blo ni bsgrub par bya ba rnams kyi bsam pa yin pas na don gyi blo yin zhing de gang las dbyer mi phyed par 'gyur ba de ni rdo rje don gyi blo ste /
translated: The mind of the aim is the aim of the adepts, and the mind of those to be accomplished, and that which is inseparable from it is the vajra mind of the aim.

original: rdo rje lus med kyi sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje lus med kyi sbyor ba'o //
translated: It is the practice of the vajra bodyless one.

original: de ston par mdzad pa nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das la yang de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: de ston par mdzad pa nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das la yang de skad ces bya ste /
translated: The Lord is so called because he teaches that.

original: rdo rje lus med do //
analyzed: rdo rje lus med do //
translated: The vajra is the bodyless one.

original: mchog dang zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs so //
analyzed: mchog dang zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs so //
translated: The supreme is the form of the great seal.

original: nam mkha'i dbyings ni chos 'byung ba'i nang du chud pa'i gzhal yas khang ngo //
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings ni chos 'byung ba'i nang du chud pa'i gzhal yas khang ngo //
translated: The realm of space is the celestial mansion contained within the source of phenomena.

original: ji ltar bsam par bya zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar bsam par bya zhe na /
translated: How should one imagine it?

original: sngags kyi rdo rje h'um la sogs te /
analyzed: sngags kyi rdo rje h'um la sogs te /
translated: The mantra is the vajra of hūṃ and so on,🔽arisen from all the vowels, the moon maṇḍala, and the surrounding clear syllables of all the mantras.

original: dbyangs kyi yi ge thams cad las byung ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gsal ba'i yi ge thams cad kyis yongs su bskor ba mchog dang po'i snying po ste de las rdo rje'o //🔽de'i dbus su snying po de nyid do //
analyzed: dbyangs kyi yi ge thams cad las byung ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gsal ba'i yi ge thams cad kyis yongs su bskor ba mchog dang po'i snying po ste de las rdo rje'o // de'i dbus su snying po de nyid do //
translated: The essence of the supreme first one is the vajra, in the center of which is the essence itself.

original: sogs pa smos pas ni spro ba dang bsdu ba dang rdo rje 'dzin pa bskyed pa 'dod chags chen po'i tshul la sogs pa'i rim gyis dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po dang / dkyil 'khor pa rnams sprul pa /
analyzed: sogs pa smos pas ni spro ba dang bsdu ba dang rdo rje 'dzin pa bskyed pa 'dod chags chen po'i tshul la sogs pa'i rim gyis dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po dang / dkyil 'khor pa rnams sprul pa /
translated: Since the phrase “and so on” is mentioned, the emanation of the maṇḍala lord and the maṇḍala through the stages of the method of great passion, such as the creation of the emanation and re-absorption and the creation of Vajradhara,

original: dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po la sogs pa de nams kyi rdo rje gsum la sogs pa bsgoms te /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po la sogs pa de nams kyi rdo rje gsum la sogs pa bsgoms te /
translated: the meditation on the three vajras, and so on, of the maṇḍala lord, and so on,

original: sku rdo rje la sogs pa dang / ye shes sems dpa' dang cod pan la @60a * //
analyzed: sku rdo rje la sogs pa dang / ye shes sems dpa' dang cod pan la @60a * //
translated: the vajra body, and so on, the awareness being, and the crown,

original: rigs kyi bdag po dang / rig pa dang yang dag par sbyor ba ci rigs par bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rigs kyi bdag po dang / rig pa dang yang dag par sbyor ba ci rigs par bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: One should meditate on the lord of the family and the knowledge being, as appropriate.

original: cho ga bzhin du zhes bya ba ni slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga bzhin du'o //
analyzed: cho ga bzhin du zhes bya ba ni slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga bzhin du'o //
translated: “According to the rite” means according to the rite for inducting the disciple.

original: bstan zhes bya ba ni sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di bstan pa'o //🔽aom ni mig gi dbus bsams nas //
analyzed: bstan zhes bya ba ni sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di bstan pa'o // aom ni mig gi dbus bsams nas //
translated: “Show” means show this emanation maṇḍala.

original: zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig byin la zhes sngar gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig byin la zhes sngar gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: “Having visualized oṃ in the middle of the eyes” is what was previously stated as “give the mantra syllables.”

original: sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor yang dag par bstan pa'o //
analyzed: sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor yang dag par bstan pa'o //
translated: This is the showing of the emanation maṇḍala.

original: bkres skom zhes bya ba ni bkres pa dang skom pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: bkres skom zhes bya ba ni bkres pa dang skom pa rnams kyis so //
translated: “Hunger and thirst” are hunger and thirst.

original: nyon mongs ches zhes bya ba ni ngal ba chen po yin te /
analyzed: nyon mongs ches zhes bya ba ni ngal ba chen po yin te /
translated: “Great fatigue” is great weariness.

original: de rgyur gyur pas rnam bsams nas te zhi ba'i don du'o //
analyzed: de rgyur gyur pas rnam bsams nas te zhi ba'i don du'o //
translated: “Having visualized” that as the cause, “for the sake of peace,”

original: don rnams thams cad 'byor zhes bya ba ni gzugs kyi phung po la dbang thob pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don rnams thams cad 'byor zhes bya ba ni gzugs kyi phung po la dbang thob pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “all aims are fulfilled” because one obtains power over the aggregate of form.

original: bam zhes bya ba ni bum pa dkar po lta bu'o //
analyzed: bam zhes bya ba ni bum pa dkar po lta bu'o //
translated: Bam is like a white pot.

original: kha'i nang du zhes bya ba ni ma mchu dang 'byar zhing cung zad khas spub pa'o //
analyzed: kha'i nang du zhes bya ba ni ma mchu dang 'byar zhing cung zad khas spub pa'o //
translated: In the mouth means joined to the lower lip and slightly turned upward.

original: bza' bar bya ba kun zhes bya ba ni bza' bar bya ba dang btung ba la sogs pa'o //🔽yid bzhin nor bus brgyan pa ste //
analyzed: bza' bar bya ba kun zhes bya ba ni bza' bar bya ba dang btung ba la sogs pa'o // yid bzhin nor bus brgyan pa ste //
translated: All food means food, drink, and so on.

original: zhes bya ba ni zla ba phyed pa'i rang bzhin can phyed bkab pa'i thig le'i gzugs can gyi yid bzhin gyi nor bus rnam par brgyan pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni zla ba phyed pa'i rang bzhin can phyed bkab pa'i thig le'i gzugs can gyi yid bzhin gyi nor bus rnam par brgyan pa ste /
translated: Adorned with a wish-fulfilling gem means adorned with a wish-fulfilling gem in the form of a half-covered drop, having the nature of a half-moon.

original: bum pa bzang po nyid yi pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bum pa bzang po nyid yi pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the nature of the excellent vase.

original: ye shes rdo rje ni ting nge 'dzin bstan pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes rdo rje ni ting nge 'dzin bstan pa'o //
translated: The vajra of wisdom is the teaching of meditative concentration.

original: de las byung ba ni bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: de las byung ba ni bskyed pa'o //
translated: Arisen from that means produced.

original: zhi ba ste nyon mongs pa med pa bkres pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal spang ba gang yin pa de 'dra ba'i yi ge bam bsams nas so //
analyzed: zhi ba ste nyon mongs pa med pa bkres pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal spang ba gang yin pa de 'dra ba'i yi ge bam bsams nas so //
translated: Pacification means the absence of afflictions, the abandonment of the suffering of hunger and so on. Having contemplated such a syllable bam,

original: aom ni lce la 'dug par bsam //
analyzed: aom ni lce la 'dug par bsam //
translated: one should contemplate om residing on the tongue.

original: lce'i rtse mo la yi ge aom bsam pa kha der gtad par bya ste /
analyzed: lce'i rtse mo la yi ge aom bsam pa kha der gtad par bya ste /
translated: The letter OṂ is imagined at the tip of the tongue, and one should direct one’s mouth to that.

original: bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs pa rngub pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs pa rngub pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: in order to inhale food and drink, etc.

original: yid bzhin gyi nor bu rdo rje 'di nyid ni ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: yid bzhin gyi nor bu rdo rje 'di nyid ni ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This very wish-granting jewel vajra is meditative concentration.

original: de ston par mdzad pa la yang de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ston par mdzad pa la yang de skad ces bya'o //
translated: It is also called that which teaches it.

original: zas kyi yid bzhin nor bu'o //
analyzed: zas kyi yid bzhin nor bu'o //
translated: The wish-granting jewel of food.

original: dpa' bo chen po'i rdo rje yang de yin la de bzhin gshegs pa yang yin pa ste /
analyzed: dpa' bo chen po'i rdo rje yang de yin la de bzhin gshegs pa yang yin pa ste /
translated: He is a great hero vajra and also a tathāgata.

original: de'i rdo rje bsgoms pa ni sku gsum bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: de'i rdo rje bsgoms pa ni sku gsum bsgom pa'o //
translated: His vajra meditation is the meditation on the three bodies.

original: de'i dam tshig gi mchog ni sa bon gyi mchog go //
analyzed: de'i dam tshig gi mchog ni sa bon gyi mchog go //
translated: His supreme commitment is the supreme seed.

original: rdo rje gsung las zhes bya ba ni rdo rje gsung la sogs pa las so //
analyzed: rdo rje gsung las zhes bya ba ni rdo rje gsung la sogs pa las so //
translated: From the vajra speech, etc. means from the vajra speech, etc.

original: bsgom pa ni sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /
analyzed: bsgom pa ni sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /
translated: The meditation is stated in “the buddhas, etc.”

original: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The buddha maṇḍala is the moon maṇḍala.

original: rdo rje gsum ni zla ba dang rdo rje dang bam gyi'o //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum ni zla ba dang rdo rje dang bam gyi'o //
translated: The three vajras are the moon, the vajra, and the vaṃ.

original: de rnams kyi sku'i sbyor ba ni nam mkha' khyab par byed pa'i rgyal ba'i sku bsdus pa ste des bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi sku'i sbyor ba ni nam mkha' khyab par byed pa'i rgyal ba'i sku bsdus pa ste des bskyed pa'o //
translated: The union of their bodies is the body of the Victor, which pervades space, and is the cause of their generation.

original: des ci zhig byed ce na /
analyzed: des ci zhig byed ce na /
translated: What does it do?

original: skabs @60b nyid yin pa'i phyir dpa' bo rdo rje'o //
analyzed: skabs @60b nyid yin pa'i phyir dpa' bo rdo rje'o //
translated: It is the hero vajra, because it is the occasion.

original: ser ba zhes bya ba ni gser lta bu'o //
analyzed: ser ba zhes bya ba ni gser lta bu'o //
translated: The yellow is like gold.

original: rdo rje 'gying ba zhes bya ba ni phyag na gnas pa'i rdo rje 'bar ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'gying ba zhes bya ba ni phyag na gnas pa'i rdo rje 'bar ba lta bu'o //
translated: The vajra dance is the blazing vajra in the hand.

original: rang snang ba'i rig mas 'khyud pas rdo rje dang / ral gri dang nor bu dang padma bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: rang snang ba'i rig mas 'khyud pas rdo rje dang / ral gri dang nor bu dang padma bsnams pa'o //
translated: The vajra is the one who holds the vajra, sword, gem, and lotus, embraced by the self-appearing knowledge woman.

original: 'di ni rnam par bsam zhes bya ba ni sa bon gyi yi ge bam snying ga'i zla ba rdo rje'i lte ba la gnas pa zla ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rnam par bsam zhes bya ba ni sa bon gyi yi ge bam snying ga'i zla ba rdo rje'i lte ba la gnas pa zla ba'o //
translated: The contemplate is the syllable vaṃ, which is the moon, located in the heart, in the center of the vajra.

original: bsams nas zhes bya ba ni de lta bu'i yi ge bam gyi rnam par bsams nas so //
analyzed: bsams nas zhes bya ba ni de lta bu'i yi ge bam gyi rnam par bsams nas so //
translated: The having contemplated is having contemplated the syllable vaṃ in that way.

original: thams cad brtsam par bya zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba ma yin pa'i las kyang brtsams nas de nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar dgongs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: thams cad brtsam par bya zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba ma yin pa'i las kyang brtsams nas de nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar dgongs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of one should undertake everything is that even an action that is not to be accomplished, if undertaken, will certainly be accomplished.

original: rdo rje dpa' bo'i rlabs ni brtson pas gzengs bstod pa'i sngags kyi 'od zer te de rnams kyi phreng ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje dpa' bo'i rlabs ni brtson pas gzengs bstod pa'i sngags kyi 'od zer te de rnams kyi phreng ba'o //
translated: The garland of the vajra heroes' rays is the mantra rays that encourage one with effort; that is their garland.

original: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The samādhi that focuses on that is called by that name.

original: dpa' bo'i rdo rje'o //
analyzed: dpa' bo'i rdo rje'o //
translated: The vajra hero is Caṇḍa.

original: kun nas dbyangs ni sngags thams cad de sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: kun nas dbyangs ni sngags thams cad de sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The sound of all is all mantras, meaning the buddhas and bodhisattvas.

original: de'i rdo rje ni tsunda'i rnam par bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: de'i rdo rje ni tsunda'i rnam par bsdus pa'o //
translated: The vajra of that is included in Caṇḍa's form.

original: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The samādhi that focuses on that is called by that name.

original: rdo rje chen mo ni skul byed ma de nyid de de'i bsgoms pa'i don gyi tshig ni sa bon no //
analyzed: rdo rje chen mo ni skul byed ma de nyid de de'i bsgoms pa'i don gyi tshig ni sa bon no //
translated: The great vajra is Caṇḍa herself. The word for the meaning of her meditation is the seed.

original: rdo rje gsum gyi zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum gyi zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
translated: The “three vajras” are the bodhisattvas Vajrasattva and so on.

original: lus dang ngag dang sems zhes bya ba ni nyi ma dang padma dang yi ge tsum mo //
analyzed: lus dang ngag dang sems zhes bya ba ni nyi ma dang padma dang yi ge tsum mo //
translated: “Body, speech, and mind” are the sun, the lotus, and the syllable cuṃ.

original: rab tu bsgom zhes bya ba ni rab tu brtags nas bsgom pa ste /
analyzed: rab tu bsgom zhes bya ba ni rab tu brtags nas bsgom pa ste /
translated: “One should meditate” means that one should meditate after having imagined.

original: nyi ma'i gdan dang nyi ma'i 'od mnga' ba thabs kyis 'khyud pa padma dkar po dang ral gri dang nor bu dang 'khor lo bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: nyi ma'i gdan dang nyi ma'i 'od mnga' ba thabs kyis 'khyud pa padma dkar po dang ral gri dang nor bu dang 'khor lo bsnams pa'o //
translated: The sun seat and the sun light, the embrace with the method, the white lotus, the sword, the jewel, and the wheel.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'i cod pan can no //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'i cod pan can no //
translated: “Vajrasattva” is one who has Akṣobhya as a head ornament.

original: sngags kyi tshig ces bya ba ni snying ga'i nyi ma la bzlas pa'i sngags kyi yi ge tsum ma /
analyzed: sngags kyi tshig ces bya ba ni snying ga'i nyi ma la bzlas pa'i sngags kyi yi ge tsum ma /
translated: “The mantra word” is the syllable cuṃ of the mantra recitation on the sun at the heart.

original: yang na aom tsa le tsu le tsunde sv'a h'a bya ba'o //
analyzed: yang na aom tsa le tsu le tsunde sv'a h'a bya ba'o //
translated: Or it is the mantra “Oṃ caṇḍa mahoṣṇīṣa jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ, bindha ūṃ ūṃ ūṃ, pibha ūṃ ūṃ ūṃ, daha ūṃ ūṃ ūṃ, raṇḍa ūṃ ūṃ ūṃ, phaṭ ūṃ ūṃ ūṃ, hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ, oṃ āḥ hūṃ vaṃ.”

original: de la sdig pa rnams bskyod cong sel bar mdzad pas na tsa le'o //
analyzed: de la sdig pa rnams bskyod cong sel bar mdzad pas na tsa le'o //
translated: There, since it shakes and removes sins, it is caṇḍa.

original: de rnams kyang mi phyed pa'i phyir ldem zhing yang dag par ldem pas na tsu le'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyang mi phyed pa'i phyir ldem zhing yang dag par ldem pas na tsu le'o //
translated: Since they are not divided, they are “bent” and “well bent.”

original: dkar po'i chos rnams kyis 'bar bar byed cing gsal bar byed pas na tsunde'o //
analyzed: dkar po'i chos rnams kyis 'bar bar byed cing gsal bar byed pas na tsunde'o //
translated: Since they illuminate and blaze with virtuous qualities, they are “cundā.”

original: tsunda'i don gyi yi ge tsum mam //
analyzed: tsunda'i don gyi yi ge tsum mam //
translated: The syllable “cundā” means “to be bent” or “to be bent and well bent.”

original: yang na tsa le tsu le tsunde'i don gyi yi ge gsum mo //
analyzed: yang na tsa le tsu le tsunde'i don gyi yi ge gsum mo //
translated: Or, the three syllables “ca le cu le cundā” mean “to be bent, well bent, and very bent.”

original: rdo rje ni sngags thams cad do //
analyzed: rdo rje ni sngags thams cad do //
translated: “Vajra” means all mantras.

original: de rnams kyi dam tshig ni bsdus pa ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyi dam tshig ni bsdus pa ste /
translated: Their “pledge” is their collection.

original: de nyid ni skul byed ma'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni skul byed ma'o //
translated: That itself is “Cundā.”

original: de'i ye shes ni sa bon te /
analyzed: de'i ye shes ni sa bon te /
translated: Her “wisdom” is the seed.

original: de'i 'od zer ni phreng ba'o //
analyzed: de'i 'od zer ni phreng ba'o //
translated: Her “light rays” are the garland.

original: de dag @61a * //
analyzed: de dag @61a * //
translated: They are the “vajra” because they are not divided.

original: la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The samādhi that focuses on them is called that.

original: sdig pa thams cad 'jig pa'o //
analyzed: sdig pa thams cad 'jig pa'o //
translated: It “destroys all evil.”

original: bsam pa thams cad ni nor thams cad kyi bsam pa'o //
analyzed: bsam pa thams cad ni nor thams cad kyi bsam pa'o //
translated: “All wishes” are wishes for all wealth.

original: de'i rdo rje'i longs spyod ni nges par rdzogs par byed pa ste /
analyzed: de'i rdo rje'i longs spyod ni nges par rdzogs par byed pa ste /
translated: Its “vajra enjoyment” is the definite completion.

original: dpal gnod gnas so //
analyzed: dpal gnod gnas so //
translated: It is glorious Śiva.

original: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la ni de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la ni de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The samādhi that focuses on it is called that.

original: ting nge 'dzin de nyid ni ting nge 'dzin rdo rje'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de nyid ni ting nge 'dzin rdo rje'o //
translated: That very meditative concentration is the vajra of meditative concentration.

original: de'i tshul ni thabs so //
analyzed: de'i tshul ni thabs so //
translated: Its method is the means.

original: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The mandala of the Buddhas is the mandala of the moon.

original: rdo rje bsgom pas zhes bya ba ni zla ba de la sa bon gang ba de'i lte bar rdo rje ste dzam bsgoms pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje bsgom pas zhes bya ba ni zla ba de la sa bon gang ba de'i lte bar rdo rje ste dzam bsgoms pa'o //
translated: By meditating on the vajra, one should visualize the seed syllable on that moon, and in its center a vajra marked with the syllable j.

original: sangs rgyas kun zhes pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun zhes pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad do //
translated: All the Buddhas means all the Buddhas.

original: dbab par bya zhes bya ba ni yi ge dzam la bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: dbab par bya zhes bya ba ni yi ge dzam la bsdu ba'o //
translated: One should cause them to descend means that one should gather them into the syllable j.

original: dzam bha ni gnod sbyin chen po zhes bya ba ni ser po'am nag po zla ba'i gdan dang / zla ba'i 'od yod pa mi thung gsus pa che ba rang snang ba'i rig mas 'khyud pa lag pa g-yas gnyis na sa bon gang ba dang ral gri thogs pa /
analyzed: dzam bha ni gnod sbyin chen po zhes bya ba ni ser po'am nag po zla ba'i gdan dang / zla ba'i 'od yod pa mi thung gsus pa che ba rang snang ba'i rig mas 'khyud pa lag pa g-yas gnyis na sa bon gang ba dang ral gri thogs pa /
translated: Jambhana, the great yaksha, is either yellow or black, with a moon seat and a moon radiance. He is a dwarf with a large belly, embraced by a self-arisen knowledge woman. In his two right hands he holds a seed-syllable and a sword.

original: g-yon pa gnyis na rin po che skyug pa'i ne'u le dang padma thogs pa'o //
analyzed: g-yon pa gnyis na rin po che skyug pa'i ne'u le dang padma thogs pa'o //
translated: In his two left hands he holds a mongoose vomiting jewels and a lotus.

original: thor tshugs dang dbu rgyan dang rdo rje can ni sku rdo rje can la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: thor tshugs dang dbu rgyan dang rdo rje can ni sku rdo rje can la sogs pa ste /
translated: The one with the topknot, crown, and vajra is the one with the vajra body, and so on.

original: de dag dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: de dag dang ldan pa'o //
translated: He is endowed with those.

original: gnas lnga dag tu zhes bya ba ni cod pan gyi steng gi bar snang la'o //
analyzed: gnas lnga dag tu zhes bya ba ni cod pan gyi steng gi bar snang la'o //
translated: In the five places means in the space above the crown.

original: cho ga yis zhes bya ba ni lnga po yang rang gi rig pa rjes su mnyes pa'i cho gas gnas pa'o //
analyzed: cho ga yis zhes bya ba ni lnga po yang rang gi rig pa rjes su mnyes pa'i cho gas gnas pa'o //
translated: By the rite means that the five are generated by the rite of pleasing one’s knowledge.

original: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu zhes bya ba ni de dag nyid kyi dga' ba byung ba'i rgyun mi 'chad pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu zhes bya ba ni de dag nyid kyi dga' ba byung ba'i rgyun mi 'chad pa'o //
translated: The vajra nectar water means the uninterrupted stream of the arising of their joy.

original: dbu la zhes bya ba ni spyi bor dbang bskur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbu la zhes bya ba ni spyi bor dbang bskur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: On the head means that the empowerment is conferred on the crown of the head.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'i'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'i'o //
translated: Vajrasattva means Akṣobhya.

original: cho ga yis zhes bya ba ni chu de nyid kyis bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: cho ga yis zhes bya ba ni chu de nyid kyis bskyed pa'o //
translated: By the rite means generated by that water.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas snod la sogs par rmugs 'dzin gyi mdzod spu ru gnas pa yi ge dzam ser po'i 'od zer rnams kyis sgrub pa po kun du 'gengs par byed par bsams la lag pa g-yas pa'i
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas snod la sogs par rmugs 'dzin gyi mdzod spu ru gnas pa yi ge dzam ser po'i 'od zer rnams kyis sgrub pa po kun du 'gengs par byed par bsams la lag pa g-yas pa'i
translated: Similarly, one should imagine that the practitioner is filled with the light rays of the yellow syllable jraṃ, which is located in the hair-treasure of Jambhala, in the vessel, etc., by means of the application of Vajrasattva, etc.

original: sor mo'i rtsa ba rnams la rdo rje chu de bdud rtsir mos par byas la phyi'i chu de'i spyi bor sngags bzla zhing sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: sor mo'i rtsa ba rnams la rdo rje chu de bdud rtsir mos par byas la phyi'i chu de'i spyi bor sngags bzla zhing sbyin par bya'o //
translated: One should imagine that the water of the vajra is nectar, and one should give it on the head of the external water, reciting the mantra.

original: sngags ni aom dzam bha la dza lendr'a ya sv'a h'a /
analyzed: sngags ni aom dzam bha la dza lendr'a ya sv'a h'a /
translated: The mantra is: Oṃ jambhala jalenḍarāya svāhā.

original: rdo rje rgya mtsho ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rgya mtsho ste dpal gnod gnas so //
analyzed: rdo rje rgya mtsho ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rgya mtsho ste dpal gnod gnas so //
translated: Vajra ocean is the ocean of the spirit of enlightenment, which is glorious Acala.

original: de la rdzas bsgrub pa ni nor thob pa la'o //
analyzed: de la rdzas bsgrub pa ni nor thob pa la'o //
translated: The accomplishment of wealth is for the attainment of wealth.

original: de'i don gyi tog gi dpal ni rgyal mtshan mdzes pa'o //
analyzed: de'i don gyi tog gi dpal ni rgyal mtshan mdzes pa'o //
translated: The crest-jewel of that is the glory of the beautiful banner.

original: de'i 'bras bu nyid kyis de gsal bar byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu nyid kyis de gsal bar byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the very fruit of that, it is the very illuminator of that.

original: rdzas sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: rdzas sgrub pa'o //
translated: The accomplishment of wealth.

original: mi zad pa'i 'dod pa ni rdo rje 'dod pa ste /
analyzed: mi zad pa'i 'dod pa ni rdo rje 'dod pa ste /
translated: The inexhaustible desire is the vajra desire.

original: de rnams kyi nye bar longs spyod pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi nye bar longs spyod pa'o //
translated: One should enjoy them.

original: @61b de'i don gyi dpal ni de sgrub par byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: @61b de'i don gyi dpal ni de sgrub par byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The glory of that is the accomplishment of that.

original: de yang khyad par can gyi gnod sbyin mo yin no //
analyzed: de yang khyad par can gyi gnod sbyin mo yin no //
translated: And that is the special yakṣiṇī.

original: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The samādhi that has that as its object is called that.

original: gnod sbyin mo thams cad kyi tshig ni bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: gnod sbyin mo thams cad kyi tshig ni bsdus pa'o //
translated: The word yakṣiṇī is inclusive.

original: de las skyes pa'i rdo rje ni gnod sbyin mo gcig gi gzugs so //
analyzed: de las skyes pa'i rdo rje ni gnod sbyin mo gcig gi gzugs so //
translated: The vajra born from that is the form of a single yakṣiṇī.

original: de'i dam tshig ni sa bon no //
analyzed: de'i dam tshig ni sa bon no //
translated: Her pledge is the seed.

original: mkha' dbyings rdo rje ni de'i mdun gyi nam mkha'o //
analyzed: mkha' dbyings rdo rje ni de'i mdun gyi nam mkha'o //
translated: The vajra space is the space in front of her.

original: rin chen bzhi las byas zhes bya ba ni shar dang lho dang nub dang byang gi ngos rnams shel dang aindra n'i la dang padma r'a ga dang margad la sogs pa'i ri bo'o //
analyzed: rin chen bzhi las byas zhes bya ba ni shar dang lho dang nub dang byang gi ngos rnams shel dang aindra n'i la dang padma r'a ga dang margad la sogs pa'i ri bo'o //
translated: Made from the four jewels means the faces to the east, south, west, and north are mountains of crystal, sapphire, ruby, and emerald, and so on.

original: kun du 'khrigs zhes bya ba ni khyab pa'o //
analyzed: kun du 'khrigs zhes bya ba ni khyab pa'o //
translated: Totally wrapped means pervaded.
