original: rdo rje gsum gyi sbyor bas dbab ces bya ba ni ji skad du bshad pa'i ri bo'i phug gi dbus kyi padma la 'dug pa zla ba'i mtshan ma'i yi ge kshnim ni rdo rje sbyor ba gsum ste /
analyzed: rdo rje gsum gyi sbyor bas dbab ces bya ba ni ji skad du bshad pa'i ri bo'i phug gi dbus kyi padma la 'dug pa zla ba'i mtshan ma'i yi ge kshnim ni rdo rje sbyor ba gsum ste /
translated: The descent by the yoga of the three vajras is as follows: The letter kṣaṇim in the middle of the lotus in the cave of the mountain, as explained, is the three vajra yogas.

original: de la sbyor ba des dbab par bya ste /
analyzed: de la sbyor ba des dbab par bya ste /
translated: One should descend by that yoga.

original: kshnim gi 'od zer rnams kyis bkug nas yi ge kshnim la gzhug par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽gzugs gcig dag ni zhes bya ba ni rgyud gzhan dag gi rjes su 'brangs nas longs spyod ldan ma la sogs pa gnod sbyin mo'am /
analyzed: kshnim gi 'od zer rnams kyis bkug nas yi ge kshnim la gzhug par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to // gzugs gcig dag ni zhes bya ba ni rgyud gzhan dag gi rjes su 'brangs nas longs spyod ldan ma la sogs pa gnod sbyin mo'am /
translated: The meaning is that one should summon with the light rays of kṣaṇim and cause them to enter the letter kṣaṇim.

original: gzhan gang yang rung ba'i gzugs so //
analyzed: gzhan gang yang rung ba'i gzugs so //
translated: One form means the form of a yakṣiṇī such as Bhūcarī, following other tantras, or any other suitable form.

original: de la longs spyod dang ldan pa ni /
analyzed: de la longs spyod dang ldan pa ni /
translated: Bhūcarī is as follows:🔽Bhūcarī is the best of yakṣiṇīs.

original: rin po che'i ri'i phug de nyid na g-yon pas dpag bsam gyi shing de la brten pas g-yas par gdugs dkar po thogs pa gser gyi mdog can ma yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs dang ldan pa dar la bab cing sgeg pas rnam par rol pa'i kha 'dzum pa
analyzed: rin po che'i ri'i phug de nyid na g-yon pas dpag bsam gyi shing de la brten pas g-yas par gdugs dkar po thogs pa gser gyi mdog can ma yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs dang ldan pa dar la bab cing sgeg pas rnam par rol pa'i kha 'dzum pa
translated: In that very cave of the jeweled mountain, she is supported by the wish-fulfilling tree with her left hand, and she holds a white parasol with her right hand. She is golden-colored, has a pleasing form, is youthful, and plays with grace, smiling.

original: can dar la'i stod g-yogs dang smad g-yogs can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: can dar la'i stod g-yogs dang smad g-yogs can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
translated: She wears a silk upper garment and lower garment, and is adorned with all ornaments.

original: kha dog lnga'i me tog phreng bas skra phyed 'khyil ba'i mgo brgyan pa'o //🔽las gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rang nyid 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas te /
analyzed: kha dog lnga'i me tog phreng bas skra phyed 'khyil ba'i mgo brgyan pa'o // las gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rang nyid 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas te /
translated: Her hair is half bound with a garland of flowers of five colors.🔽“The three actions” and so forth.

original: gnod sbyin mo de'i bsam gtan bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: gnod sbyin mo de'i bsam gtan bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should oneself abide in the meditative concentration of Mañjuvajra and meditate on the dākinī.

original: ji lta bu zhig ce na las gsum ste /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhig ce na las gsum ste /
translated: What is she like? She has three actions.

original: las gsum po 'di la yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: las gsum po 'di la yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because she has these three actions.

original: ji ltar na las gsum yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar na las gsum yin zhe na /
translated: How does she have three actions?

original: rdo rje'i bye brag gis te /
analyzed: rdo rje'i bye brag gis te /
translated: By the distinction of the vajras.

original: sku la sogs pa'i dbye bas so //
analyzed: sku la sogs pa'i dbye bas so //
translated: By the distinction of body and so forth.

original: khro bo zhes bya ba ni gshin rje gshed do //
analyzed: khro bo zhes bya ba ni gshin rje gshed do //
translated: The “wrathful one” is Yamāri.

original: sngags kyi tshig ces bya ba ni yi ge kshnim ngo //
analyzed: sngags kyi tshig ces bya ba ni yi ge kshnim ngo //
translated: The “mantra” is the syllable kṣaṇim.

original: rdo rje sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i bde ba la yang dag par sbyor ba ste /
analyzed: rdo rje sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i bde ba la yang dag par sbyor ba ste /
translated: The “vajra union” is the union with the bliss of meditative concentration.

original: 'di dag ni go rims bzhin du de'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las rnams yin no //
analyzed: 'di dag ni go rims bzhin du de'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las rnams yin no //
translated: These are, respectively, his bodily, verbal, and mental actions.

original: gnod sbyin mo thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid ni bsdus pa ste /
analyzed: gnod sbyin mo thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid ni bsdus pa ste /
translated: The “equality of all yakṣiṇīs” is their collection.

original: @62a * // de gnas pa ni bde ba dang yid bde ba'o //
analyzed: @62a * // de gnas pa ni bde ba dang yid bde ba'o //
translated: Their “abiding” is their bliss and mental satisfaction.

original: de bsgom pa yang yin la brtan pa nyid kyis na rdo rje yang yin pa'i phyir de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de bsgom pa yang yin la brtan pa nyid kyis na rdo rje yang yin pa'i phyir de skad ces bya'o //
translated: It is so called because it is the meditation on that, and it is a vajra because of its firmness.

original: gnod sbyin mo'i sgrub pa'i thabs so //
analyzed: gnod sbyin mo'i sgrub pa'i thabs so //
translated: This is the method of achieving the yakṣiṇīs.

original: rdo rje'i sngags thams cad ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams te /🔽de rnams kyi dngos grub po //
analyzed: rdo rje'i sngags thams cad ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams te / de rnams kyi dngos grub po //
translated: All vajra mantras are the buddhas and bodhisattvas.🔽Their “success” is their achievement.

original: de'i rnam par 'phrul pa ni mthu'o //
analyzed: de'i rnam par 'phrul pa ni mthu'o //
translated: Their “emanation” is their power.

original: de la dmigs pa nyid kyi phyir dang dbyer mi phyed pa nyid kyi phyir ting nge 'dzin la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de la dmigs pa nyid kyi phyir dang dbyer mi phyed pa nyid kyi phyir ting nge 'dzin la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: It is called meditative concentration because it is the object of that, and because it is indivisible.

original: dngos grub phra mo zhes bya ba ni dngos grub dman pa'i bya ba'i khyad par ro //
analyzed: dngos grub phra mo zhes bya ba ni dngos grub dman pa'i bya ba'i khyad par ro //
translated: The phrase “minor powers” refers to the special activities of inferior powers.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs yang dag par grub pa ni thob pa'i khyad par ro //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs yang dag par grub pa ni thob pa'i khyad par ro //
translated: The phrase “attainment of the body, speech, and mind” refers to the special attainment.

original: sangs rgyas gzugs ni mtshan la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas gzugs ni mtshan la sogs pa'o //
translated: The phrase “form of the Buddha” refers to the major marks, etc.

original: de 'dzin pa dang 'dra bar 'od byed pas na sangs rgyas gzugs 'dzin 'od bzang bo'o //🔽'dzam bu chu bo'i gser 'od 'dra //
analyzed: de 'dzin pa dang 'dra bar 'od byed pas na sangs rgyas gzugs 'dzin 'od bzang bo'o // 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser 'od 'dra //
translated: The phrase “beautiful light that holds the form of the Buddha” means that he shines like one who holds that form.

original: zhes bya ba ni lus gser gyi mdangs dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni lus gser gyi mdangs dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The phrase “like the light of the Jambu River gold” means that his body has the luster of gold.

original: de ltar su zhig 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar su zhig 'gyur zhe na /
translated: Who is this?

original: dngos grub phra mo dag la gnas pa rnams so //
analyzed: dngos grub phra mo dag la gnas pa rnams so //
translated: It is one who is established in the minor powers.

original: de ltar thun mong gi khyad par gsungs nas thun mong ma yin pa'i rdo rje 'chang ba'i gtso bo ni thugs kyi rdo rje gtso bor gyur ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar thun mong gi khyad par gsungs nas thun mong ma yin pa'i rdo rje 'chang ba'i gtso bo ni thugs kyi rdo rje gtso bor gyur ba'o //
translated: Having thus described the common special qualities, the special qualities of the chief vajra holder are described. The chief vajra holder is the chief of the mind vajra.

original: rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso bo ste /
analyzed: rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso bo ste /
translated: The chief of the knowledge-bearers.

original: gsung rdo rje ni gtso bo yin te /
analyzed: gsung rdo rje ni gtso bo yin te /
translated: The speech-vajra is the chief,

original: cig shos kyis ni gzhan rnams la ni sku rdo rje gtso bo'o //
analyzed: cig shos kyis ni gzhan rnams la ni sku rdo rje gtso bo'o //
translated: and the others have the body-vajra as the chief.

original: bshad ma thag pa'i tshogs gang gis gnod sbyin mo grub pa de ni gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po'o //
analyzed: bshad ma thag pa'i tshogs gang gis gnod sbyin mo grub pa de ni gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po'o //
translated: The Yaksa king is the one who has the accomplishment of the Yaksi, by the assembly just explained.

original: sogs pa smos pas ni bcu gnyis pa las gsungs pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa ste /
analyzed: sogs pa smos pas ni bcu gnyis pa las gsungs pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa ste /
translated: The knowledge-bearers are mentioned by the word “etc.”, and are spoken of in the twelfth chapter.

original: de rnams kyi dngos grub ni gnod sbyin rgyal po la sogs pa grub pa na'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi dngos grub ni gnod sbyin rgyal po la sogs pa grub pa na'o //
translated: Their accomplishment is the accomplishment of the Yaksa king, etc.

original: dngos grub mchog gi bya ba'i khyad par ni /
analyzed: dngos grub mchog gi bya ba'i khyad par ni /
translated: The special activity of the supreme accomplishment is

original: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: stated from “there” (verse 111), etc.

original: thams cad zhu ba'i rang bzhin gyis bcom ldan 'das ni rdo rje thams cad yin la /
analyzed: thams cad zhu ba'i rang bzhin gyis bcom ldan 'das ni rdo rje thams cad yin la /
translated: The Blessed One, who is the nature of the melting of all, is all vajras.

original: de'i dngos grub gsum pa'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: de'i dngos grub gsum pa'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: His accomplishment is the fruit of the third.

original: de'i gzugs dang gsang ba dang sngags kyi dngos grub rnams ni sku dang thugs dang gsung gi khyad par ro //
analyzed: de'i gzugs dang gsang ba dang sngags kyi dngos grub rnams ni sku dang thugs dang gsung gi khyad par ro //
translated: His form, secret, and mantra accomplishments are the distinctions of body, mind, and speech.

original: thams cad ni ma lus pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad ni ma lus pa'o //
translated: “All” means without exception.

original: sngags kyis grub cing zhes bya ba ni sngags te ngag gi bya ba grub pa'o //
analyzed: sngags kyis grub cing zhes bya ba ni sngags te ngag gi bya ba grub pa'o //
translated: The accomplishment of mantra is the accomplishment of mantra, i.e., the activity of speech.

original: mdzes pa'i gzugs ni mtshan dang dpe byad dang ldan pas 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du mthong ba nyid kyis dga' bar 'gyur zhes bya bar sbyor ro //
analyzed: mdzes pa'i gzugs ni mtshan dang dpe byad dang ldan pas 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du mthong ba nyid kyis dga' bar 'gyur zhes bya bar sbyor ro //
translated: The beautiful form is endowed with the major and minor marks, and the entire world is delighted by the mere sight of it.

original: 'dod pa yis zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa tsam gyis 'grub cing zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: 'dod pa yis zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa tsam gyis 'grub cing zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The mere desire is the mere desire, i.e., the mere wish.

original: thams cad kyi mchog bstan pa'i @62b phyir gtsug tor zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: thams cad kyi mchog bstan pa'i @62b phyir gtsug tor zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In order to teach the best of all powers, he says the uṣṇīṣa, etc.

original: yid bzhin nor bu'i bdag por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni dngos grub thams cad kyi rtse mo yin te /
analyzed: yid bzhin nor bu'i bdag por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni dngos grub thams cad kyi rtse mo yin te /
translated: The one who is the lord of the wish-fulfilling jewel is the peak of all powers.

original: chos thams cad la dbang bskur ba'i chos kyi sku'i mtshan nyid can gyi sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ni yid bzhin nor bu'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad la dbang bskur ba'i chos kyi sku'i mtshan nyid can gyi sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ni yid bzhin nor bu'o //
translated: The enlightenment of the Buddha, which has the characteristic of the dharmakāya consecration of all dharmas, is the wish-fulfilling jewel.

original: de'i bdag po ni gtso bo yin te /
analyzed: de'i bdag po ni gtso bo yin te /
translated: The lord of that is the chief,

original: de thob pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de thob pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because of the attainment of that.

original: sangs rgyas byang chub byed pa'i mchog / ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas byang chub de'i thabs phyi ma'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas byang chub byed pa'i mchog / ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas byang chub de'i thabs phyi ma'o //
translated: The supreme means of enlightenment of the Buddhas is the later means of enlightenment of the Buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas rdo rje rab bsgom pa'i //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rdo rje rab bsgom pa'i //
translated: Meditating on the vajra of the Buddhas🔽is the supreme means of enlightenment of the Buddhas.

original: zhes bya ba la sangs rgyas ni dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sangs rgyas ni dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'o //
translated: The Buddhas are the lords of the mandala.

original: de'i rdo rje ni gsang ba gsum po yin la de rnams bsgom pa ni dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rnam par rab tu phye nas bsgom pa ste /
analyzed: de'i rdo rje ni gsang ba gsum po yin la de rnams bsgom pa ni dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rnam par rab tu phye nas bsgom pa ste /
translated: Their vajra is the three secrets, and meditating on them is meditating on the entire mandala, distinguishing it.

original: sgrub pa chen po zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sgrub pa chen po zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning of the great practice.

original: dngos grub thams cad ston par mdzad pa'i phyir bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa de yin la mi slu ba nyid yin pa'i phyir rdo rje yang yin pas na'o //
analyzed: dngos grub thams cad ston par mdzad pa'i phyir bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa de yin la mi slu ba nyid yin pa'i phyir rdo rje yang yin pas na'o //
translated: It is the vajra because it is the fulfillment of all wishes and is also infallible.

original: dngos grub mchog 'dod pa rnams kyis ni yan lag drug gi bsnyen pa dang nye bar bsgrub pa'i 'bras bu la gnas pas rig pa'i brtul zhugs zla ba drug gi bar du spyad la /
analyzed: dngos grub mchog 'dod pa rnams kyis ni yan lag drug gi bsnyen pa dang nye bar bsgrub pa'i 'bras bu la gnas pas rig pa'i brtul zhugs zla ba drug gi bar du spyad la /
translated: Those who desire the supreme spiritual power should practice the conduct of the awareness for six months, abiding in the result of the approximation and the near attainment of the six-branched yoga.

original: de'i 'og tu bsgrub pa brtsam par bya ba de'i phyir 'di'i rig pa'i brtul zhugs brtan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu bsgrub pa brtsam par bya ba de'i phyir 'di'i rig pa'i brtul zhugs brtan pa'i phyir /
translated: Then, one should begin the practice, in order to stabilize the knowledge-mantra conduct of that.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Then, etc.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni sku rdo rje la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni sku rdo rje la sogs pa'o //
translated: All Ones Gone Thus are Body-Vajra, etc.

original: de rnams kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs ni sku la sogs pa dang 'dra ba'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs ni sku la sogs pa dang 'dra ba'o //
translated: Their body, speech, and mind are like body, etc.

original: de dag nyid ni rig pa'i don gyi brtul zhugs yin la /
analyzed: de dag nyid ni rig pa'i don gyi brtul zhugs yin la /
translated: Those are the knowledge-mantra conduct.

original: de yang dag par len pa'i spyod pa nyid ni bla ma las yang dag par blangs pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyis nyams su len pa'o //
analyzed: de yang dag par len pa'i spyod pa nyid ni bla ma las yang dag par blangs pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyis nyams su len pa'o //
translated: The conduct of taking them up is the practice preceded by the proper taking from the guru.

original: rang tshul nyid kyi zhes bya ba ni lugs ma dang byas pa la sogs pa'i gzugs dang bcas pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: rang tshul nyid kyi zhes bya ba ni lugs ma dang byas pa la sogs pa'i gzugs dang bcas pa nyid kyis so //
translated: One's own way is the practice of the body, etc.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rig pa'i brtul zhugs zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rig pa'i brtul zhugs zhes bya ba la /
translated: The knowledge-mantra conduct of body, speech, and mind is as follows.

original: ral pa dang thor tshugs la sogs pa'i sku'i brtul zhugs so //
analyzed: ral pa dang thor tshugs la sogs pa'i sku'i brtul zhugs so //
translated: The conduct of body is the locks, topknots, etc.

original: gnyi ga lha la sogs par mos pa ni gsung gi brtul zhugs so //
analyzed: gnyi ga lha la sogs par mos pa ni gsung gi brtul zhugs so //
translated: The practice of speech is the conviction that both oneself and the deity are the same.

original: rang gi rig ma dang gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba'i shes rab kyi ye shes ni thugs kyi brtul zhugs so //
analyzed: rang gi rig ma dang gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba'i shes rab kyi ye shes ni thugs kyi brtul zhugs so //
translated: The practice of mind is the gnosis of wisdom that arises from the union with one’s consort.

original: thor tshugs dbu rgyan ni lugs ma dang byas pa la sogs pa'i mi bskyod pas brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: thor tshugs dbu rgyan ni lugs ma dang byas pa la sogs pa'i mi bskyod pas brgyan pa'o //
translated: The topknot crown ornament is the adornment of Akṣobhya, whether cast or made.

original: kha dog dkar po 'dra ba ni dkar zhing snum pas yan @63a * //
analyzed: kha dog dkar po 'dra ba ni dkar zhing snum pas yan @63a * //
translated: The color white is the white and oily complexion.

original: lag bcos pa'o //
analyzed: lag bcos pa'o //
translated: The limbs are well formed.

original: cho ga bzhin du thams cad ces bya ba ni lag tu 'khor lo dkar po rtsibs brgyad pa dang / rgyan dang gos srab cing yang la mdzes pa'o //
analyzed: cho ga bzhin du thams cad ces bya ba ni lag tu 'khor lo dkar po rtsibs brgyad pa dang / rgyan dang gos srab cing yang la mdzes pa'o //
translated: “Everything according to the rite” means that in the hand is an eight-spoked white wheel, and the ornaments and thin, light, and beautiful clothes.

original: dpung pa dag la dpung rgyan g-yas pa'i ril bu gsum ste /
analyzed: dpung pa dag la dpung rgyan g-yas pa'i ril bu gsum ste /
translated: On the shoulders are shoulder ornaments, and on the right armlet are three pellets.

original: lus dang ngag dang sems bsrung ba'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par gtad pa'o //
analyzed: lus dang ngag dang sems bsrung ba'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par gtad pa'o //
translated: In order to protect body, speech, and mind, it is entrusted by all the buddhas.

original: sngags kyi sdom pa ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i sdom pa'i tshigs su bcad pa ste /
analyzed: sngags kyi sdom pa ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i sdom pa'i tshigs su bcad pa ste /
translated: The mantra vow is the verse of the vow that will be explained.

original: des bla ma las yang dag par mnos pa'o //
analyzed: des bla ma las yang dag par mnos pa'o //
translated: He has received it well from the guru.

original: rgyan rnams kun ni rin thang med pa shin tu mdzes pa'o //
analyzed: rgyan rnams kun ni rin thang med pa shin tu mdzes pa'o //
translated: All ornaments are priceless and very beautiful.

original: spyan gyi go 'phang ni gzugs so //
analyzed: spyan gyi go 'phang ni gzugs so //
translated: The state of the eyes is form.

original: longs spyod ni rin po che'i cod pan la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: longs spyod ni rin po che'i cod pan la sogs pa'o //
translated: Enjoyment is the jeweled crown, etc.

original: rdo rje ni cod pan la 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje ni cod pan la 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
translated: The vajra is Amitābha on the crown.

original: mtshan ma ni lag pa'i 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: mtshan ma ni lag pa'i 'khor lo'o //
translated: The sign is the wheel on the hand.

original: phyag rgya'i cho ga ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa bsgom pa'i cho ga'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya'i cho ga ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa bsgom pa'i cho ga'o //
translated: The rite of the seal is the rite of meditation on the great seal, etc.

original: sngags kyi cho ga ni bzlas pa'i cho ga'o //
analyzed: sngags kyi cho ga ni bzlas pa'i cho ga'o //
translated: The rite of the mantra is the rite of repetition.

original: sngags kyi rab tu sbyor ba ni sngags kyi rgyud de de rnams la legs par bslabs pa ni slob mar yang dag par byas pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sngags kyi rab tu sbyor ba ni sngags kyi rgyud de de rnams la legs par bslabs pa ni slob mar yang dag par byas pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The application of the mantra is the mantra tantra. Having trained well in those, he is said to be a disciple who has been made ready.

original: sangs rgyas 'gyur zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad du'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas 'gyur zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad du'o //
translated: He will become a buddha means he will become Vairocana.

original: zla ba drug gis zhes bya ba ni brtul zhugs kyi dus su'o //
analyzed: zla ba drug gis zhes bya ba ni brtul zhugs kyi dus su'o //
translated: In six months means in the time of the vow.

original: rtag tu gzhan gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'di ni sngags kyi sdom pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'o //
analyzed: rtag tu gzhan gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'di ni sngags kyi sdom pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'o //
translated: This verse beginning with “always with others” is a verse on the mantra vow.

original: rku ba ni rang gi lha'i cha lugs 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: rku ba ni rang gi lha'i cha lugs 'dzin pa'o //
translated: Stealing is to assume one’s own deity’s appearance.

original: bsad pa ni lhar mos pas tha mal ba'i nga rgyal lo //
analyzed: bsad pa ni lhar mos pas tha mal ba'i nga rgyal lo //
translated: Killing is to destroy the pride of ordinariness through devotion to the deity.

original: 'dod chags rdo rje ni ji skad du bshad pa'i rig pa dang / gnyis su med par sbyor ba las byung ba chos kyi dbyings so sor rtog pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags rdo rje ni ji skad du bshad pa'i rig pa dang / gnyis su med par sbyor ba las byung ba chos kyi dbyings so sor rtog pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: Passion Vajra is the cultivation of the realization of the realm of phenomena that arises from the union of the previously explained knowledge and the nondual union.

original: de nyid ni gnas te bla na med pa'i bde ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni gnas te bla na med pa'i bde ba'o //
translated: That itself is the abode, which is unexcelled bliss.

original: de la spyad pa ni longs spyod pa'o ;🔽/ sdom pa 'dis ni kun du bsdams //
analyzed: de la spyad pa ni longs spyod pa'o ; / sdom pa 'dis ni kun du bsdams //
translated: To enjoy that is to enjoy passion.🔽“By this vow, one is restrained.”

original: zhes bya ba ni nga yi sdom pa 'di rnams yang dag par blangs pas na kun du bsdams pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni nga yi sdom pa 'di rnams yang dag par blangs pas na kun du bsdams pa'o //
translated: By taking up these vows of mine, one is restrained.

original: rnam par snang mdzad kyi rig pa'i brtul zhugs gsungs nas 'od dpag tu med pa dang mi bskyod pa dag gis gsungs pa la /
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad kyi rig pa'i brtul zhugs gsungs nas 'od dpag tu med pa dang mi bskyod pa dag gis gsungs pa la /
translated: Having taught the observances of Vairocana, he teaches those of Amitābha and Akṣobhya.

original: 'dod chags rdo rje ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags rdo rje ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
translated: Passion Vajra is Amitābha.

original: de'i lcags kyu mo ni 'gugs par byed pa ste gos dkar mo'o //
analyzed: de'i lcags kyu mo ni 'gugs par byed pa ste gos dkar mo'o //
translated: Her iron hook is the one that attracts, which is Pāṇḍaravāsinī.

original: yon tan ska rags zhes bya ba 'di sangs rgyas kyi yon tan nyid kyi ska rags mnga' bas na de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: yon tan ska rags zhes bya ba 'di sangs rgyas kyi yon tan nyid kyi ska rags mnga' bas na de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The one called “girdle of good qualities” is so called because she possesses the very girdle of the good qualities of the Buddha.

original: gsung gi rdo rje ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
analyzed: gsung gi rdo rje ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
translated: Vāgvajra is Amitābha.

original: thugs mchog ni mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: thugs mchog ni mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: The supreme mind is Akṣobhya.

original: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i @63b rig ma gnyis so //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i @63b rig ma gnyis so //
translated: “This” refers to the two consorts just mentioned.

original: rnam pa kun du zhes bya ba ni gnyi ga'i ral pa dang cod pan la sogs pa'i rnam pa thams cad snga ma dang rjes su mthun par go sla be'o //
analyzed: rnam pa kun du zhes bya ba ni gnyi ga'i ral pa dang cod pan la sogs pa'i rnam pa thams cad snga ma dang rjes su mthun par go sla be'o //
translated: “In every way” means that all the aspects of the hair, crown, etc. , of both are similar to the previous ones, and are easy to understand.

original: yon tan dang ldan pa'i phyir rig ma ma rnyed pa'am /
analyzed: yon tan dang ldan pa'i phyir rig ma ma rnyed pa'am /
translated: If one does not find a consort endowed with good qualities,

original: sgrub pa po'i phyi'i rig ma 'ga' zhig gis rgyab kyis phyogs na ji ltar bya zhe na /
analyzed: sgrub pa po'i phyi'i rig ma 'ga' zhig gis rgyab kyis phyogs na ji ltar bya zhe na /
translated: or if one’s external consort turns away, what should one do?

original: bsam gtan zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs la yang na zhes bya ba ni phyogs gzhan zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bsam gtan zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs la yang na zhes bya ba ni phyogs gzhan zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: “Meditation” and so forth is said. “Or” means “another way.”

original: rang gi phyag rgya'am zhes bya ba'i sgras ni nges par gzung ba ste /
analyzed: rang gi phyag rgya'am zhes bya ba'i sgras ni nges par gzung ba ste /
translated: The word “only” indicates a restriction.

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i rang gi snang ba kho na yin gyi phyi rol gyi ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i rang gi snang ba kho na yin gyi phyi rol gyi ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It means that it is only the innate appearance, not the external.

original: de nyid kyi phyir bsam gtan zhes bya ba gsungs te ;
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir bsam gtan zhes bya ba gsungs te ;
translated: Therefore, it is said, “meditation.”

original: yid kyi rang bzhin can zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yid kyi rang bzhin can zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It means that it is of the nature of the mind.

original: bsam zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du spyan la sogs pa'i gzugs su'o //
analyzed: bsam zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du spyan la sogs pa'i gzugs su'o //
translated: “ Contemplation” is as before, in the form of Locanā, etc.

original: yig gsum rdo rje can zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i yi ge gsum mo //
analyzed: yig gsum rdo rje can zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i yi ge gsum mo //
translated: “ The three syllables with the vajra” are the three syllables of Vairocana, etc.

original: de rnams kyi rdo rje ni sku la sogs pa dang 'dra ba'i ral pa dang / cod pan la sogs pa de dang bdag nyid ldan pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi rdo rje ni sku la sogs pa dang 'dra ba'i ral pa dang / cod pan la sogs pa de dang bdag nyid ldan pa'o //
translated: Their vajra is the topknot, crown, etc., which is like the body, etc. It is endowed with that.

original: gal te phyi rol gyi rig ma ma mthong ba de'i tshe ji ltar sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gal te phyi rol gyi rig ma ma mthong ba de'i tshe ji ltar sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If one does not see an external knowledge-woman, then how can the Buddhas be pleased?

original: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In response, it is said, “Thus, etc.”

original: de rnams ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin pa'i phyir de rnams kyi rang bzhin can gyi rig ma dang sems brtan par gzigs pa na /
analyzed: de rnams ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin pa'i phyir de rnams kyi rang bzhin can gyi rig ma dang sems brtan par gzigs pa na /
translated: Since they are omniscience itself, when he sees the knowledge consort and the mind that have their nature as stable,

original: shin tu mnyes par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: shin tu mnyes par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: he becomes very pleased, is the idea.

original: rdo rje zhes bya ba ni bsnyen pa dang nye ba'i sgrub pa dag gis rdo rje gsum du grub pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje zhes bya ba ni bsnyen pa dang nye ba'i sgrub pa dag gis rdo rje gsum du grub pa'o //
translated: The vajra is the accomplishment of the three vajras by means of the service and the nearby attainment.

original: 'das dang zhes bya ba ni bskyod pa'am nyams pa'o //
analyzed: 'das dang zhes bya ba ni bskyod pa'am nyams pa'o //
translated: The past is the shaking or the loss.

original: rdo rje'i yi ge ni 'dod pa dang thar ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje'i yi ge ni 'dod pa dang thar ba'o //
translated: The vajra syllable is the desire and the liberation.

original: 'jig par 'gyur ba ni 'jig pa thob par 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: 'jig par 'gyur ba ni 'jig pa thob par 'gyur ba ste /
translated: The destruction is the attainment of destruction,

original: 'grub par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'grub par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: that is, the non-accomplishment, is the idea.

original: rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes ni rtog pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes ni rtog pa'o //
translated: The knowledge of the three vajras is the conception.

original: de'i don ston cing goms pa gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i don ston cing goms pa gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: He who has the teaching and the practice of that is so called.

original: tshul chen yin pa ni thabs chen po yin pa'o //
analyzed: tshul chen yin pa ni thabs chen po yin pa'o //
translated: The great method is the great means.

original: rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes 'byung //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes 'byung //
translated: The arising of the knowledge of the three vajras

original: zhes bya ba ni skyes pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni skyes pa'o //
translated: is the birth.

original: rig pa'i brtul zhugs nyid ni dam tshig gi de kho na nyid de /
analyzed: rig pa'i brtul zhugs nyid ni dam tshig gi de kho na nyid de /
translated: The reality of the pledge is the reality of the pledge,

original: dam tshig gi mchog go //
analyzed: dam tshig gi mchog go //
translated: which is the supreme pledge.

original: de nyid ni rdo rje ste /
analyzed: de nyid ni rdo rje ste /
translated: That is the vajra,

original: dngos grub kyi sgrib pa thams cad 'jig par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos grub kyi sgrib pa thams cad 'jig par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it destroys all obscurations to power.

original: de ston par mdzad pa nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das la yang de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ston par mdzad pa nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das la yang de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The Blessed One is so called because he teaches that.

original: dngos grub thams cad kyi don gyi dkyil 'khor te /🔽de'i rdo rje ni gsang ba'i las rnams so //
analyzed: dngos grub thams cad kyi don gyi dkyil 'khor te / de'i rdo rje ni gsang ba'i las rnams so //
translated: The mandala of the meaning of all powers
is the vajra of that, which is the secret actions.🔽That

original: rnams kyi mngon par byang chub pa ni ma lus par yang dag par rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: rnams kyi mngon par byang chub pa ni ma lus par yang dag par rtogs pa'o //
translated: is the manifest enlightenment of them, the complete realization of them.

original: de'i don gyi le'u la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i don gyi le'u la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The chapter having that meaning is called that.

original: gsang ba 'dus pa'i bshad sbyar snyim pa'i me tog las le'u bcu drug pa'o /
analyzed: gsang ba 'dus pa'i bshad sbyar snyim pa'i me tog las le'u bcu drug pa'o /
translated: This is the sixteenth chapter of the commentary on the Guhyasamaja called Padmavati.

original: // / bcu bdun pa ni sgrub pa chen po'i le'u yin pa de bas na 'di ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de kho na nyid rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rang bzhin gyi ting nge 'dzin gsum dang dam tshig ni brjod par bya ba yin
analyzed: // / bcu bdun pa ni sgrub pa chen po'i le'u yin pa de bas na 'di ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de kho na nyid rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rang bzhin gyi ting nge 'dzin gsum dang dam tshig ni brjod par bya ba yin
translated: 17. The chapter on great practice. Therefore, this is the topic to be expressed, namely, the three samadhis and the commitments of the nature of Vajradhara, the reality of the buddhas and bodhisattvas.

original: no // de la ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa dang / ji ltar ston par mdzad pa de gnyi ga'i skabs dbye bar bya ba'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /
analyzed: no // de la ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa dang / ji ltar ston par mdzad pa de gnyi ga'i skabs dbye bar bya ba'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /
translated: In that regard, in order to open the section on both the supplication of the bhagavat by all tathagatas and how he teaches, it says “then” and so forth.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni sngags kyi lha thams cad de de rnams kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni sngags kyi lha thams cad de de rnams kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs so //
translated: All tathagatas are all mantra deities, and their body, speech, and mind.

original: de rnams kyi rdo rje ni de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: de rnams kyi rdo rje ni de bzhin nyid do //
translated: Their vajra is thusness.

original: de'i rang bzhin can nyid yin pa'i phyir rdo rje 'dzin pa la yang de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin can nyid yin pa'i phyir rdo rje 'dzin pa la yang de skad ces bya'o //
translated: Because he has the nature of that, he is called Vajradhara.

original: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba nyid yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba nyid yin pa'i phyir /
translated: because of being naturally luminous.

original: rtag tu de bzhin du gnas pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
analyzed: rtag tu de bzhin du gnas pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
translated: The one who always abides thus is the Tathāgata.

original: de la gsol ba btab pa ni de lta bur gyur ba de nyid ston pa nyid du'o //
analyzed: de la gsol ba btab pa ni de lta bur gyur ba de nyid ston pa nyid du'o //
translated: The supplication is to that very one, to the Teacher.

original: ji ltar zhe na mi bskyod ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /🔽lnga pos bsdus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni lnga po de dag yin la /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na mi bskyod ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te / lnga pos bsdus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni lnga po de dag yin la /
translated: How so? He says “Akṣobhya,” and so on.🔽The five are all the Tathāgatas subsumed by the five, and their three realities are the three vajras.

original: de dag gi de kho na nyid gsum ni rdo rje gsum po yin zhing de kho na nyid kyang de bzhin nyid yin pa de bas na /
analyzed: de dag gi de kho na nyid gsum ni rdo rje gsum po yin zhing de kho na nyid kyang de bzhin nyid yin pa de bas na /
translated: Since that reality is suchness,🔽the Blessed One, who is the Teacher of that sort, is to be saluted.

original: de lta bur gyur ba'i bdag nyid can ston par mdzad pa'i bcom ldan 'das khyed la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'i don to //
analyzed: de lta bur gyur ba'i bdag nyid can ston par mdzad pa'i bcom ldan 'das khyed la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'i don to //
translated: This is the condensed meaning.

original: yan lag gi don brjod par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: yan lag gi don brjod par bya ba yin te /
translated: The meaning of the branches should be stated.

original: de la bsdus pa'i don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de la bsdus pa'i don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The condensed meaning is as follows.

original: tshigs bcad so so zhing khyod phyag 'tshal zhes pas ni phyag gi mchod pa bstan la bod pa'i tshig thams cad nyid kyis ston pa yin no //
analyzed: tshigs bcad so so zhing khyod phyag 'tshal zhes pas ni phyag gi mchod pa bstan la bod pa'i tshig thams cad nyid kyis ston pa yin no //
translated: The phrase I bow to you in each verse indicates the offering of prostration, and all the Tibetan words indicate the teacher.

original: de la dang pos ni bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de kho na nyid kyi tshul du ston pa yin la /
analyzed: de la dang pos ni bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de kho na nyid kyi tshul du ston pa yin la /
translated: Among them, the first one indicates the Bhagavat Akṣhobhya, etc., in the manner of reality.

original: lnga bos ni de nyid bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: lnga bos ni de nyid bshad pa yin no //
translated: The five indicate the explanation of that reality.

original: ji ltar bshad ce na /
analyzed: ji ltar bshad ce na /
translated: How is it explained?

original: gcig gis ni mtshan nyid yin la bzhis ni mtshan nyid kyi rigs pas so //
analyzed: gcig gis ni mtshan nyid yin la bzhis ni mtshan nyid kyi rigs pas so //
translated: One verse is the definition, and four are the reasoning of the definition.

original: bdun pas ni sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i gsang ba'i tshul gsungs pa yin la /
analyzed: bdun pas ni sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i gsang ba'i tshul gsungs pa yin la /
translated: The seventh verse states the secret method of the vajra body, etc.

original: bstod pa lnga ba'i brgyad pas ni rdo rje 'chang gi bdag nyid can gyi gsang ba'i tshul nyid du gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: bstod pa lnga ba'i brgyad pas ni rdo rje 'chang gi bdag nyid can gyi gsang ba'i tshul nyid du gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The eighth of the five praises states the secret method which has the nature of Vajradhara.

original: @64b dbyangs dang ston pa dang gsung zhes bya ba tshig bcad kyi bdun pas ni gsol ba 'debs pa ste /
analyzed: @64b dbyangs dang ston pa dang gsung zhes bya ba tshig bcad kyi bdun pas ni gsol ba 'debs pa ste /
translated: The seventh verse of the praise, with the words melody, teacher, and speech, is the request.

original: ston par mdzad ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ston par mdzad ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of may you teach is may you be the teacher.

original: ci zhig ston ce na /
analyzed: ci zhig ston ce na /
translated: What is being taught?

original: skabs nyid yin pa'i phyir bdag nyid kyi de kho na nyid do //
analyzed: skabs nyid yin pa'i phyir bdag nyid kyi de kho na nyid do //
translated: The reality of the self, because it is the occasion.

original: spros pa'i rgyu mtshan thams cad kyis rnyog par bya bar mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir mi bskyod pa yang de yin la /
analyzed: spros pa'i rgyu mtshan thams cad kyis rnyog par bya bar mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir mi bskyod pa yang de yin la /
translated: It is also unshakable, because it cannot be disturbed by any reason for conceptual proliferation.

original: brtan pa yang yin pa'i phyir rdo rje yang yin pa de ltar na mi bskyod pa rdo rje'o //
analyzed: brtan pa yang yin pa'i phyir rdo rje yang yin pa de ltar na mi bskyod pa rdo rje'o //
translated: It is also a vajra, because it is firm. Thus, it is the unshakable vajra.

original: sna tshogs pa ye shes tsam du mthong bas na ye shes chen po ste /
analyzed: sna tshogs pa ye shes tsam du mthong bas na ye shes chen po ste /
translated: It is the great wisdom, because it sees the variety as just wisdom.

original: ye shes chen po ni mi bskyod pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: ye shes chen po ni mi bskyod pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: The great wisdom is the characteristic called the unshakable vajra.

original: mtshan nyid de'i rigs pa ni rdo rje dbyings dang mkhas pa che dang / rdo rje gsum mchog dang dkyil 'khor gsum zhes bya ba rnams so //
analyzed: mtshan nyid de'i rigs pa ni rdo rje dbyings dang mkhas pa che dang / rdo rje gsum mchog dang dkyil 'khor gsum zhes bya ba rnams so //
translated: The reason for that characteristic is the vajra realm, the great skill, the three supreme vajras, and the three mandalas.

original: rdo rje ni gzhi gnas bzhi ste /
analyzed: rdo rje ni gzhi gnas bzhi ste /
translated: The vajra is the four abodes of consciousness.

original: des sems 'dzin pas na rdo rje dbyings so //
analyzed: des sems 'dzin pas na rdo rje dbyings so //
translated: Since it holds the mind, it is the vajra realm.

original: de kho na nyid rig pa'i lhag mthong bzhi ni de rnams kyis mkhas pa che'o //
analyzed: de kho na nyid rig pa'i lhag mthong bzhi ni de rnams kyis mkhas pa che'o //
translated: The four vipaśyanā knowledges of reality are the great skill in those.

original: de nyid snying po bsdus pas dkyil 'khor te /🔽dbye ba gsum gyi dkyil 'khor dang bsdus pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid snying po bsdus pas dkyil 'khor te / dbye ba gsum gyi dkyil 'khor dang bsdus pa ste /
translated: The mandala is the essence of that, because it is a collection.🔽The mandala is threefold, and it is included in the fourth.🔽The three mandalas are the three vajras, and the fourth is the supreme three vajras.🔽The supreme three vajras are the mandala of the three vajras, because they are the supreme vajras.

original: bzhi bar bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor dag ni dkyil 'khor gsum mo //🔽rdo rje gsum dang de bzhin du bzhi pa dag gis tshogs yang dag par bsdus pa ni rdo rje gsum mchog go //
analyzed: bzhi bar bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor dag ni dkyil 'khor gsum mo // rdo rje gsum dang de bzhin du bzhi pa dag gis tshogs yang dag par bsdus pa ni rdo rje gsum mchog go //
translated: The supreme three vajras are the supreme three vajras, because they are the supreme of the three vajras.🔽The supreme three vajras are the supreme three vajras, because they are the supreme of the three vajras.🔽The supreme three vajras are the supreme three vajras, because they are the supreme of the three vajras.🔽The supreme three vajras are the supreme three vajras, because they are the supreme of the three vajras.🔽The supreme three vajras are the supreme three vajras, because they are the supreme of the three vajras.🔽The supreme three vajras are the supreme three vajras, because they are the supreme of the three vajras.🔽The supreme three vajras are the supreme three vajras, because they are the supreme of the three vajras.🔽The supreme three vajras are the supreme three vajras, because they are the supreme of the three vajras.🔽The supreme three vajras are the supreme three vajras, because they are the supreme of the three vajras.🔽The supreme three vajras are the supreme three vajras, because they are the supreme of the three vajras.🔽The supreme three vajras are the supreme three vajras, because they are the supreme of the three vajras.🔽The supreme three vajras are the supreme three vajras, because they are the supreme of the three vajras.🔽The supreme three vajras are the supreme three vajras, because they are the supreme of the three vajras.

original: thugs kyi gsang ba yin pa'i phyir rdo rje'o //🔽khyab par gsal ba'i byang chub rtog pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par snang mdzad de rang gi don la aa n'i rkyen byas pas rnam par snang mdzad do //
analyzed: thugs kyi gsang ba yin pa'i phyir rdo rje'o // khyab par gsal ba'i byang chub rtog pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par snang mdzad de rang gi don la aa n'i rkyen byas pas rnam par snang mdzad do //
translated: The supreme three vajras are the supreme three vajras, because they are the supreme of the three vajras.

original: rang bzhin sna tshogs ye shes tsam gyis snang ba yin pas dag pa che ste /🔽'di ni de'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin sna tshogs ye shes tsam gyis snang ba yin pas dag pa che ste / 'di ni de'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: The supreme three vajras are the supreme three vajras, because they are the supreme of the three vajras.🔽The supreme three vajras are the supreme three vajras, because they are the supreme of the three vajras.🔽The supreme three vajras are the supreme three vajras, because they are the supreme of the three vajras.🔽The supreme three vajras are the supreme three vajras, because they are the supreme of the three vajras.

original: de'i rigs pa ni rdo rje zhi ba dang / dga' ba che dang rang bzhin 'od gsal dang / mchog gi mchog ces bya ba rnams so //
analyzed: de'i rigs pa ni rdo rje zhi ba dang / dga' ba che dang rang bzhin 'od gsal dang / mchog gi mchog ces bya ba rnams so //
translated: The supreme three vajras are the

original: rdo rje ni 'byung ba'i dbang po dang / 'byung ba las gyur ba'i dbang po rnams so //
analyzed: rdo rje ni 'byung ba'i dbang po dang / 'byung ba las gyur ba'i dbang po rnams so //
translated: The vajra is the sense faculties of the elements and the sense faculties derived from the elements.

original: de gnyi ga lnga par bsdus pa ni rdo rje zhi ba'o //
analyzed: de gnyi ga lnga par bsdus pa ni rdo rje zhi ba'o //
translated: The two of them are included in the five, which is the vajra peace.

original: gnyis med par chos kyi dang sna tshogs pa'i gzugs kyis rol pas na dga' ba che'o //
analyzed: gnyis med par chos kyi dang sna tshogs pa'i gzugs kyis rol pas na dga' ba che'o //
translated: Since he plays with nondual phenomena and various forms, he is great joy.

original: rnag bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba ni gdan rnam pa lnga'o //
analyzed: rnag bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba ni gdan rnam pa lnga'o //
translated: The five kinds of seats are naturally luminous.

original: de rnams kyi mchog ni 'dus pa ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyi mchog ni 'dus pa ste /
translated: The supreme of those is the assembly.

original: de bas na mchog gi mchog go //
analyzed: de bas na mchog gi mchog go //
translated: Therefore, he is the supreme of the supreme.

original: sku'i gsang ba yin pa'i phyir rdo rje'o //
analyzed: sku'i gsang ba yin pa'i phyir rdo rje'o //
translated: Since it is the secret of the body, it is the vajra.

original: sems kyi rin po che yin pas na rin chen no //
analyzed: sems kyi rin po che yin pas na rin chen no //
translated: Since it is the precious mind, it is the jewel.

original: nor gyi bdag po yin pas na rgyal po ste /
analyzed: nor gyi bdag po yin pas na rgyal po ste /
translated: Since it is the lord of wealth, it is the king.

original: rin chen rgyal po'o //🔽dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams dang 'brel ba'i sku dang gsung dang @65a * //
analyzed: rin chen rgyal po'o // dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams dang 'brel ba'i sku dang gsung dang @65a * //
translated: Therefore, it is the precious king.

original: thugs bsdus pa'i zab mo yang bsdus pas na rab ni rab tu zab ste /
analyzed: thugs bsdus pa'i zab mo yang bsdus pas na rab ni rab tu zab ste /
translated: Since it is the profound collection of the body, speech, and mind of the buddhas of the three times, it is the very profound.

original: de bas na shin tu zab pa 'di la yod pas rab tu zab mo ste /
analyzed: de bas na shin tu zab pa 'di la yod pas rab tu zab mo ste /
translated: Since it is the most profound of all, it is the very profound.

original: 'di ni mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: 'di ni mtshan nyid do //
translated: This is the definition.

original: rigs pa ni rdo rje dang / nam mkha' dri ma med dang / rang bzhin dag pa dang / gos pa med ces bya ba rnams te /
analyzed: rigs pa ni rdo rje dang / nam mkha' dri ma med dang / rang bzhin dag pa dang / gos pa med ces bya ba rnams te /
translated: The reasonings are the vajra, the stainless space, the pure nature, and the uncontaminated.

original: mkha' dang mtshungs par rig bya rnams bsdus pas na rdo rje mkha'o //
analyzed: mkha' dang mtshungs par rig bya rnams bsdus pas na rdo rje mkha'o //
translated: The vajra space is the vajra because it is the space that includes the vajra.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings nang du chud pa'i nam mkha' dri ma med pa 'di la yod pas na nam mkha' dri ma med do //🔽rang bzhin zhes bya ba la rang ni bdag ste sku'o //🔽de rnams kyi rang bzhin ni rang gi mtshan nyid do //🔽dag pa ni de rnams bsdus pa'i stong pa nyid de /
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings nang du chud pa'i nam mkha' dri ma med pa 'di la yod pas na nam mkha' dri ma med do // rang bzhin zhes bya ba la rang ni bdag ste sku'o // de rnams kyi rang bzhin ni rang gi mtshan nyid do // dag pa ni de rnams bsdus pa'i stong pa nyid de /
translated: The stainless space is stainless space because it exists in the stainless space that is included in the extremely pure dharmadhatu.

original: de'i phyir rang bzhin dag pa nyid do //
analyzed: de'i phyir rang bzhin dag pa nyid do //
translated: The pure nature is the pure nature because it is the emptiness that includes those.

original: phra mo gsum po bsdus pa de rnams dmigs pas na gos pa med pa'o //
analyzed: phra mo gsum po bsdus pa de rnams dmigs pas na gos pa med pa'o //
translated: The uncontaminated is uncontaminated because it is the object of those three subtle ones.

original: gsung gi gsang ba yin pa'i phyir gsang ba'o //
analyzed: gsung gi gsang ba yin pa'i phyir gsang ba'o //
translated: It is secret because it is the secret of speech.

original: 'od kyi snang ba dpag tu med pas so sor rtog pa 'di la yod pas na 'od dpag tu med de tshig dang po mi mngon pa'o //
analyzed: 'od kyi snang ba dpag tu med pas so sor rtog pa 'di la yod pas na 'od dpag tu med de tshig dang po mi mngon pa'o //
translated: It is Amitābha, because it has the discernment of infinite light. The first word is not pronounced.

original: brtan pas rdo rje ste /
analyzed: brtan pas rdo rje ste /
translated: It is Vajra, because it is firm.

original: rdo rje yang yin la 'od dpag tu med pa yang yin no //
analyzed: rdo rje yang yin la 'od dpag tu med pa yang yin no //
translated: It is Amitābha, because it is Vajra and also Amitābha.

original: mchod pa ni rgyal po yin la shin tu mchod pas na rgyal po che'o //
analyzed: mchod pa ni rgyal po yin la shin tu mchod pas na rgyal po che'o //
translated: It is Rāja, because it is worship. It is Mahārāja, because it is great worship.

original: ji ltar na shin tu mchod pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar na shin tu mchod pa yin zhe na /
translated: How is it great worship?

original: rin po ches chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du gzhag pa la /
analyzed: rin po ches chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du gzhag pa la /
translated: It is the arrangement of all dharmas in equality by means of the jewels.

original: de rnams dang de dag gi ming dang blo rnams mi dmigs pas yang dag par mtshon pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rnams dang de dag gi ming dang blo rnams mi dmigs pas yang dag par mtshon pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is the true indication of those and their names and thoughts by the nonapprehension of them.

original: 'di ni mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: 'di ni mtshan nyid do //
translated: This is the definition.

original: rigs pa ni mi rtog pa nam mkha' rdo rje 'dzin dang / 'dod chags dang / pha rol phyin pa brnyes zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rigs pa ni mi rtog pa nam mkha' rdo rje 'dzin dang / 'dod chags dang / pha rol phyin pa brnyes zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The reasoning is: nonconceptuality, space, vajra-holder, passion, and attainment of perfection.

original: rang gi snying ga'i sngags tsam du blta bas na rnam par mi rtog pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi snying ga'i sngags tsam du blta bas na rnam par mi rtog pa'o //
translated: It is nonconceptual, because it is seen as just the mantra in one’s heart.

original: der nam mkha' ni sngags kyi thig le'o //
analyzed: der nam mkha' ni sngags kyi thig le'o //
translated: There, space is the mantra drop.

original: der sems kyis rin po che 'dzin pas na nam mkha' rdo rje 'dzin no //
analyzed: der sems kyis rin po che 'dzin pas na nam mkha' rdo rje 'dzin no //
translated: Since the mind holds the jewel there, it is the vajra-holder of space.

original: de'i rjes la rang gi sngags su sngags gsum po rim bzhin du bcug ste /
analyzed: de'i rjes la rang gi sngags su sngags gsum po rim bzhin du bcug ste /
translated: After that, one should insert the three mantras into one's own mantra, in order.

original: gsang ba gsum dang de bsdus pa'i nor bur gyur ba'i mtshan nyid la shin tu chags pas 'dod chags so //
analyzed: gsang ba gsum dang de bsdus pa'i nor bur gyur ba'i mtshan nyid la shin tu chags pas 'dod chags so //
translated: Since one is very attached to the characteristics of the three secrets and the jewel that subsumes them, it is passion.

original: de nas sngags rnams bsdus pa'i thig le la sems kyi rin po che nges par bya ste /
analyzed: de nas sngags rnams bsdus pa'i thig le la sems kyi rin po che nges par bya ste /
translated: Then, one should definitely make the mind's jewel into a drop that subsumes the mantras.

original: yun ring du brtan par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid ni mchog tu song bas na pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes so //
analyzed: yun ring du brtan par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid ni mchog tu song bas na pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes so //
translated: Since it is characterized by stability for a long time, it is supreme, and thus one attains perfection.

original: gsung gi gsang ba yin pa'i phyir rdo rje'o //
analyzed: gsung gi gsang ba yin pa'i phyir rdo rje'o //
translated: It is a vajra because it is the secret of speech.

original: thams cad du 'gro ba'i don grub pa nyid la yod pas na don yod grub pa ste /
analyzed: thams cad du 'gro ba'i don grub pa nyid la yod pas na don yod grub pa ste /
translated: Since it exists in the accomplishment of the meaning that goes everywhere, it is Amoghasiddhi.

original: tshig tha @65b ma mi mngon pas na don yod do //🔽de yang yin la brtan pa'i phyir rdo rje yang yin te /
analyzed: tshig tha @65b ma mi mngon pas na don yod do // de yang yin la brtan pa'i phyir rdo rje yang yin te /
translated: Since the final syllable is not pronounced, it is amogha.🔽Moreover, it is a vajra because it is stable.

original: des na don yod rdo rje'o //
analyzed: des na don yod rdo rje'o //
translated: Therefore, it is Amoghavajra.

original: ma lus par rtogs pas na rdzogs sangs rgyas te /
analyzed: ma lus par rtogs pas na rdzogs sangs rgyas te /
translated: Perfect Buddhahood is the realization of all things in their variety and suchness.

original: 'di ni mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: 'di ni mtshan nyid do //
translated: This is the definition.

original: rigs pa ni bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa dang yang dag pa dang ngo bo nyid dang / las byung zhes bya ba rnams so //
analyzed: rigs pa ni bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa dang yang dag pa dang ngo bo nyid dang / las byung zhes bya ba rnams so //
translated: The reasonings are: fulfilling all wishes, pure, nature, and origin.

original: 'dzin pa'i stobs kyis phyogs thams cad du 'gengs pa'i nus pa rnyed pa ni bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: 'dzin pa'i stobs kyis phyogs thams cad du 'gengs pa'i nus pa rnyed pa ni bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par mdzad pa'o //
translated: Fulfilling all wishes is the attainment of the power to fill all directions by the power of holding.

original: phyogs thams cad du gang bar gyur kyang ting nge 'dzin gyi skyon rab tu g-yo ba dang spros pa med pas dag pa'o //
analyzed: phyogs thams cad du gang bar gyur kyang ting nge 'dzin gyi skyon rab tu g-yo ba dang spros pa med pas dag pa'o //
translated: Pure is the absence of the faults of concentration, agitation and discursiveness, even though it fills all directions.

original: ji ltar na phyogs gang ba yin zhe na spros pa'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: ji ltar na phyogs gang ba yin zhe na spros pa'i phyir ro ;
translated: How does it fill all directions? Because of discursiveness.

original: / de nyid gsungs pa ngo bo nyid ces bya ba ste rang rang gi ngo bo ste /
analyzed: / de nyid gsungs pa ngo bo nyid ces bya ba ste rang rang gi ngo bo ste /
translated: That is stated: Nature means each one's own nature.

original: bdag nyid kyi phyogs rnams su shin tu mthug por gyur pa 'di la yod pas na ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: bdag nyid kyi phyogs rnams su shin tu mthug por gyur pa 'di la yod pas na ngo bo nyid do //
translated: It has that, since it exists in one's own directions in a very thick form.

original: kun du spro ba mthar phyin pa 'byung bas na las byung ngo //
analyzed: kun du spro ba mthar phyin pa 'byung bas na las byung ngo //
translated: Since it arises from the action of the complete outpouring of all the buddhas, it is born of action.

original: gsung gi gsang ba nyid yin pas na rdo rje'o //
analyzed: gsung gi gsang ba nyid yin pas na rdo rje'o //
translated: Since it is the secret of speech, it is vajra.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' nyid yin pas na sems dpa' ste /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' nyid yin pas na sems dpa' ste /
translated: Since it is Vajrasattva itself, it is sattva.

original: tshig dang po mi mngon pa'o //
analyzed: tshig dang po mi mngon pa'o //
translated: The first word is not expressed.

original: gsang ba gsum pa'i rdo rje 'di dag gi rdo rje rnams kyi sems dpa' de ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
analyzed: gsang ba gsum pa'i rdo rje 'di dag gi rdo rje rnams kyi sems dpa' de ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
translated: These vajras of the three secrets, the sattva of those vajras is Vajrasattva.

original: sems dpa' ni snying po ste ba bla dang lhang tsher gyi snying po lta bu'o //
analyzed: sems dpa' ni snying po ste ba bla dang lhang tsher gyi snying po lta bu'o //
translated: Sattva is the essence, like the essence of the heart and the essence of the liver.

original: gsang ba rnams kyi snying po yang gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: gsang ba rnams kyi snying po yang gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is the essence of the secrets?

original: de ma thag pa'i rdo rje gsang ba'i tshigs su bcad pas brjod par bya ba gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: de ma thag pa'i rdo rje gsang ba'i tshigs su bcad pas brjod par bya ba gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is that which is to be expressed by the secret vajra verses immediately following.

original: mdor bsdus na de rnams kyi shin tu rnam par dag pas shin tu rnam par dag pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni de rnams kyi snying po'o //
analyzed: mdor bsdus na de rnams kyi shin tu rnam par dag pas shin tu rnam par dag pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni de rnams kyi snying po'o //
translated: In brief, the essence of those is the suchness of complete purification by means of their complete purification.

original: bskul bar zhes bya ba ni sgra rab tu sbyar ba'o //
analyzed: bskul bar zhes bya ba ni sgra rab tu sbyar ba'o //
translated: The term “urge” is a verbal root.

original: zhi ba zhes bya ba ni dag pa'o //🔽rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sam /
analyzed: zhi ba zhes bya ba ni dag pa'o // rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sam /
translated: Peace is purity.

original: de'i gsang ba rnams so //
analyzed: de'i gsang ba rnams so //
translated: The vajra is the Tathagatas, or their secrets.

original: de'i longs spyod ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ste /
analyzed: de'i longs spyod ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ste /
translated: Its enjoyment is perfect enlightenment,

original: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'am 'khor rnams gang dag la mnga' ba de dag ni rdo rje 'chang zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'am 'khor rnams gang dag la mnga' ba de dag ni rdo rje 'chang zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: the enjoyment body, or the retinue that possesses it.  Vajra holder is the meaning.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: Up to the lord of the mandala.

original: de yang zhes bya ba ni bstod par bya ba gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: de yang zhes bya ba ni bstod par bya ba gang yin pa'o //
translated: And that is what is to be praised.

original: rdo rje 'chang 'dra ni rdo rje 'chang dang mtshungs par ro //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang 'dra ni rdo rje 'chang dang mtshungs par ro //
translated: Like Vajradhara means like Vajra Holder.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sangs rgyas kun te chos bzhed pa rnams la de bshad pa'i phyir rjes brtse ba'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sangs rgyas kun te chos bzhed pa rnams la de bshad pa'i phyir rjes brtse ba'o //
translated: Then, etc. All buddhas means those who desire the Dharma. Out of compassion for them, he explains it.

original: rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang ba'o //
translated: Vajra means Vajra Holder.

original: de'i gsang ba ni de kho na nyid do //
analyzed: de'i gsang ba ni de kho na nyid do //
translated: Its secret is reality.

original: de'i gsung ba ni bka'o //
analyzed: de'i gsung ba ni bka'o //
translated: Its speech is the command.

original: dag pa'i don @66a * //
analyzed: dag pa'i don @66a * //
translated: The meaning of purity.

original: dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir dag pa'o //
analyzed: dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir dag pa'o //
translated: It is pure because it is endowed with the three purities.

original: rdo rje gsung ni gnod par byed pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rje gsung ni gnod par byed pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: It is the vajra of speech because it is not subject to destruction.

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsang ba gsum ni sangs rgyas thams cad do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsang ba gsum ni sangs rgyas thams cad do //
translated: The three secrets of the buddhas are all the buddhas.

original: de rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings te de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de nyid ni yi ge ste thar pa'i mchog go //
analyzed: de rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings te de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de nyid ni yi ge ste thar pa'i mchog go //
translated: The reality realm of those is suchness, which is the syllable, the supreme liberation.

original: ci'i phyir yi ge yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir yi ge yin zhe na /
translated: Why is it the syllable?

original: gang gi phyir dag pa nyid ni bag chags dang bcas pa'i sgrib pa thams cad yongs su zad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir dag pa nyid ni bag chags dang bcas pa'i sgrib pa thams cad yongs su zad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is pure, since all obscurations together with their instincts are completely extinguished.

original: ci'i phyir mi 'gyur chen po yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir mi 'gyur chen po yin zhe na /
translated: Why is it the great unchanging?

original: gang gi phyir sngar yang de zad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir sngar yang de zad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is unchanging even before, due to the extinction of those.

original: rang bzhin nyid kyis 'od gsal ba ni dri ma rnams de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa nyid kyis der glo bur ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin nyid kyis 'od gsal ba ni dri ma rnams de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa nyid kyis der glo bur ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is naturally radiant, since the stains are adventitious to it, since they are not its nature.

original: ci 'dra bar zhe na mkha' dbyings bzhin du dri ma med pa ste /
analyzed: ci 'dra bar zhe na mkha' dbyings bzhin du dri ma med pa ste /
translated: How is it? It is stainless, like the vault of the sky.

original: glo bur ba'i mun pa dang sprin la sogs pa dang bral ba bzhin du'o //
analyzed: glo bur ba'i mun pa dang sprin la sogs pa dang bral ba bzhin du'o //
translated: like the sky free from adventitious obscurations, clouds, and so on.

original: de nyid ni rdo rje 'chang gi de kho na nyid yin pas de ltar na ngo mtshar zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de nyid ni rdo rje 'chang gi de kho na nyid yin pas de ltar na ngo mtshar zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Since that is the reality of Vajradhara, thus is the meaning of “amazing.”

original: 'di tsam gyis ni sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi de kho na nyid gsungs te /
analyzed: 'di tsam gyis ni sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi de kho na nyid gsungs te /
translated: Just this much is the reality of the nature of Vajra Body, and so on.

original: de kho na nyid gang gis mthong ba ni de dag 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de kho na nyid gang gis mthong ba ni de dag 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: By that reality, one sees, and they are accomplished.

original: dam tshig gi de kho na nyid brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: dam tshig gi de kho na nyid brjod par bya ste /
translated: The reality of the commitments should be stated,

original: gang zhig la spyod na nges par 'grub par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: gang zhig la spyod na nges par 'grub par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: by which, if one practices, one will certainly accomplish them.

original: des ni sku rdo rje la sogs pa dam tshig tshigs su bcad pa gsum gyis gsungs pa ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: des ni sku rdo rje la sogs pa dam tshig tshigs su bcad pa gsum gyis gsungs pa ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: By that, the commitments of Vajra Body, and so on, are stated in three verses, beginning with “Then Vajradhara . . .”

original: sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i dam tshig ni 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa'i las te /
analyzed: sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i dam tshig ni 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa'i las te /
translated: The commitments of Vajra Body, and so on, are the activities that should not be transgressed,

original: des de rnams nges par 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des de rnams nges par 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because by that, they are certainly accomplished.

original: de rnams ni rdo rje 'chang ba'i bka' 'di las 'da' bar mi mdzad do //
analyzed: de rnams ni rdo rje 'chang ba'i bka' 'di las 'da' bar mi mdzad do //
translated: They do not transgress this word of Vajradhara.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar de ni phyag na rdo rje dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po yin pas so //
analyzed: 'di ltar de ni phyag na rdo rje dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po yin pas so //
translated: Because he is the lord of Vajrapani and all Tathagatas.

original: ji ltar bza' bar bya ba'i dam tshig yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar bza' bar bya ba'i dam tshig yin zhe na /
translated: How is it that the pledge is to be eaten?

original: lus la sogs pa mi gtsang ba'i gnyen po sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i sbyor ba'i me rnams la /
analyzed: lus la sogs pa mi gtsang ba'i gnyen po sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i sbyor ba'i me rnams la /
translated: The fires of the yoga of Vajra Body, etc., which are the antidotes to the impurities of the body, etc.,

original: de rnams sreg pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rnams sreg pa'i phyir ro //
translated: are for the burning of those impurities.

original: de la sha ni lus kyi phyogs gcig yin pas na sku'i'o //
analyzed: de la sha ni lus kyi phyogs gcig yin pas na sku'i'o //
translated: In that regard, flesh is of the body, because it is a part of the body.

original: bshad gci ni nam mkha' dang rlung gi 'bad pa las byung ba nyid kyis na ngag dang chos mthun pa'i phyir gsung gi'o //
analyzed: bshad gci ni nam mkha' dang rlung gi 'bad pa las byung ba nyid kyis na ngag dang chos mthun pa'i phyir gsung gi'o //
translated: Excrement and urine are of speech, because they are similar to speech, since they arise from the effort of space and wind.

original: cig shos gnyis ni sems kyi khyad par las byung ba nyid kyi phyir thugs kyi'o //
analyzed: cig shos gnyis ni sems kyi khyad par las byung ba nyid kyi phyir thugs kyi'o //
translated: The other two are of mind, because they arise from the special nature of mind.

original: dam tshig bzhi ni zhes bya ba ni bcu drug pa las khyod kyis srog chags zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: dam tshig bzhi ni zhes bya ba ni bcu drug pa las khyod kyis srog chags zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa'o //
translated: The four pledges are those stated in the sixteenth chapter, “You should not kill a living being,” and so forth.

original: @66b bsrung bar bya zhes bya ba ni gzhig par mi bya ba'o //
analyzed: @66b bsrung bar bya zhes bya ba ni gzhig par mi bya ba'o //
translated: “ You should protect” means you should not destroy.

original: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni sku rdo rje'i sbyor ba la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni sku rdo rje'i sbyor ba la gnas pa'o //
translated: “ Buddha” means abiding in the union of Vajra Body.

original: ye shes rgya mtsho yis zhes bya ba ni rgya mtsho lta bu yis te /
analyzed: ye shes rgya mtsho yis zhes bya ba ni rgya mtsho lta bu yis te /
translated: “ By the ocean of intuition” means by the ocean-like [intuition].

original: thams cad rang gi sems tsam du mthong bas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: thams cad rang gi sems tsam du mthong bas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that all things are seen as one’s own mind.

original: de'i rnal 'byor pa nyid yin pa'i phyir gsung gi rdo rje yang dag yin la /
analyzed: de'i rnal 'byor pa nyid yin pa'i phyir gsung gi rdo rje yang dag yin la /
translated: Since he is a yogin of that [intuition], he is the true Vajra Speech.

original: gsum po dmigs su med pas chos thams cad yang dag par mtshon pa'i phyir yi ge chen po yang yin pa de ltar na /
analyzed: gsum po dmigs su med pas chos thams cad yang dag par mtshon pa'i phyir yi ge chen po yang yin pa de ltar na /
translated: Since the three [empowerments] are not perceived, he is the great syllable, because he truly indicates all things.

original: gsung gi rdo rje yi ge che'o //
analyzed: gsung gi rdo rje yi ge che'o //
translated: Thus he is the great syllable of Vajra Speech.

original: thugs kyi rdo rje'i rnal 'byor pa nyid yin pa'i phyir rdo rje sems dpa' yang de dag yin la thams cad nam mkhar byed pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul chen po yang yin pa de ltar na /
analyzed: thugs kyi rdo rje'i rnal 'byor pa nyid yin pa'i phyir rdo rje sems dpa' yang de dag yin la thams cad nam mkhar byed pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul chen po yang yin pa de ltar na /
translated: They are Vajrasattvas because they are yogins of the mind-vajra, and they are of great magic because they make everything into space.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul ches so //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul ches so //
translated: Thus, they are Vajrasattvas of great magic.

original: rtag pa ni rgyun du 'dod par bya ba'o //
analyzed: rtag pa ni rgyun du 'dod par bya ba'o //
translated: Eternal means to be desired continuously.

original: bsrung bar bya ba ni ma nyams par ro //
analyzed: bsrung bar bya ba ni ma nyams par ro //
translated: To be protected means to be undamaged.

original: rdo rje 'dzin gyis zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyis so //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin gyis zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyis so //
translated: By the Vajra-holder means by all yogins of the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas.

original: 'bras bu ni 'dir gang zhig ces bya ba la sogs pas gsungs te /
analyzed: 'bras bu ni 'dir gang zhig ces bya ba la sogs pas gsungs te /
translated: The result is stated beginning with “Whatever” .

original: gang zhig ste srung ba po'i sku gsung thugs su gtogs pa ste sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang zhig ste srung ba po'i sku gsung thugs su gtogs pa ste sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro //
translated: Whatever, i.e., the body, speech, and mind of the one who is protected, becomes a Buddha.

original: ji lta bu zhe na 'od po che ste mthu che ba'o //
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na 'od po che ste mthu che ba'o //
translated: What is it like? It is of great light, i.e., of great power.

original: gang zhe na rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
analyzed: gang zhe na rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
translated: What is it? It is Vajrasattva.

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
translated: It is the Great Vajradhara.

original: yang na go rims bzhin du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 'od po che dang rdo rje sems dpa' ni de'i sku la sogs par gtogs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: yang na go rims bzhin du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 'od po che dang rdo rje sems dpa' ni de'i sku la sogs par gtogs par 'gyur te /
translated: Or else, in order, the Buddha, the Bodhisattva, the Great Light, and Vajrasattva are included in his body, etc.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the phrase “vajra of body, speech, and mind of the Tathagatas” is this.

original: ji ltar rdo rje dam tshig gi mthus dman pa'i zas kyi dngos grub gsungs nas /
analyzed: ji ltar rdo rje dam tshig gi mthus dman pa'i zas kyi dngos grub gsungs nas /
translated: Having taught the power of the vajra vow, the power of the inferior food,

original: theg pa dman pa la mos pa rnams kyi ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te ;
analyzed: theg pa dman pa la mos pa rnams kyi ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te ;
translated: [the Bhagavān] then taught the power of the inferior vehicle for those who aspire to the inferior vehicle, beginning with the words “then, Vajrapāṇi.”

original: rang sangs rgyas nyid don du gnyer ba ni sangs rgyas kyi don zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas nyid don du gnyer ba ni sangs rgyas kyi don zhes gsungs so //
translated: Those who seek to be pratyekabuddhas are said to be “those who seek buddhahood.”

original: de rnams kyi dam tshig ni bsgrub par bya ba 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa'i las so //
analyzed: de rnams kyi dam tshig ni bsgrub par bya ba 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa'i las so //
translated: Their vow is the practice that should not be transgressed.

original: de rnams kyi bsgrub par bya ba yang gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: de rnams kyi bsgrub par bya ba yang gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is their practice?

original: sngags dang phyag rgya dang dam tshig gi mthu las byung ba'i sku rdo rje'o //
analyzed: sngags dang phyag rgya dang dam tshig gi mthu las byung ba'i sku rdo rje'o //
translated: It is the vajra body that arises from the power of mantra, seal, and vow.

original: rdo rje sku la rab tu gnas //
analyzed: rdo rje sku la rab tu gnas //
translated: Abides in the vajra body.

original: zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor pas rnam par rig pa tsam nyid du mos pa la gnas par byas nas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor pas rnam par rig pa tsam nyid du mos pa la gnas par byas nas so //
translated: This is for the practitioner of Vairocana, who, having become absorbed in the conviction that it is mere representation,

original: lus kyis zhes bya ba ni spros pa las sangs rgyas kyi sku spros pas byas pa yin no //
analyzed: lus kyis zhes bya ba ni spros pa las sangs rgyas kyi sku spros pas byas pa yin no //
translated: By the body means by the emanation of buddha bodies from emanation.

original: ston pa zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad la chos kyi sbyin pa byed pas /🔽skal pa ji @67a * //
analyzed: ston pa zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad la chos kyi sbyin pa byed pas / skal pa ji @67a * //
translated: Teaching means making the gift of Dharma to all sentient beings.

original: lta ba bzhin du tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab kyi phung po skyed par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lta ba bzhin du tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab kyi phung po skyed par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: According to their fortune means according to their fortune in the aggregates of morality, meditative stabilization, and wisdom.

original: sems can gzung ba ni mgu bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: sems can gzung ba ni mgu bar byed pa'o //
translated: Grasping sentient beings means pleasing them.

original: tshul khrims te lus dang ngag dang sems kyis legs par spyod pa'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims te lus dang ngag dang sems kyis legs par spyod pa'o //
translated: Morality means good conduct of body, speech, and mind.

original: de nyid kyis ni sbyor ba 'di ni bud med kyi gzugs kyis sbyor ba med pa yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyis ni sbyor ba 'di ni bud med kyi gzugs kyis sbyor ba med pa yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: By that very means, this application should be understood as the application without form of a woman.

original: nyan thos zhes bya ba ni nyan thos don du gnyer ba rnams so //
analyzed: nyan thos zhes bya ba ni nyan thos don du gnyer ba rnams so //
translated: Sravaka means those who seek to be sravakas.

original: de rnams kyi bslab pa nyid dam tshig ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyi bslab pa nyid dam tshig ste /
translated: Their training is the pledge.

original: sku rdo rje la sogs pa bsgrub par bya ba rnams kyis 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa'i las so //
analyzed: sku rdo rje la sogs pa bsgrub par bya ba rnams kyis 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa'i las so //
translated: They are the activities that are not to be transgressed by those who are to achieve the vajra body, etc.

original: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam zhes bya ba ni srog gcod pa la sogs pa bdun las ji srid 'tsho'i bar du ldog cing yang dag par blangs pa ni bdun yin la /
analyzed: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam zhes bya ba ni srog gcod pa la sogs pa bdun las ji srid 'tsho'i bar du ldog cing yang dag par blangs pa ni bdun yin la /
translated: The ten paths of virtuous action are the seven, such as not killing, etc., which are to be turned away from for as long as one lives, and the correct undertaking of them.

original: gnod sems dang brnab sems dang log par lta ba gsum po yang spong ba'o //
analyzed: gnod sems dang brnab sems dang log par lta ba gsum po yang spong ba'o //
translated: The three, malice, covetousness, and false views, are also to be abandoned.

original: byed pa zhes bya ba ni ji srid 'tsho'i bar du ma nyams par byed pa'o //
analyzed: byed pa zhes bya ba ni ji srid 'tsho'i bar du ma nyams par byed pa'o //
translated: The performance is the performance of them for as long as one lives without impairment.

original: ye shes spangs pa rnams zhes bya ba ni chos la bdag med pa'i ye shes spangs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: ye shes spangs pa rnams zhes bya ba ni chos la bdag med pa'i ye shes spangs pa yin gyi /
translated: Those who have abandoned the intuition are those who have abandoned the intuition of the selflessness of dharmas.
