original: gang zag la bdag med pa'i ye shes ni legs par gnas pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: gang zag la bdag med pa'i ye shes ni legs par gnas pa nyid yin no //
translated: But they have well-established the intuition of the selflessness of persons.

original: 'di dag la ni 'bras bu dman pa ste /
analyzed: 'di dag la ni 'bras bu dman pa ste /
translated: They have inferior results.

original: rang gi sdug bsngal zad pa tsam la mos pa don du gnyer ba nyid yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi sdug bsngal zad pa tsam la mos pa don du gnyer ba nyid yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: One who is intent on the mere exhaustion of one's own suffering is called one who is intent on the mere exhaustion of one's own suffering.

original: thams cad kyi zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa thams cad de ji ltar 'dod pa'i bud med spangs te /
analyzed: thams cad kyi zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa thams cad de ji ltar 'dod pa'i bud med spangs te /
translated: All means all yogis, who, having abandoned women as they wish,

original: sku rdo rje la sogs pa zhi ba'i rnal 'byor pa'i zhi ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sku rdo rje la sogs pa zhi ba'i rnal 'byor pa'i zhi ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: are peaceful yogis of Body-Vajra, etc.

original: log pa'i theg pa la mos pa rnams kyi rdo rje dam tshig ni tshangs pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: log pa'i theg pa la mos pa rnams kyi rdo rje dam tshig ni tshangs pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: The pledge of the vajra of those intent on the false vehicle is said to be the pledge of Brahma.

original: tshangs pa nyid don du gnyer ba'i bsgrub par bya ba rnams 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa'i las so //
analyzed: tshangs pa nyid don du gnyer ba'i bsgrub par bya ba rnams 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa'i las so //
translated: It is an action that should not be transgressed by those who are to be accomplished who seek to become Brahma himself.🔽By the path of delusion, etc.

original: gti mug lam gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la aom las byung ba'i tshangs pa ser po gdong bzhi pa ral pa dang cod pan can phyag drug pa /
analyzed: gti mug lam gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la aom las byung ba'i tshangs pa ser po gdong bzhi pa ral pa dang cod pan can phyag drug pa /
translated: Om arises as yellow Brahma, with four faces, hair, and a crown, with six arms.

original: phyag gnyis kyis rang snang la 'khyud pa /
analyzed: phyag gnyis kyis rang snang la 'khyud pa /
translated: With two arms he embraces his natural radiance.

original: lha mo zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa lha mo rdo rje zhi ba mo dang snyoms par 'jug pa dang phyag lhag ma rnams kyis bgrang phreng dang dbyug pa dang spyi blugs dang padma bsnams pa /
analyzed: lha mo zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa lha mo rdo rje zhi ba mo dang snyoms par 'jug pa dang phyag lhag ma rnams kyis bgrang phreng dang dbyug pa dang spyi blugs dang padma bsnams pa /
translated: The goddess has one face, two arms, and is in union with the goddess Vajraśānti. The remaining hands hold a rosary, a staff, a water vessel, and a lotus.

original: ngang pa'i rgyab tu sna tshogs padma dang zla ba'i gdan la gnas pa'i tshangs par bdag nyid bsams la /
analyzed: ngang pa'i rgyab tu sna tshogs padma dang zla ba'i gdan la gnas pa'i tshangs par bdag nyid bsams la /
translated: On the back of the goose, on a seat of a variegated lotus and moon, one should visualize oneself as Brahmā.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan rin po ches bdag nyid brgyan par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bsam pa ni gti mug @67b gi lam mo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan rin po ches bdag nyid brgyan par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bsam pa ni gti mug @67b gi lam mo //
translated: The thought “I will adorn myself with the precious qualities of all the tathāgatas” is the path of delusion.

original: des sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par byed pa'i las gong rnams byed pa ni sngags pa'o //
analyzed: des sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par byed pa'i las gong rnams byed pa ni sngags pa'o //
translated: The one who performs the above actions that cause the attainment of the enlightenment of the Buddha is the mantrin.

original: rang bzhin ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
analyzed: rang bzhin ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
translated: What is his nature like?

original: 'jigs shing mi sdug pa ste /
analyzed: 'jigs shing mi sdug pa ste /
translated: He is fearful and ugly.

original: yun ring po'i ngan 'gros 'jigs pas na mi sdug pa'o //
analyzed: yun ring po'i ngan 'gros 'jigs pas na mi sdug pa'o //
translated: He is ugly because he is afraid of the long-lasting lower realms.🔽And that action is as stated in the Navatattvas

original: las de yang dgu pa las ji skad du /
analyzed: las de yang dgu pa las ji skad du /
translated: The nine mental states are as follows.🔽

original: nam mkha' khyab pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i rgyan thams cad aom gyi phyogs la des bdag nyid brgyan par bya'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' khyab pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i rgyan thams cad aom gyi phyogs la des bdag nyid brgyan par bya'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o //
translated: All the precious ornaments of all the Tathagatas pervading space are on the side of Om. With that, one should adorn oneself.

original: sku'i rdo rje nyid du 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: sku'i rdo rje nyid du 'gyur ba ste /
translated: One becomes the very essence of the Vajra Body.

original: 'dis ni zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
analyzed: 'dis ni zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
translated: The this refers to the rest.

original: drag po nyid don du gnyer ba'i dam tshig ni khams gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: drag po nyid don du gnyer ba'i dam tshig ni khams gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The pledge of striving for Rudra is stated by the words, the three realms, and so on.

original: 'dod chags lam gyis zhes bya ba ni snga ma'i rjes su 'brangs nas shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags lam gyis zhes bya ba ni snga ma'i rjes su 'brangs nas shes par bya'o //
translated: The path of passion should be understood by following the previous [explanation].

original: lha chen po'i yi ge aa las byung ba thal ba'i mdog can zhal gcig pa spyan gsum pa /
analyzed: lha chen po'i yi ge aa las byung ba thal ba'i mdog can zhal gcig pa spyan gsum pa /
translated: The great god [Mahesvara] arises from the syllable A, is ash-colored, has one face, and three eyes.

original: zla ba phyed pa dang ldan pa'i ral pa dang cod pan can /
analyzed: zla ba phyed pa dang ldan pa'i ral pa dang cod pan can /
translated: He has matted locks and a crown, and is adorned with a half-moon.

original: phyag drug pa phyag gnyis kyis 'khyud pa dkar mo phyag gnyis pa dang snyoms par 'jug pa /
analyzed: phyag drug pa phyag gnyis kyis 'khyud pa dkar mo phyag gnyis pa dang snyoms par 'jug pa /
translated: He has six arms, and with two embraces white Umā, who has two arms, in union.

original: phyag lhag ma rnams kyis rtse gsum pa dang ral gri dang nor bu dang padma bsnams pa /
analyzed: phyag lhag ma rnams kyis rtse gsum pa dang ral gri dang nor bu dang padma bsnams pa /
translated: The remaining hands hold a trident, sword, gem, and lotus.

original: stag gi pags pa bsnams pa khyu mchog dkar po'i rgyab tu sna tshogs padma dang zla ba'i gdan gyi steng du dbang phyug chen por bdag nyid bsgoms la /
analyzed: stag gi pags pa bsnams pa khyu mchog dkar po'i rgyab tu sna tshogs padma dang zla ba'i gdan gyi steng du dbang phyug chen por bdag nyid bsgoms la /
translated: Meditate on oneself as Maheśvara on the back of a white bull, on a multicolored lotus and moon seat, wearing a tiger skin.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig ma la nye bar longs spyod pa'i bsam pa ni 'dod chags kyi lam mo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig ma la nye bar longs spyod pa'i bsam pa ni 'dod chags kyi lam mo //
translated: The thought of enjoying the knowledge-woman of all the Tathāgatas is the path of passion.

original: bud med kun zhes bya ba ni bud med thams cad do //
analyzed: bud med kun zhes bya ba ni bud med thams cad do //
translated: “All women” means all women.

original: khams gsum dag na gnas pa'i zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' khyab par byed pa'o //
analyzed: khams gsum dag na gnas pa'i zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' khyab par byed pa'o //
translated: “Dwelling in the three realms” means pervading space.

original: rdo rje las byung zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang yang dag par ldan pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje las byung zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang yang dag par ldan pa'o //
translated: “Arisen from the vajra” means endowed with all the Tathāgatas.

original: sna tshogs dngos po zhes bya ba ni dga' ba dang mgu ba dang bde ba la sogs pa'i rnam pas so //
analyzed: sna tshogs dngos po zhes bya ba ni dga' ba dang mgu ba dang bde ba la sogs pa'i rnam pas so //
translated: “Various things” means in the aspect of joy, delight, bliss, and so forth.

original: spyad pa ni zhes bya ba ni yi ge aas de rnams las phrogs nas longs spyod pa'o //
analyzed: spyad pa ni zhes bya ba ni yi ge aas de rnams las phrogs nas longs spyod pa'o //
translated: The enjoyment is the enjoyment of those by the letter A.

original: gsung gi rdo rje nyid du 'gyur ba ni snga ma'i rjes su 'brangs nas shes par bya'o //
analyzed: gsung gi rdo rje nyid du 'gyur ba ni snga ma'i rjes su 'brangs nas shes par bya'o //
translated: The vajra of speech is to be understood by the method of the previous [vajra].

original: sems can zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: sems can zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The sentient beings and so forth are as follows.🔽The anger yoga is to be understood by the method of the previous [vajra].

original: zhe sdang sbyor bas zhes bya ba ni snga ma'i rjes su 'brangs nas zhes bya ba ste /🔽yi ge h'um las byung ba zar ma'i me tog lta bu rin po che'i cod pan can /
analyzed: zhe sdang sbyor bas zhes bya ba ni snga ma'i rjes su 'brangs nas zhes bya ba ste / yi ge h'um las byung ba zar ma'i me tog lta bu rin po che'i cod pan can /
translated: The vajra of mind is to be understood by the method of the previous [vajra].🔽 The vajra of body is to be understood by the method of the previous [vajra].🔽 The vajra of body is to be understood by the method of the previous [vajra].🔽 The vajra of body is to be understood by the method of the previous [vajra].

original: phyag drug pa phyag gnyis kyis 'khyud par rdo rje dga' byed lha mo ser mo dang snyoms par 'jug pa /
analyzed: phyag drug pa phyag gnyis kyis 'khyud par rdo rje dga' byed lha mo ser mo dang snyoms par 'jug pa /
translated: The vajra of body is to be understood by the method of the previous [vajra].

original: phyag lhag ma rnams kyis 'khor @68a * //🔽lo dang dbyig pa dang khra bo dang dung dang padma bsnams pa /
analyzed: phyag lhag ma rnams kyis 'khor @68a * // lo dang dbyig pa dang khra bo dang dung dang padma bsnams pa /
translated: The vajra of body is to be understood by the method of the previous [vajra].🔽 The vajra of body is to be understood by the method of the previous [vajra].🔽 The vajra of body is to be understood by the method of the previous [vajra].

original: na bza' ser po bsnams pa /
analyzed: na bza' ser po bsnams pa /
translated: The vajra of body is to be understood by the method of the previous [vajra].🔽 The vajra of body is to be understood by the method of the previous [vajra].🔽 The vajra of body is to be understood by the method of the previous [vajra].🔽 The vajra of body is to be understood by the method of the previous [vajra].🔽 The vajra of body is to be understood by the method of the previous [vajra].🔽 The vajra of body is to be understood by the method of the previous [vajra].🔽 The vajra of body is to be understood by the method of the previous [vajra].🔽 The vajra of body is to be understood by the method of the previous [vajra].🔽 The vajra of body is to be understood by the method of the previous [vajra].🔽 The vajra of body is to be understood by the method of the previous [vajra].🔽 The

original: nam mkha' lding gi rgyab tu sna tshogs padma dang zla ba'i gdan gyi steng du khro bo mig dmar zhing gdug pa'i lta ba can gyi khyab 'jug tu bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba ni zhe sdang gi sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' lding gi rgyab tu sna tshogs padma dang zla ba'i gdan gyi steng du khro bo mig dmar zhing gdug pa'i lta ba can gyi khyab 'jug tu bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba ni zhe sdang gi sbyor ba'o //
translated: One should meditate on oneself as the wrathful Viṣṇu, with red eyes and a fierce look, on a multicolored lotus and moon seat on the back of Garuḍa. This is the application of hatred.

original: sbyor ba 'dis sems can las byung ba ji snyed pa ni sems dang ldan pa rnams sems can zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sbyor ba 'dis sems can las byung ba ji snyed pa ni sems dang ldan pa rnams sems can zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: As many sentient beings as there are, all of them are sentient beings in the sense of having minds.

original: de thams cad dbyer med sku gsum la gnas pa ni /
analyzed: de thams cad dbyer med sku gsum la gnas pa ni /
translated: All of them are inseparable, abiding in the three kāyas.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs ro gcig pa de kho na nyid dang de bzhin nyid ces bya ba nam mkha' lta bu gang yin pa'i tshul des gnas pa'o //🔽de ltar na bsam gtan rdo rje ste /
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs ro gcig pa de kho na nyid dang de bzhin nyid ces bya ba nam mkha' lta bu gang yin pa'i tshul des gnas pa'o // de ltar na bsam gtan rdo rje ste /
translated: Abiding in that space-like manner, which is called the suchness of the single taste of body, speech, and mind, one should recite the syllable hūṃ.

original: bsam gtan gyi bsam pa brtan po 'dis yi ge h'um brjod cing sems can de dag thams cad dang po nyid du nam mkha'i ngos la blta zhing gsad par bya ste /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi bsam pa brtan po 'dis yi ge h'um brjod cing sems can de dag thams cad dang po nyid du nam mkha'i ngos la blta zhing gsad par bya ste /
translated: Thus, the vajra of concentration is the firm intention of concentration. With this, all those sentient beings should first be made to look at the sky and be killed.

original: de kho na nyid des blta bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de kho na nyid des blta bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that one should see reality.

original: rdo rje mkha' dbyings bdag nyid kyang //
analyzed: rdo rje mkha' dbyings bdag nyid kyang //
translated: The nature of the vajra expanse

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang chen po yang ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang chen po yang ste /
translated: means the nature of Great Vajradhara.

original: gzhan sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / lha dang lha ma yin dang mi dang / dud 'gro dang yi dags dang / dmyal ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
analyzed: gzhan sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / lha dang lha ma yin dang mi dang / dud 'gro dang yi dags dang / dmyal ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
translated: What need is there to mention other buddhas, bodhisattvas, śrāvakas, pratyekabuddhas, gods, asuras, humans, animals, hungry ghosts, and hell beings?

original: gzung ba dang 'dzin par dmigs par bsdus pa 'di dag thams cad gsal bar bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzung ba dang 'dzin par dmigs par bsdus pa 'di dag thams cad gsal bar bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because all of these, included in the reference to apprehended object and apprehending subject, are to be illuminated.🔽One becomes the nature of the vajra mind

original: thugs kyi rdo rje nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni snga ma'i rjes su 'brangs nas shes par bya'o //
analyzed: thugs kyi rdo rje nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni snga ma'i rjes su 'brangs nas shes par bya'o //
translated: should be understood by implication from the previous.

original: gal te mu stegs pa'i sbyor ba'i sku rdo rje la sogs pa nyid ji ltar rnyed par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gal te mu stegs pa'i sbyor ba'i sku rdo rje la sogs pa nyid ji ltar rnyed par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If the body of the Tīrthika’s practice is vajra and so forth, how is it obtained?🔽Then, the Bhagavān, the Vajra Body,

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: and so forth is stated.

original: ji skad du bshad pa'i tshangs pa la sogs pa dang gzugs mthun pa ni rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig ste sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po yin gyi 'di ni tshangs pa la sogs pa'i gzugs nyid ni ma yin te /
analyzed: ji skad du bshad pa'i tshangs pa la sogs pa dang gzugs mthun pa ni rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig ste sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po yin gyi 'di ni tshangs pa la sogs pa'i gzugs nyid ni ma yin te /
translated: The pledge of the three vajras is similar in form to Brahma and so forth as explained. It is the great seal of the body vajra and so forth, but it is not the form of Brahma and so forth.

original: mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the characteristics are not similar.

original: 'di'i don gsal bar byed pa'i tshigs su bcad pa la yang de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di'i don gsal bar byed pa'i tshigs su bcad pa la yang de skad ces bya'o //
translated: This is also what the verse that clarifies the meaning of this says.

original: tshangs pa la sogs pa dang mthun pa 'di gang yin pa de ni sku rdo rje la sogs pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: tshangs pa la sogs pa dang mthun pa 'di gang yin pa de ni sku rdo rje la sogs pa nyid yin te /
translated: That which is similar to Brahma and so forth is the body vajra and so forth,

original: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dbang du mdzad pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'i don to //
analyzed: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dbang du mdzad pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'i don to //
translated: because it is done in terms of subduing migrating beings. This is the meaning of the verse.

original: gnod sbyin mo la sogs pa sgrub pa la ni de rnams kyi rdo rje dam tshig dang bcas pa'i tshigs su bcad pa lngas gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: gnod sbyin mo la sogs pa sgrub pa la ni de rnams kyi rdo rje dam tshig dang bcas pa'i tshigs su bcad pa lngas gsungs pa yin te /
translated: In the case of the practice of the female yaksha and so forth, it is taught in five verses together with their vajra pledges.

original: bud @68b med ni gnod sbyin mo rnams so //
analyzed: bud @68b med ni gnod sbyin mo rnams so //
translated: The female is the female yakshas.

original: 'di rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni khrag dang sha dang 'dod pa rnams kyis te /
analyzed: 'di rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni khrag dang sha dang 'dod pa rnams kyis te /
translated: By these means by blood, flesh, and desire.

original: ci rigs par bsgoms pa dang de dag rang nyid kyis phyi rol bsten pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: ci rigs par bsgoms pa dang de dag rang nyid kyis phyi rol bsten pa rnams kyis so //
translated: By these means by those who are suitable for meditation and by those who externally rely on them.

original: dka' ba ni 'da' bar dka' ba'o //
analyzed: dka' ba ni 'da' bar dka' ba'o //
translated: Difficult means difficult to transcend.

original: phra ma dang ldan pa'i phyir phra ma can no //
analyzed: phra ma dang ldan pa'i phyir phra ma can no //
translated: Slanderer means one who possesses slander.

original: de dag ces bya ba ni de klu'i rgyal po'o //
analyzed: de dag ces bya ba ni de klu'i rgyal po'o //
translated: Those means those nāga kings.

original: 'dis ni zhes bya ba ni phra ma la sogs pa rnams kyis de snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni zhes bya ba ni phra ma la sogs pa rnams kyis de snga ma bzhin no //
translated: By this means by slander and so on, as before.

original: rdo rje sa 'og ces bya ba ni sa 'og gi bu mo bsgrub pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sa 'og ces bya ba ni sa 'og gi bu mo bsgrub pa'o //
translated: Vajra nether world means the accomplishment of the daughter of the nether world.

original: thod pa dang 'bru mar ni mi bya'o //
analyzed: thod pa dang 'bru mar ni mi bya'o //
translated: Skull and oil should not be used.

original: zhag ni glang po dang rta la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhag ni glang po dang rta la sogs pa'o //
translated: Days means elephants, horses, and so on.

original: 'byung po kun gyis zhes bya ba ni 'byung po dang yi dags la sogs pa'i yang ngo //
analyzed: 'byung po kun gyis zhes bya ba ni 'byung po dang yi dags la sogs pa'i yang ngo //
translated: By all spirits means also by spirits, ghosts, and so on.

original: dag byed ces bya ba ni de kho na nyid du mos pa'i yi ge gsum gyis dag par byas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dag byed ces bya ba ni de kho na nyid du mos pa'i yi ge gsum gyis dag par byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Purifier means that it is purified by the three syllables that are imagined as reality.

original: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma ni goo r'i dang tsoo r'i la sogs pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma ni goo r'i dang tsoo r'i la sogs pa zhes bya'o //
translated: The Vajra dakini is called Gauri, Cauri, etc.

original: chang ni 'bru'i chang dang sbyar ba'i chang ngo //
analyzed: chang ni 'bru'i chang dang sbyar ba'i chang ngo //
translated: Wine is grain wine and fruit wine.

original: sbyor ba yis zhes bya ba ni dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba la sogs pa grags pa'i sku mdog dang / mtshan ma dang / sngags la sogs pa dang / dbu gsum dang phyag drug la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis so //
analyzed: sbyor ba yis zhes bya ba ni dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba la sogs pa grags pa'i sku mdog dang / mtshan ma dang / sngags la sogs pa dang / dbu gsum dang phyag drug la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis so //
translated: By means of union means by means of the samadhi of the three heads, six arms, etc., of the well-known colors, emblems, mantras, etc., of Sri Heruka and all the Buddhas.

original: gsad bya zhes bya ba ni bsgoms pa'i sems can thams cad do //
analyzed: gsad bya zhes bya ba ni bsgoms pa'i sems can thams cad do //
translated: The to-be-killed are all sentient beings who are objects of meditation.

original: gnas kyi mtshan nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni sngags dang mtshan ma rnams kyis so ;
analyzed: gnas kyi mtshan nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni sngags dang mtshan ma rnams kyis so ;
translated: By means of the characteristics of the abode means by means of the mantras and emblems.

original: / ngo bo nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni mngon sum nyid du'o //
analyzed: / ngo bo nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni mngon sum nyid du'o //
translated: By means of the intrinsic nature means by means of direct perception.

original: kun 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni mi la sogs pa'i khyad par gyis 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: kun 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni mi la sogs pa'i khyad par gyis 'byung ba'o //
translated: The origin is the arising by means of the distinctions of humans, etc.

original: rnam par spyod ces bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i mthu yis so //
analyzed: rnam par spyod ces bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i mthu yis so //
translated: By means of enjoyment means by means of the power of the innate.

original: dam tshig ma lus pa zhes bya ba ni de rnams nyid yongs su brnyes par byed pa'o //
analyzed: dam tshig ma lus pa zhes bya ba ni de rnams nyid yongs su brnyes par byed pa'o //
translated: All pledges means that they are the means of attaining them.

original: dngos grub kun nyid la phan 'dod pa ni gnyen te de'i don du'o //
analyzed: dngos grub kun nyid la phan 'dod pa ni gnyen te de'i don du'o //
translated: The desire for the benefit of all powers is the friend, for their sake.

original: tshangs pa la sogs pa ni 'jig rten pa nyid yin pa'i phyir khams gsum pa yang yin la /
analyzed: tshangs pa la sogs pa ni 'jig rten pa nyid yin pa'i phyir khams gsum pa yang yin la /
translated: Brahma and so on are in the three realms because they are worldly.

original: sku rdo rje la sogs pa ni 'jig rten pa nyid yin pa'i phyir rdo rje yang yin zhing thams cad kyang de dag nyid la de dag kyang yin pas na'o //
analyzed: sku rdo rje la sogs pa ni 'jig rten pa nyid yin pa'i phyir rdo rje yang yin zhing thams cad kyang de dag nyid la de dag kyang yin pas na'o //
translated: The vajra body and so on are vajra because they are worldly, and they are all of them, and they are just those.

original: de rnams kyi rjes su 'brang ba ni rdo rje 'chang ba chen po'i nang du chud pa ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyi rjes su 'brang ba ni rdo rje 'chang ba chen po'i nang du chud pa ste /
translated: The followers of them are included in Great Vajradhara,

original: rdo rje'i sngags las skyes pa yin pa'i phyir dang / mi bskyod pa la sogs pas rgyas btab pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rje'i sngags las skyes pa yin pa'i phyir dang / mi bskyod pa la sogs pas rgyas btab pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are born from the vajra mantra, and because they are sealed by Akshobhya and so on.

original: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The samadhi that focuses on them is called that.

original: lus kyi dngos grub kyi phyir dam tshig gi rdo rje ni lus kyi las @69a * //
analyzed: lus kyi dngos grub kyi phyir dam tshig gi rdo rje ni lus kyi las @69a * //
translated: For the sake of the power of the body, the pledge vajra is the body karma.

original: thams cad ro gcig pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad ro gcig pa'o //
translated: all are of one taste.

original: de gsal bar byed pa'i tshigs su bcad pa la yang de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de gsal bar byed pa'i tshigs su bcad pa la yang de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The verse that elucidates that is called that.

original: lus kyi thams cad ni lus kyi las thams cad do //
analyzed: lus kyi thams cad ni lus kyi las thams cad do //
translated: All of the body is all of the body's actions.

original: rnam gsum zhes bya ba ni dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa'o //
analyzed: rnam gsum zhes bya ba ni dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa'o //
translated: The three are virtuous, nonvirtuous, and neutral.

original: de ni rtag par rdo rje las ni 'byung bar bya ste ;
analyzed: de ni rtag par rdo rje las ni 'byung bar bya ste ;
translated: That is always to be produced from the vajra.

original: skad cig de las spros pa'i tshul du gang las sku rdo rje kun 'byung ba de bzhin du bya'o //
analyzed: skad cig de las spros pa'i tshul du gang las sku rdo rje kun 'byung ba de bzhin du bya'o //
translated: Just as the body vajra arises from that instant in the manner of emanation, so it is to be done.

original: spro ba de dag gcig tu byas pa'i phyir sems can thams cad sangs rgyas skur byed pa ni bya ba ste /
analyzed: spro ba de dag gcig tu byas pa'i phyir sems can thams cad sangs rgyas skur byed pa ni bya ba ste /
translated: The performance of all sentient beings as buddhas is the action of making all sentient beings buddhas by unifying those emanations.

original: sku rdo rje'i sbyor ba la gnas nas zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
analyzed: sku rdo rje'i sbyor ba la gnas nas zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
translated: Abiding in the yoga of the body vajra is the remainder.

original: gnas ni thabs su bya ba'o //
analyzed: gnas ni thabs su bya ba'o //
translated: The abode is the method.

original: ma lus pa ni ngag gi las so //
analyzed: ma lus pa ni ngag gi las so //
translated: All of speech is all verbal actions.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: khams gsum dri med dkyil 'khor te /
analyzed: khams gsum dri med dkyil 'khor te /
translated: The maṇḍala of the three realms is stainless.

original: spros pa'i ngag rdo rje dang gcig tu byas pa'i phyir dri med do //
analyzed: spros pa'i ngag rdo rje dang gcig tu byas pa'i phyir dri med do //
translated: It is stainless because the emanation of speech is unified with the vajra.

original: dkyil 'khor ni 'jig rten gsum gyi dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor ni 'jig rten gsum gyi dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The maṇḍala is the maṇḍala of the three worlds.

original: 'di las zhes bya ba ni dbang du byas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di las zhes bya ba ni dbang du byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: From this means from the perspective of the subjugation.

original: tshig gi dngos grub kyi gnas kyang de yin la /
analyzed: tshig gi dngos grub kyi gnas kyang de yin la /
translated: It is the abode of the power of speech,

original: yid 'ong ba yang yin pas na'o //
analyzed: yid 'ong ba yang yin pas na'o //
translated: and it is also pleasing.

original: 'dir yang gsung gi rdo rje'i sbyor ba la gnas nas zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
analyzed: 'dir yang gsung gi rdo rje'i sbyor ba la gnas nas zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
translated: Here also, abiding in the yoga of Vajra Speech is understood.

original: yid de sems kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin kun bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: yid de sems kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin kun bsgom par bya'o //
translated: The mind, which is the nature of the mind vajra, should be contemplated.

original: rdo rje brtan pa ni thugs rdo rje ste /
analyzed: rdo rje brtan pa ni thugs rdo rje ste /
translated: The firm vajra is the mind vajra.

original: de rnams kyi 'dzin pa ni spro zhing gcig tu byed pa'i tshul gyis 'byin pa yin pa de ltar na rdo rje brtan pa 'dzin pa yis so //
analyzed: de rnams kyi 'dzin pa ni spro zhing gcig tu byed pa'i tshul gyis 'byin pa yin pa de ltar na rdo rje brtan pa 'dzin pa yis so //
translated: The retention of those is the emission by the method of expanding and unifying. Thus, by the retention of the firm vajra.

original: rdo rje gsum gyi phyed 'khor lo ni thugs rdo rje yin la /
analyzed: rdo rje gsum gyi phyed 'khor lo ni thugs rdo rje yin la /
translated: The wheel of the three vajras is the mind vajra.

original: de dang ldan pa ste de'i rnal 'byor pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de dang ldan pa ste de'i rnal 'byor pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Endowed with that means the practitioner of that.

original: sbyor ba gnag las las thams cad dge ba ni kun du mdzes dga'o de ston par mdzad pa la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba gnag las las thams cad dge ba ni kun du mdzes dga'o de ston par mdzad pa la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The performance is that all actions are virtuous, and the universal is that it is delightful.

original: 'dir rnal 'byor ba thams cad ni rdo rje 'chang ba'i rnal 'byor ba yin pas /
analyzed: 'dir rnal 'byor ba thams cad ni rdo rje 'chang ba'i rnal 'byor ba yin pas /
translated: Here, all yogis are yogis of Vajradhara.

original: gal te de sangs rgyas la sogs pa la phyag ma byas na smad pa nyid du 'gyur ba dang tshogs gnyis kyang myur du rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te de sangs rgyas la sogs pa la phyag ma byas na smad pa nyid du 'gyur ba dang tshogs gnyis kyang myur du rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If they do not pay homage to the Buddhas, etc., they will be criticized, and the two stores will not be quickly completed.

original: yang na phyag byed pa de'i tshe rdo rje 'chang ba'i nga rgyal 'dor bar 'gyur ba de bas na 'dis thabs gang gis phyag bya zhe na /
analyzed: yang na phyag byed pa de'i tshe rdo rje 'chang ba'i nga rgyal 'dor bar 'gyur ba de bas na 'dis thabs gang gis phyag bya zhe na /
translated: Or, when they pay homage, they will lose the pride of being Vajradhara. Therefore, by what means should they pay homage?

original: de'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Thus, he says, “Then, etc.”

original: thams cad ni sangs rgyas la sogs pa la phyag 'tshal bar bya'o //
analyzed: thams cad ni sangs rgyas la sogs pa la phyag 'tshal bar bya'o //
translated: All means that one should pay homage to the Buddhas, etc.

original: sngags ni lha'i rnal 'byor pa phyag byed pa'o //
analyzed: sngags ni lha'i rnal 'byor pa phyag byed pa'o //
translated: The mantra is the yogi of the deity who pays homage.

original: de rnams kyi rdo rje ni dmigs su med pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi rdo rje ni dmigs su med pa'o //
translated: Their vajra is the unobservable.

original: de nyid ni snying po ste khyad par 'phags pa'i dam tshig go //
analyzed: de nyid ni snying po ste khyad par 'phags pa'i dam tshig go //
translated: That is the essence, the special commitment.

original: de gsal bar byed pa'i tshigs su bcad pa la de @69b skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de gsal bar byed pa'i tshigs su bcad pa la de @69b skad ces bya'o //
translated: The verse that elucidates that is called that.

original: phyag 'tshal na ni zhes bya ba ni phyag 'tshal ba na'o //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal na ni zhes bya ba ni phyag 'tshal ba na'o //
translated: When one bows down means when one bows down.

original: ma rung zhes bya ba ni mi snang ba ste de rnams dang bdag nyid dang phyag byed pa mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du ro gcig pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ma rung zhes bya ba ni mi snang ba ste de rnams dang bdag nyid dang phyag byed pa mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du ro gcig pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Defective means invisible; the meaning is that one should have the wisdom of the identitylessness of those, oneself, and the one to whom one bows, which is emptiness.

original: rang gi lha la ji ltar phyag bya zhe na /
analyzed: rang gi lha la ji ltar phyag bya zhe na /
translated: How does one bow to one's deity?

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Then and so on is stated.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni phyag bya ba'i rang gi lha ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni phyag bya ba'i rang gi lha ste /
translated: All the transcendent ones are one's deity to whom one bows,

original: de'i sku dang gsung dang thugs so //
analyzed: de'i sku dang gsung dang thugs so //
translated: their body, speech, and mind.

original: de rnams kyi bsam gtan ni rang gi lus dang ngag dang yid dag la'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi bsam gtan ni rang gi lus dang ngag dang yid dag la'o //
translated: One should visualize those in one's own body, speech, and mind.

original: de nyid ni dam tshig go //
analyzed: de nyid ni dam tshig go //
translated: That is the commitment.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' ni rang gi lha nyid de de'i bsam gtan no //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' ni rang gi lha nyid de de'i bsam gtan no //
translated: Vajrasattva is one's deity, and one should visualize that.

original: rdo rje gsum sbyor bas zhes bya ba ni de'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams gcig tu gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum sbyor bas zhes bya ba ni de'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams gcig tu gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: By the union of the three vajras means that his body, speech, and mind become one.

original: gang du zhe na /
analyzed: gang du zhe na /
translated: Where?

original: sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la ste /
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la ste /
translated: In the mandala of body, speech, and mind,

original: rang nyid kyi thams cad la'o //
analyzed: rang nyid kyi thams cad la'o //
translated: in one's own.

original: sngags zlos pas ni rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor ro //
analyzed: sngags zlos pas ni rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor ro //
translated: The mantra repetition is the yoga of one's deity.

original: bla ma dang slob dpon dang rgan rabs la sogs pa la ji ltar phyag bya zhe na /
analyzed: bla ma dang slob dpon dang rgan rabs la sogs pa la ji ltar phyag bya zhe na /
translated: How should one bow to the guru, the master, the elders, and so forth?

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Then, etc.

original: sngags dang rdo rje bsgrub pa'i bla ma dang rgan rabs la sogs pa la rang gi lha nyid kyi rnam par bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: sngags dang rdo rje bsgrub pa'i bla ma dang rgan rabs la sogs pa la rang gi lha nyid kyi rnam par bsgom pa'o //
translated: The guru, the elders, and so forth, who are the means of accomplishing mantra and vajra, are meditated on as one's deity itself.

original: de'i dam tshig ste /
analyzed: de'i dam tshig ste /
translated: That is the pledge,

original: de'i sku dang gsung dang thugs dang rang gi lus dang ngag dang yid gcig tu byed pa'o //
analyzed: de'i sku dang gsung dang thugs dang rang gi lus dang ngag dang yid gcig tu byed pa'o //
translated: the identity of his body, speech, and mind with one's own body, speech, and mind.

original: de nyid ni sdom pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid ni sdom pa ste /
translated: That itself is the vow,

original: phyag bya ba'i dus su nges par bya ba'i cho ga'o //
analyzed: phyag bya ba'i dus su nges par bya ba'i cho ga'o //
translated: the rite to be performed at the time of bowing.

original: sems can khams rnams ni zhes bya ba ni bla ma dang rgan rabs la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sems can khams rnams ni zhes bya ba ni bla ma dang rgan rabs la sogs pa'o //
translated: The “realms of sentient beings” are the gurus, the elders, and so on.

original: bsam gtan rdo rjes bskul bar bya zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan las byung ba'i rang gi lha'i rnam par sbyor bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan rdo rjes bskul bar bya zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan las byung ba'i rang gi lha'i rnam par sbyor bar bya ba'o //
translated: “One should be urged by the vajra of meditative concentration” means that one should be engaged in the yoga of one’s deity arisen from meditative concentration.

original: rdo rje gsum phyag 'tshal mchog mchog //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum phyag 'tshal mchog mchog //
translated: Homage to the three vajras, supreme of the supreme!

original: ces bya ba ni rang gi lus dang ngag dang yid kyis gong nas gong du phyag 'tshal ba'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni rang gi lus dang ngag dang yid kyis gong nas gong du phyag 'tshal ba'o //
translated: This means that one should pay homage again and again with one’s body, speech, and mind.

original: de gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: de gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: rdo rje las byung zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: rdo rje las byung zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: It is said to “arise from the vajra.”

original: de nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs 'byung ba ste /
translated: It is the arising of the body, speech, and mind of that very [vajra].

original: ro gcig par gyur ba'o //
analyzed: ro gcig par gyur ba'o //
translated: It is the state of having become of one taste.

original: gang du zhe na /
analyzed: gang du zhe na /
translated: Where is that?

original: skabs nyid yin pa'i phyir rang gi lus dang ngag dang yid la'o ;
analyzed: skabs nyid yin pa'i phyir rang gi lus dang ngag dang yid la'o ;
translated: In one’s own body, speech, and mind, because that is the context.

original: / de dag gis kyang 'da' bar bya ba nyid ma yin pas na dam tshig go //
analyzed: / de dag gis kyang 'da' bar bya ba nyid ma yin pas na dam tshig go //
translated: Since one should not transgress them, they are pledges.

original: de de ltar na phyag bya ba ni rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: de de ltar na phyag bya ba ni rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: Thus, there are two kinds of homage:

original: 'khor gsum mi dmigs pa'am rdo rje 'byung bas so //
analyzed: 'khor gsum mi dmigs pa'am rdo rje 'byung bas so //
translated: or by the vajra-emergence, without observing the three spheres.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dngos grub kyi mchog la thabs bzhi ni bsnyen pa la sogs pa yin no //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dngos grub kyi mchog la thabs bzhi ni bsnyen pa la sogs pa yin no //
translated: Then, etc. The four means for the supreme feat are the service, etc.

original: @70a * // de rnams kyi dam tshig ni dus so //
analyzed: @70a * // de rnams kyi dam tshig ni dus so //
translated: Their pledge is the time.

original: de'i tshe sdom pa ni nges par bya ba'i cho ga'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe sdom pa ni nges par bya ba'i cho ga'o //
translated: The vow at that time is the rite to be performed.

original: gnyis po ni rab tu grags pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: gnyis po ni rab tu grags pa nyid yin no //
translated: The two are well known.

original: rdo rje ni byang chub kyi sems so //
analyzed: rdo rje ni byang chub kyi sems so //
translated: The vajra is the spirit of enlightenment.

original: ye shes kyi nyi mar byas pa de dag gis re res yongs su gang ba dbul zhes bya ba ni lha bshos kyi bsam pas so //
analyzed: ye shes kyi nyi mar byas pa de dag gis re res yongs su gang ba dbul zhes bya ba ni lha bshos kyi bsam pas so //
translated: Having made them the sun of intuition, one should offer them filled with each, with the idea of an oblation.

original: rdo rje thams cad mi snang bar mos pa ni dngos grub phra mo'i nye bar mtshon pa yin no //
analyzed: rdo rje thams cad mi snang bar mos pa ni dngos grub phra mo'i nye bar mtshon pa yin no //
translated: The idea that all vajras are invisible is the indication of a minor feat.

original: de nas mchod rdzas zhes bya ba ni de'i dus su byung ba'i byang chub kyi sems so //
analyzed: de nas mchod rdzas zhes bya ba ni de'i dus su byung ba'i byang chub kyi sems so //
translated: Then, the offering substances are the spirit of enlightenment that arises at that time.

original: rdo rje ni thabs te de rdzogs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje ni thabs te de rdzogs par byed pa'o //
translated: The vajra is the means, which perfects it.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la nam mkha' ni mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la nam mkha' ni mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: Space is Akṣobhya.

original: de'i rdo rje rigs 'dzin rnams kyi dam tshig yin no //
analyzed: de'i rdo rje rigs 'dzin rnams kyi dam tshig yin no //
translated: The pledge of those who hold the vajra lineage is the pledge of Akṣobhya.

original: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni //
translated: The vajra of body, speech, and mind

original: zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyi'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyi'o //
translated: is one’s own.

original: bsam gtan zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa khros pa'i'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa khros pa'i'o //
translated: The contemplation is that of Akṣobhya in wrathful form.

original: rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig ste //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig ste //
translated: The pledge of the three vajras

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rigs 'dzin rnams kyis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rigs 'dzin rnams kyis so //
translated: is that of those who hold the vajra lineage.

original: sngags 'chang ba ni sngags pa'o //
analyzed: sngags 'chang ba ni sngags pa'o //
translated: The mantra holder is the mantra practitioner.

original: las dang po pa ni ma grub pa ste /
analyzed: las dang po pa ni ma grub pa ste /
translated: The beginner is the unaccomplished one.

original: de rnams kyi dam tshig go //
analyzed: de rnams kyi dam tshig go //
translated: The pledge of those is the pledge of the three vajras.🔽The vajra of body, etc.

original: sku'i rdo sku'i rdo rje zhes bya ba ni lhag ma ste zhes bya ba dang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: sku'i rdo sku'i rdo rje zhes bya ba ni lhag ma ste zhes bya ba dang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: is the remainder, which should be connected with “is one’s own.”

original: phyi rol zhes bya ba ni phyi rol tu 'gro ba la'o //
analyzed: phyi rol zhes bya ba ni phyi rol tu 'gro ba la'o //
translated: The external is for going outside.

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa ni thugs rdo rje la'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa ni thugs rdo rje la'o //
translated: The vajra holder is the vajra of mind.

original: rdo rje chos zhes bya ba ni gsung gi rdo rje'i sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje chos zhes bya ba ni gsung gi rdo rje'i sbyor ba'o //
translated: The vajra Dharma is the application of the vajra of speech.

original: mdo gdon cho ga'i bya ba la //
analyzed: mdo gdon cho ga'i bya ba la //
translated: In the performance of the rite of the mantra

original: zhes bya ba ni klog pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni klog pa'o //
translated: This is the reading.

original: de la zhes bya ba 'di ni 'dir thugs rdo rje'i sbyor ba ni sems kyi dri ma bsal bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba 'di ni 'dir thugs rdo rje'i sbyor ba ni sems kyi dri ma bsal bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Therein, this is the yoga of the mind-vajra, in order to remove the stains of the mind.

original: bde bar gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung gi sbyor ba lhag ma bdag nyid kyi lus dang blo rgyas par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung gi sbyor ba lhag ma bdag nyid kyi lus dang blo rgyas par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The yoga of the body and speech of the Sugatas is for the sake of expanding one's own body and mind.

original: yang na phyi rol du 'gro ba ni 'chag pa ste /
analyzed: yang na phyi rol du 'gro ba ni 'chag pa ste /
translated: Or else, going outside is walking.

original: de ltar na sbyor ba gsum po 'di dag go rims bzhin du phyi'i don la dmigs pa dang sna tshogs su snang ba la dmigs pa dang brjod bya dang rjod pa la dmigs pa'i gnyen por rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar na sbyor ba gsum po 'di dag go rims bzhin du phyi'i don la dmigs pa dang sna tshogs su snang ba la dmigs pa dang brjod bya dang rjod pa la dmigs pa'i gnyen por rig par bya'o //
translated: Thus, these three yogas should be known as the antidotes, respectively, to the objective supports of external objects, the appearance of variety, and the expressed and the expresser.

original: de skad ces bka' stsal to zhes bya ba ni sku'i las la sogs pa nas mdo gdon pa'i bar gyi sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: de skad ces bka' stsal to zhes bya ba ni sku'i las la sogs pa nas mdo gdon pa'i bar gyi sbyor ba'o //
translated: He spoke thus refers to the yoga from the action of the body up to the recitation of the sutra.

original: sbyor ba de nyid ni ngo bo nyid dag pa yang yin la rdo rje 'chang ba'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir rdo rje yang yin pas na'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba de nyid ni ngo bo nyid dag pa yang yin la rdo rje 'chang ba'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir rdo rje yang yin pas na'o //
translated: That yoga is pure in its own nature and is also a vajra because it is the nature of the bearer of the vajra.

original: de ston par mdzad pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la yang de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ston par mdzad pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la yang de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The Blessed One is so called because he teaches that.

original: 'di man chad ni sbyor ba dang po'i ting nge 'dzin bstan to //
analyzed: 'di man chad ni sbyor ba dang po'i ting nge 'dzin bstan to //
translated: From here on is the teaching of the samadhi of the first application.

original: sbyor ba de yang yan lag bzhi can yin no //
analyzed: sbyor ba de yang yan lag bzhi can yin no //
translated: That application also has four branches.

original: yan lag bzhi ni snying po mnyam pa nyid @70b kyi ye shes dang mnyam pa nyid kyi che ba'i bdag nyid kyi ye shes dang snying po che ba'i bdag nyid kyi ye shes dang / rig pa'i skyes bu bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: yan lag bzhi ni snying po mnyam pa nyid @70b kyi ye shes dang mnyam pa nyid kyi che ba'i bdag nyid kyi ye shes dang snying po che ba'i bdag nyid kyi ye shes dang / rig pa'i skyes bu bsgom pa'o //
translated: The four branches are the wisdom of the equality of the essence, the wisdom of the greatness of equality, the wisdom of the greatness of the essence, and the cultivation of the person of knowledge.

original: de la bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur ba ni snying po mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi mdo yin no //
analyzed: de la bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur ba ni snying po mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi mdo yin no //
translated: There, the Blessed One's silence is the sutra of the wisdom of the equality of the essence.

original: de ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Then, he said Then and so on.

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad ni rig pa'i skyes bu thams cad do //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad ni rig pa'i skyes bu thams cad do //
translated: All vajra holders are all persons of knowledge.

original: de rnams kyi rang gi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje dang snying po mnyam pa nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba ni drug pa'i bsdu ba'o //🔽rang gi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje dang snying po zhes bya ba ni zlas dbye ba'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi rang gi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje dang snying po mnyam pa nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba ni drug pa'i bsdu ba'o // rang gi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje dang snying po zhes bya ba ni zlas dbye ba'o //
translated: The equality of their own vajra body, speech, and mind, and the essence, is called “vajra.” This is the sixth compound.🔽“Their own vajra body, speech, and mind, and the essence” is a dvandva compound.

original: rang gi sku dang gsung dang thugs nyid ni sku la sogs pa dmigs su med pa'i rdo rje yin te /
analyzed: rang gi sku dang gsung dang thugs nyid ni sku la sogs pa dmigs su med pa'i rdo rje yin te /
translated: Their own body, speech, and mind are the vajra that is the non-apprehension of body, etc.

original: rang gi sems tsam nyid kyis ji ltar snang ba bzhin du med par snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi sems tsam nyid kyis ji ltar snang ba bzhin du med par snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they appear as they appear, without existing, as mere mind.

original: snying po ni sgrib pa med pas dag pa'i nam mkha'i khams so //
analyzed: snying po ni sgrib pa med pas dag pa'i nam mkha'i khams so //
translated: The essence is the pure realm of space, free from obscurations.

original: de dag mnyam pa nyid ni khyad par med pa nyid de /
analyzed: de dag mnyam pa nyid ni khyad par med pa nyid de /
translated: Their equality is their non-differentiation.

original: gnyi ga yang yang dag pa'i ye shes nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyi ga yang yang dag pa'i ye shes nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because both are the nature of authentic wisdom.

original: de'i ye shes la yang de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i ye shes la yang de skad ces bya'o //
translated: That wisdom is also called “vajra.”

original: de nyid ni brtan pa nyid kyis na rdo rje'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni brtan pa nyid kyis na rdo rje'o //
translated: It is also a vajra because of its stability.

original: de ltar ma yin par dgongs nas zhes bya ba ni mngon gsum du mdzad nas so //
analyzed: de ltar ma yin par dgongs nas zhes bya ba ni mngon gsum du mdzad nas so //
translated: Having considered it thus means having made it manifest.

original: cang mi gsung bar gyur pa ni de nyid la mnyam par 'jog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: cang mi gsung bar gyur pa ni de nyid la mnyam par 'jog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: He became silent means he became absorbed in that very [reality].

original: phyag 'tshal ba ni cang mi gsung pas bstan pa'i de kho na nyid chen po la thos par 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal ba ni cang mi gsung pas bstan pa'i de kho na nyid chen po la thos par 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: He bowed means he bowed in order to hear the great reality that was being taught by his silence.

original: bzhugs pa ni btang snyoms su mdzad cing dus 'da' bar mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: bzhugs pa ni btang snyoms su mdzad cing dus 'da' bar mdzad pa'o //
translated: He remained means he remained in equanimity, passing the time.

original: rtag pa nyid yin pa'i phyir yi ge yang de yin la thob par bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir tshig kyang yin te /
analyzed: rtag pa nyid yin pa'i phyir yi ge yang de yin la thob par bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir tshig kyang yin te /
translated: It is a syllable because it is permanent, and it is a word because it is to be attained.

original: rdo rje 'chang dag gi sku dang gsungs dang thugs rdo rje dmigs su med pa ni rang gi sems tsam nyid kyis ji ltar snang ba bzhin du med pa nyid du snang ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang dag gi sku dang gsungs dang thugs rdo rje dmigs su med pa ni rang gi sems tsam nyid kyis ji ltar snang ba bzhin du med pa nyid du snang ba'o //
translated: The unobservable vajra body, speech, and mind of the Vajradharas appear as mere mind itself, appearing as non-existent just as it appears.

original: de nyid ni ngo bo nyid de snang ba 'di la yod pas na'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni ngo bo nyid de snang ba 'di la yod pas na'o //
translated: That itself is the essence, because it exists in this appearance.

original: de yang de de yin la yi ge'i tshig kyang yin pas na'o //
analyzed: de yang de de yin la yi ge'i tshig kyang yin pas na'o //
translated: And that is the syllable and word.

original: de la ngo bo nyid med pa'i yi ge'i tshig dpyad nas te /🔽ngo bo nyid med pa ni sgrib pa med pas ngag pa nam mkha'i dbyings kyi ye shes te /
analyzed: de la ngo bo nyid med pa'i yi ge'i tshig dpyad nas te / ngo bo nyid med pa ni sgrib pa med pas ngag pa nam mkha'i dbyings kyi ye shes te /
translated: Having analyzed the syllables that lack an intrinsic reality,

original: snang ba med pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //🔽de nyid ni yi ge'i tshig yin te /
analyzed: snang ba med pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro // de nyid ni yi ge'i tshig yin te /
translated: the syllable that lacks an intrinsic reality is the pristine consciousness of the space element because it is free from obscurations.

original: brtan pa nyid kyi phyir dang thob par bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brtan pa nyid kyi phyir dang thob par bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is the syllable because it is stable and to be attained.

original: de nyid 'di yin pa ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de nyid 'di yin pa ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that so?

original: don dam pa'i ye shes nyid du de mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: don dam pa'i ye shes nyid du de mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the same as the pristine consciousness of ultimate reality.

original: snying po mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi mtshan ma'i mtshan nyid ni bzhi @71a * //
analyzed: snying po mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi mtshan ma'i mtshan nyid ni bzhi @71a * //
translated: The characteristics of the pristine consciousness of the sameness of the essence are four:

original: ste ; ma skyes pa'i mtshan nyid dang ma thob pa'i mtshan nyid dang thob par mi dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid dang sems can thams cad dang thun mong pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: ste ; ma skyes pa'i mtshan nyid dang ma thob pa'i mtshan nyid dang thob par mi dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid dang sems can thams cad dang thun mong pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: the characteristic of nonarising, the characteristic of nonattainment, the characteristic of nonapprehending attainment, and the characteristic of being common to all sentient beings.

original: de dag nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir rigs kyi bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de dag nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir rigs kyi bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In order to teach just those, he says, “Son of a good family,” and so on.

original: ma skyes pa zhes bya ba ni ji ltar snang ba bzhin du ma skyes pa ste /
analyzed: ma skyes pa zhes bya ba ni ji ltar snang ba bzhin du ma skyes pa ste /
translated: “Unborn” means not arisen in the way it appears,

original: gcig dang du ma nyid dang bral bas ji ltar snang ba bzhin du med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: gcig dang du ma nyid dang bral bas ji ltar snang ba bzhin du med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it is free from being one or many, and thus does not exist in the way it appears.

original: sgrib pa med par dag pa nam mkha'i dbyings kyi don ni nam mkha'i rdo rje'o //
analyzed: sgrib pa med par dag pa nam mkha'i dbyings kyi don ni nam mkha'i rdo rje'o //
translated: The meaning of the realm of space, which is pure without obscuration, is the vajra of space.

original: de la rtog pa las byung ba ni de yongs su gcod par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de la rtog pa las byung ba ni de yongs su gcod par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Among those, that which arises from conceptualization is that which fully determines it.

original: log par gzung ba ni dag pa 'jig rten pa'i ye shes te de ni don dam pa'i yul nyid du yang dag par 'dzin pas na gzung ba ste /
analyzed: log par gzung ba ni dag pa 'jig rten pa'i ye shes te de ni don dam pa'i yul nyid du yang dag par 'dzin pas na gzung ba ste /
translated: That which is apprehended wrongly is the pure mundane gnosis, which is apprehended as the object of the ultimate, and thus it is apprehended.

original: de nyid kyis na dag pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na dag pa'o //
translated: It is pure because of that alone.

original: med pa'i rnam par snang ba nyid kyis 'khrul pa nyid kyi phyir log pa ste /
analyzed: med pa'i rnam par snang ba nyid kyis 'khrul pa nyid kyi phyir log pa ste /
translated: It is wrong because it is mistaken due to the appearance of nonexistence.

original: de nyid kyis na 'jig rten pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na 'jig rten pa'o //
translated: It is mundane because of that alone.

original: des 'di la zin pa yod pas na de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: des 'di la zin pa yod pas na de skad ces bya'o //
translated: It is so called because it is grasped by that.

original: gal te log par gzung ba yin na ji ltar dpal rdo rje rtse mo las dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po ngo bo nyid kyi skur gsungs she na /
analyzed: gal te log par gzung ba yin na ji ltar dpal rdo rje rtse mo las dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po ngo bo nyid kyi skur gsungs she na /
translated: If it is a mistaken apprehension, how is it that the Vajraśekhara Tantra speaks of the lord of the maṇḍala as the natural body?

original: der don ni ngo bo nyid kyi phyag rgya yin no zhes bya ba yin gyi rang nyid ngo bo nyid ni ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di yin no //
analyzed: der don ni ngo bo nyid kyi phyag rgya yin no zhes bya ba yin gyi rang nyid ngo bo nyid ni ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di yin no //
translated: The meaning there is that the natural seal is the meaning, but it is not that he himself is the natural body.🔽When this was said, the mistaken conceptions of Brahmā and so on arose, and in order to dispel that, Mañjuśrī and so on requested that the body of Vajradhara be taught by the vajra body and so on.

original: de skad gsungs pa na tshangs pa la sogs pa'i log pa'i rnam par rtog pa skyes pa de bsal bar bya ba'i phyir 'jam dpal la sogs pas gsol ba ni rdo rje 'chang ba'i sku rdo rje la sogs pas ston pa'i gsung de nyid rdo rje'i tshig nyid
analyzed: de skad gsungs pa na tshangs pa la sogs pa'i log pa'i rnam par rtog pa skyes pa de bsal bar bya ba'i phyir 'jam dpal la sogs pas gsol ba ni rdo rje 'chang ba'i sku rdo rje la sogs pas ston pa'i gsung de nyid rdo rje'i tshig nyid
translated: That speech of the teacher is itself vajra speech,

original: yin te / mi slu ba nyid yin pa'i phyir rdo rje yang yin la byang chub sgrub par byed pa nyid kyi phyir tshig yin no //
analyzed: yin te / mi slu ba nyid yin pa'i phyir rdo rje yang yin la byang chub sgrub par byed pa nyid kyi phyir tshig yin no //
translated: because it is nondeceptive, it is vajra, and because it is the means of accomplishing enlightenment, it is speech.

original: slu ba nyid kyis bskyed pa ni phyin ci log kun 'byung ba des mi rtag tu gsol ba ni mi 'grub par gsol ba'o //
analyzed: slu ba nyid kyis bskyed pa ni phyin ci log kun 'byung ba des mi rtag tu gsol ba ni mi 'grub par gsol ba'o //
translated: Generated by deception itself, the origin of error, it is not accomplished by impermanence.

original: de zhes bya ba ni gsung rdo rje'i tshig nyid do //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni gsung rdo rje'i tshig nyid do //
translated: That is the speech vajra’s statement.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dbyings ni sgrib pa med pa'i nam mkha'i dbyings so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dbyings ni sgrib pa med pa'i nam mkha'i dbyings so //
translated: The vajra realm of all the Ones-Gone-Thus is the realm of unobstructed space.

original: de'i ngo bo nyid ni rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid ni rang bzhin no //
translated: Its nature is its essence.

original: de'i spyod pa ni don dam pa'i ye shes dang bdag dang gzhan gyi bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i spyod pa ni don dam pa'i ye shes dang bdag dang gzhan gyi bya ba'o //
translated: Its activity is the ultimate exalted wisdom and the activities for self and others.

original: der 'gro zhing rjes su 'gro ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis 'jug pa ni 'gro ba yin la de'i rgyu mthun pa'i sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis 'jug pa ni rjes su 'gro ba yin te /
analyzed: der 'gro zhing rjes su 'gro ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis 'jug pa ni 'gro ba yin la de'i rgyu mthun pa'i sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis 'jug pa ni rjes su 'gro ba yin te /
translated: Going there and entering by the nature of following is going, and entering by the nature of the body of natural outflow of the cause, such as the vajra, is following.

original: de gnyi ga ni 'gro ba dang rjes su 'gro ba zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de gnyi ga ni 'gro ba dang rjes su 'gro ba zhes gsungs so //
translated: Both of those are called going and following.

original: de @71b de lta bur 'gyur ba'i gsung rdo rje'i tshig nyid ni phyin ci log kun 'byung ba ni ma yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: de @71b de lta bur 'gyur ba'i gsung rdo rje'i tshig nyid ni phyin ci log kun 'byung ba ni ma yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: The meaning is that the speech vajra words themselves are not the origin of all errors.

original: de zhes bya ba ni phyin ci log kun 'byung bar rtog pa ste /
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni phyin ci log kun 'byung bar rtog pa ste /
translated: The word that refers to the conception of the origin of all errors.

original: ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: chos thams cad ni rdo rje 'chang ba'i sku rdo rje la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad ni rdo rje 'chang ba'i sku rdo rje la sogs pa'o //
translated: All phenomena are the vajra body of Vajradhara and so forth.

original: de rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni sngar bshad pa'i dmigs su med pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: de rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni sngar bshad pa'i dmigs su med pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
translated: The nature of their characteristics is the nature of non-apprehension explained earlier.

original: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bstan pa mi shes pa ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bstan pa mi shes pa ste /
translated: The Bhagavān says, The Tathāgatas do not know the teaching.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis sku rdo rje la sogs pa yod pa nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis ni med pa nyid du bstan pa yin no zhes shes nas so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis sku rdo rje la sogs pa yod pa nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis ni med pa nyid du bstan pa yin no zhes shes nas so //
translated: The Bhagavān teaches that the vajra body and so forth exist, and the Tathāgatas teach that they do not exist.🔽 The nature of the vajra is the nature of phenomena.

original: rdo rje nyid chos yin la de rnams kyi de kho na nyid ni yin pa nyid do //
analyzed: rdo rje nyid chos yin la de rnams kyi de kho na nyid ni yin pa nyid do //
translated: The nature of that is existence.🔽 The nature of the Tathāgatas is non-existence.

original: gsang ba'i yi ge rnams ni yod pa nyid du 'chad par mdzad dam snyam pa'o //
analyzed: gsang ba'i yi ge rnams ni yod pa nyid du 'chad par mdzad dam snyam pa'o //
translated: I wonder if the secret syllables are explained as existing.

original: de ltar tshangs pa la sogs pa mi bden pa'i rnam par rtog pa 'jam dpal la sogs pas bsal ba yin no //
analyzed: de ltar tshangs pa la sogs pa mi bden pa'i rnam par rtog pa 'jam dpal la sogs pas bsal ba yin no //
translated: Thus, the false concepts of Brahma and so forth are removed by Manjushri and so forth.

original: dang po'i mtshan nyid bstan nas gnyis pa dang gsum pa'i dbang du mdzad de de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: dang po'i mtshan nyid bstan nas gnyis pa dang gsum pa'i dbang du mdzad de de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Having taught the characteristics of the first, with regard to the second and third, he says, Then, the Bhagavān said to the Bodhisattva Vajrapāṇi, Vajrapāṇi, the Bodhisattvas do not know the attainment of the stage of Vajradhara.

original: byang chub sems dpas mi shes so zhes bya ba'i skabs yin pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpas mi shes so zhes bya ba'i skabs yin pa de'i phyir /
translated: The statement Why is that? is the context of the Bodhisattvas do not know. Therefore,

original: bka' stsal pa ni byang chub sems dpa' khyed rnams lta ci smos te /
analyzed: bka' stsal pa ni byang chub sems dpa' khyed rnams lta ci smos te /
translated: he says, The Bhagavān said, 'Why is that?

original: nged kyis kyang mi shes shing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: nged kyis kyang mi shes shing mi dmigs so //
translated: The Bhagavān said, Vajrapāṇi, the Bodhisattvas do not know the attainment of the stage of Vajradhara.

original: ci zhig ce na sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams kyi byang chub thob pa ste /
analyzed: ci zhig ce na sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams kyi byang chub thob pa ste /
translated: What is that? The attainment of enlightenment of the vajra body, speech, and mind.

original: sku la sogs pa dmigs su med pa yin na de thob pa yang dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: sku la sogs pa dmigs su med pa yin na de thob pa yang dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: If the body and so forth are not observed, the attainment of that is also not observed.

original: ci zhig thob nas she na /
analyzed: ci zhig thob nas she na /
translated: Having attained what?

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i gsang ba ste /
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i gsang ba ste /
translated: The secret of the vajra body, speech, and mind.

original: ji lta ba bzhin du snang ba ma yin pa de kho na nyid do //
analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin du snang ba ma yin pa de kho na nyid do //
translated: That is to say, it is reality, which does not appear as it is.

original: de nyid ni yi ge'i gnas te /
analyzed: de nyid ni yi ge'i gnas te /
translated: That itself is the abode of the syllables.

original: de'i yod pa ni yod pa nyid las rtag tu mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i yod pa ni yod pa nyid las rtag tu mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Its existence is because of the changelessness that is always in existence.

original: ji ltar snang ba'i sku la sogs pa'i rdo rje ni 'gyur ba nyid yin te /
analyzed: ji ltar snang ba'i sku la sogs pa'i rdo rje ni 'gyur ba nyid yin te /
translated: The vajra of the body, etc. , which appears as it is, is changeableness.

original: de'i 'og tu med pa na yod pa nyid las rtag tu 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu med pa na yod pa nyid las rtag tu 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That is because of the changeableness that is always in nonexistence after it.

original: de nyid kyis na gnas pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de nyid kyis na gnas pa ma yin te /
translated: For that very reason, it is not an abode.

original: med pa ni thob par mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: med pa ni thob par mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: That is because nonexistence cannot be attained.

original: de ltar na 'di ni ma thob pa'i mtshan nyid yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na 'di ni ma thob pa'i mtshan nyid yin no //
translated: Thus, this is the characteristic of nonattainment.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi rang gi slu la sogs par snang ba'i ye shes ni skye ba yang yin la /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi rang gi slu la sogs par snang ba'i ye shes ni skye ba yang yin la /
translated: Why is that? The pristine wisdom of the buddhas, which appears as their own illusions, etc. , is born.

original: sku la sogs pa rnyed pa yang mi dmigs pa yin no zhes bya ba de gnyi ga'i rgyu gang las yin gang las kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: sku la sogs pa rnyed pa yang mi dmigs pa yin no zhes bya ba de gnyi ga'i rgyu gang las yin gang las kyang ma yin te /
translated: The attainment of the body, etc. is also the non-apprehension of them.

original: @72a * // 'gal ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bsams pas so //
analyzed: @72a * // 'gal ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bsams pas so //
translated: What is the cause of both of these? It is nothing whatsoever, because of their contradiction.

original: skye ba med pa la sogs pa ni lan yin te /
analyzed: skye ba med pa la sogs pa ni lan yin te /
translated: The non-arising, etc. are the replies.

original: ngo bo nyid med par mi 'gyur ba'i gnas ni sgrib pa med pa dag pa'i nam mkha'i dbyings sangs rgyas rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyi sku ste chos kyi sku'o //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid med par mi 'gyur ba'i gnas ni sgrib pa med pa dag pa'i nam mkha'i dbyings sangs rgyas rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyi sku ste chos kyi sku'o //
translated: The realm of the sky, which is the pure absence of obscurations, is the essential body of the Buddhas, the Dharma Body, which is not devoid of own-being.

original: de las byung ba ni mnyam pa nyid du skyes pa ste /
analyzed: de las byung ba ni mnyam pa nyid du skyes pa ste /
translated: Arising from that is the equality-arising,

original: de'i rgyu mthun pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rgyu mthun pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the natural outcome of that.

original: sku la sogs pa'i mi dmigs pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir sku rdo rje la sogs pa skye ba med par mthong ba ni skye ba med pa'i rdo rje'o //
analyzed: sku la sogs pa'i mi dmigs pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir sku rdo rje la sogs pa skye ba med par mthong ba ni skye ba med pa'i rdo rje'o //
translated: The non-arising of the vajra-body, etc. is the vajra-vision of the non-arising of the vajra-body, etc. because of their very nature of non-apprehension.

original: de rnams kyi mngon par byang chub pa ni thob pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi mngon par byang chub pa ni thob pa'o //
translated: The full enlightenment of those is the attainment of the vajra-body, etc.

original: dgongs pa ni 'di ltar 'jig rten na ji ltar mthong ba'i nus pas ji ltar mthong ba'i don la nges pa skye bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du sangs rgyas rnams kyang ngo bo nyid med pa'i mi 'gyur ba yang dag par gzigs pas sku la sogs pa'i snang
analyzed: dgongs pa ni 'di ltar 'jig rten na ji ltar mthong ba'i nus pas ji ltar mthong ba'i don la nges pa skye bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du sangs rgyas rnams kyang ngo bo nyid med pa'i mi 'gyur ba yang dag par gzigs pas sku la sogs pa'i snang
translated: The intention is as follows: Just as in the world, certainty about the object that is seen arises through the power of seeing, in the same way, the buddhas see the non-appearance of the body, etc. through seeing the unchanging naturelessness.

original: ba med pa nyid du gzigs pa nyid ni de'i stobs kyis dag pa 'jig rten pa'i sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis nges pa skye par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di yin no //
analyzed: ba med pa nyid du gzigs pa nyid ni de'i stobs kyis dag pa 'jig rten pa'i sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis nges pa skye par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di yin no //
translated: By the power of that, certainty arises in the pure worldly body, etc. which have the nature of the vajra.

original: sku la sogs pa med pa nyid du dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni de rnams kyi mi dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: sku la sogs pa med pa nyid du dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni de rnams kyi mi dmigs pa yin no //
translated: The non-apprehension of those is the non-apprehension of the body, etc. as non-existent.

original: de nyid ni thob pa mi dmigs pa nyid yin pa de ltar na thob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid yin no //
analyzed: de nyid ni thob pa mi dmigs pa nyid yin pa de ltar na thob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid yin no //
translated: That itself is the non-apprehension of attainment. Thus attainment has the characteristic of non-apprehension.

original: mtshan nyid bzhi pa bstan pa'i phyir rigs kyi bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: mtshan nyid bzhi pa bstan pa'i phyir rigs kyi bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In order to teach the fourth characteristic, it says “Son of noble family” and so on.

original: byang chub ni ngo bo nyid med pa mi 'gyur ba'i gnas te de la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub ni ngo bo nyid med pa mi 'gyur ba'i gnas te de la gnas pa'o //
translated: Enlightenment is the abode of the non-existence of an intrinsic nature, the unchanging abode, and it is the abode of that.

original: 'di rnams kyi sangs rgyas te mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa yin la /
analyzed: 'di rnams kyi sangs rgyas te mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa yin la /
translated: These are the Buddhas, the fully enlightened ones.

original: rdo rje ni sku la sogs pa'i yin pa de ltar na sangs rgyas rdo rje'o //
analyzed: rdo rje ni sku la sogs pa'i yin pa de ltar na sangs rgyas rdo rje'o //
translated: The vajra is the body, etc. Thus, the Buddha is the vajra.

original: sku la sogs pa'i rdo rje ni gsang ba gsum mo //
analyzed: sku la sogs pa'i rdo rje ni gsang ba gsum mo //
translated: The vajra of the body, etc. is the three secrets.

original: ye shes ni byang chub ste de gnyis thob pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes ni byang chub ste de gnyis thob pa'o //
translated: The gnosis is enlightenment, and the attainment of those two.

original: sku gsum rdo rje'i chos nyid ces bya ba la 'dir rdo rje ni ye shes tsam ste thogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sku gsum rdo rje'i chos nyid ces bya ba la 'dir rdo rje ni ye shes tsam ste thogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The reality of the three vajras of the body, etc. is the reality of the three vajras of the body, etc. of the Buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes kyi de bzhin nyid dang sku la sogs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de nyid ni sems can thams cad kyi yin no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes kyi de bzhin nyid dang sku la sogs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de nyid ni sems can thams cad kyi yin no //
translated: The reality of the gnosis of the Buddhas and the reality of the body, etc. are the very same as those of all sentient beings.

original: de bas na snang bar gyur pa med pa nyid kyi phyir chos kyi rang bzhin nyid kyis sangs rgyas rnams dang sems can rnams ni ye shes mnyam pa dang / sku dang gsung dang thugs mnyam pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na snang bar gyur pa med pa nyid kyi phyir chos kyi rang bzhin nyid kyis sangs rgyas rnams dang sems can rnams ni ye shes mnyam pa dang / sku dang gsung dang thugs mnyam pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, because of the non-existence of appearance, the Buddhas and sentient beings are equal in intuition, and equal in body, speech, and mind, by the very nature of reality.

original: de ltar na mtshan nyid bzhi po yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na mtshan nyid bzhi po yin no //
translated: Thus, there are four characteristics.🔽Then, etc.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs @72b pa la de ltar cang mi gsung par ston par byed pa snying po mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis rgya cher rnam par bkrol nas zhes bya ba ni de nas kyi sgra'i don yin no
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs @72b pa la de ltar cang mi gsung par ston par byed pa snying po mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis rgya cher rnam par bkrol nas zhes bya ba ni de nas kyi sgra'i don yin no
translated: Thus, the Teacher, the intuition of the equality of the essence, having extensively elucidated the Tathagatas, who are the revealers, the meaning of the word then is this.

original: // 'di skad gsungs so zhes bya ba ni snying po mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi tshigs su bcad pa ste /
analyzed: // 'di skad gsungs so zhes bya ba ni snying po mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi tshigs su bcad pa ste /
translated: This is what was said, the verse of the intuition of the equality of the essence.

original: rtog par smra bar byed pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: rtog par smra bar byed pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: It is to be supplied with the words, “the one who speaks of conceptualization.”

original: gang zhe na rdo rje las byung ba ste /
analyzed: gang zhe na rdo rje las byung ba ste /
translated: What is it? It is the one arisen from the vajra.

original: sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i rnam par 'dres pa'o //
analyzed: sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i rnam par 'dres pa'o //
translated: It is the one who is mixed up with the forms of the vajra body, etc.

original: smra bar byed pa ni rjod par byed pa'o //
analyzed: smra bar byed pa ni rjod par byed pa'o //
translated: The one who speaks is the one who expresses.

original: de la ci'i phyir rtog pa zhes bya zhe na /
analyzed: de la ci'i phyir rtog pa zhes bya zhe na /
translated: Why is it called “imagination”?

original: rnam pa rnams ni rang nyid brdzun pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa rnams ni rang nyid brdzun pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because the aspects are themselves false.

original: don gang la de rtog ce na /
analyzed: don gang la de rtog ce na /
translated: What is the object of that imagination?

original: rang bzhin dag cing bdag med pa ste sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ro gcig par 'gyur ba'i shes bya'i cha de nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin dag cing bdag med pa ste sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ro gcig par 'gyur ba'i shes bya'i cha de nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la'o //
translated: The nature of that very part of the object of knowledge which becomes of one taste with the vajra body, speech, and mind of all the buddhas, pure by nature and selfless.

original: rang bzhin ni gnas yin te de ni byang chub bo //
analyzed: rang bzhin ni gnas yin te de ni byang chub bo //
translated: Nature is the abode, and that is enlightenment.

original: ye shes kyi cha dag pa ni ye shes kyi cha dag pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes kyi cha dag pa ni ye shes kyi cha dag pa'o //
translated: The purity of the part of gnosis is the purity of the part of gnosis.

original: rang bzhin dag la ni rang bzhin dag pa ste /
analyzed: rang bzhin dag la ni rang bzhin dag pa ste /
translated: In the pure nature is the pure nature,

original: byang chub kyi sems zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: which means the mind of enlightenment.

original: de nyid ni bdag med pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid ni bdag med pa ste /
translated: That very [nature] is selfless,

original: dam tshig chen po'i bdag nyid kyang de bzhin nyid du ro gcig pa'i phyir te de la'o //
analyzed: dam tshig chen po'i bdag nyid kyang de bzhin nyid du ro gcig pa'i phyir te de la'o //
translated: and the nature of the great commitment is also of one taste with suchness, and that [nature] is the object.

original: ji lta bu zhe na chos ni dkyil 'khor pa rnams yin la /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na chos ni dkyil 'khor pa rnams yin la /
translated: What is it like? The Dharma is the maṇḍala deities.

original: dbyings ni rten gyi dkyil 'khor yin te ro gcig par byed pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings kyang de yin la /🔽chags pa'i gnas phung po dang khams la sogs pa ro gcig par byed pa'i phyir gnas med pa yang yin pa de ltar na chos kyi dbyings ni gnas med pa ste /
analyzed: dbyings ni rten gyi dkyil 'khor yin te ro gcig par byed pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings kyang de yin la / chags pa'i gnas phung po dang khams la sogs pa ro gcig par byed pa'i phyir gnas med pa yang yin pa de ltar na chos kyi dbyings ni gnas med pa ste /
translated: The realm is the supporting mandala, because it makes the single taste of the dharmadhatu.🔽And it is the non-abiding, because it makes the single taste of the aggregates, elements, and so on, the abodes of attachment.

original: sgrib pa med cing dag pa'i nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dngos po'i mtshan nyid can gyi snying po'i don yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: sgrib pa med cing dag pa'i nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dngos po'i mtshan nyid can gyi snying po'i don yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: Thus, the dharmadhatu is the non-abiding, the meaning of the essence which has the characteristic of the entity of the realm of space, free from obscurations and pure.

original: de'i bdag nyid can gyi dag pa mthong ba'i stobs kyis ji ltar mthong ba'i don nges pa'i tshul du de 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid can gyi dag pa mthong ba'i stobs kyis ji ltar mthong ba'i don nges pa'i tshul du de 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: It is so called because it arises in the manner of ascertaining the meaning that is seen by the power of seeing the purity that has that as its nature.

original: smra ma yin ni de la rtog pa zhes pa mi brjod de med pa la mos pa'i phyir snying po dang don mtshungs pa nyid dang snying po'i rgyu mthun pa nyid kyis snying po las khyad par med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //🔽snying po mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes gsungs nas che ba'i bdag nyid kyi ye shes kyi skabs dbye ba'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /🔽bdag po'i 'byin pa dang sdud pa la dbang du gyur pa nyid kyi phyir ro //🔽de ston par mdzad pa la de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: smra ma yin ni de la rtog pa zhes pa mi brjod de med pa la mos pa'i phyir snying po dang don mtshungs pa nyid dang snying po'i rgyu mthun pa nyid kyis snying po las khyad par med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so // snying po mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes gsungs nas che ba'i bdag nyid kyi ye shes kyi skabs dbye ba'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te / bdag po'i 'byin pa dang sdud pa la dbang du gyur pa nyid kyi phyir ro // de ston par mdzad pa la de skad ces bya ste /
translated: Not speaking means that it is not called conceptualization, because it is the cause of the essence and is similar to the essence, and because it is not different from the essence by reason of being concordant with the essence.🔽 Having taught the wisdom of the sameness of the essence, in order to open the section on the wisdom of greatness, he says, Then, etc.

original: 'di lta ste bcom ldan 'das dang dkyil 'khor ba'i chos rnams dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste bcom ldan 'das dang dkyil 'khor ba'i chos rnams dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa ste /
translated: Thus, the accomplishment of the Blessed One, the dharmas of the maṇḍala, and the pure buddha field.

original: de rnams kyi dngos grub ni grub pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi dngos grub ni grub pa'o //
translated: Their accomplishment is perfection.

original: yang dag par 'byung ba ni rgyu'i gnas skabs kyis bsdus par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag par 'byung ba ni rgyu'i gnas skabs kyis bsdus par gyur pa'o //
translated: Their arising is their inclusion within the causal state.

original: gnas pa ni rgyu'i gnas skabs kyi mthar thug pa ste /
analyzed: gnas pa ni rgyu'i gnas skabs kyi mthar thug pa ste /
translated: Their abiding is the culmination of the causal state.
